134a3(mdo sde): chas nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang la stod cing 'khod par gyur to//de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gtsor bu pa'i bu bden smra dang ldan cig/blon po'i tshogs dang
134a4(mdo sde): lhur cig/rgyal bu gzhon nu dang /dpung gi tshogs dang lhan cig/btsun mA'i 'khor dang lhan cig/grong rdal ba'i mi dang yul gyi mi rnams dang lhan cig/'khor
134a5(mdo sde): gyi mi dang chab sgo ba rnams dang lhan cig tu thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing dpung gi bkod pa chen pos mdun du bdar nas/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
134a6(mdo sde): dang /ba dan dag ni bsgreng /sil snyan b+ha ba 'bum dag ni bun lang du byas/gar dang /glu dang /rol mo'i sgra dbyangs ni bsgrags/rol mo'i spyad kim pa la
134a7(mdo sde): dang /na ku li dang /khar dkrol dang /pheg gi sgra ni bsgrags/rta dang glang po che rnams sgra ni 'byin/bkra shis kyi bum pa gser thag gis btags pa 'brus
134b1(mdo sde): dgra thogs pa rnams ni mdun du bkye ste/glang po che'i shing rta pa rnams dang /rta'i shing rta pa rnams dang /srog chags 'bum phyag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu rgyal
134b2(mdo sde): po'i mthu chen po dang /rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i rnam par rtse ba chen pos ring gi snying mos tshal ga la ba dang /
134b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogaso gcig tu 'dug go/gcer
134b4(mdo sde): bu pa'i bu badren smra'ang /'khor dang bcas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/lan 'bu mo phrag du mur bskor ba byas te/thal mo sbyar
134b5(mdo sde): nas mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing 'dug go/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nus
134b6(mdo sde): mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/kye mA gtsar bu pi'i bu bden smra 'di ci zhig 'dire 'ongs
134b7(mdo sde): snyam nas/de ltar rnam par brtags te/gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la 'di skad ces smras so//bden smra khyod ci zhig 'dod de de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du 'ongs//
135a1(mdo sde): ci bcom ldan 'das blalta bar 'dod dam/chas nyan par 'dod/de skad nas smras pa dang /gcer bu ba'i bu bden smras/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra tI tshul/
135a2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo ni bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'dod pa ma yin/chos nyan par 'dod pa'ang ma yin te/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
135a3(mdo sde): kho bo ni chos thams cad mi 'dod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs
135a4(mdo sde): pa mthong ba ma yin/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam pararo shes pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin/sa'i khams
135a5(mdo sde): mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin/chu'i khams dang /me'i khyams dang /rlung gi khams mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin//
135a6(mdo sde): bdag mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin//sems can dang /srog mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin/gang zag mthong ba ni de
135a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin ngar 'dzin pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin/ji yir 'dzin pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
135b1(mdo sde): bam yin/mtshan ma mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba mya yin pa'i phyir te/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtshan ma thams cad ma mthong ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o//
135b2(mdo sde): mngon par zhen pa med pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o//dngos po med pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba 'o//ngo bo nyid med pa mthong ba ni de bzhin
135b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa mthong ba'o//yang dag pa'i mtha' med par mthong ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o//mig gzugs la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong ba ni de
135b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o//rna ba sgra la rnam par rig pa med par mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o//sna dri la 'pho ba med par mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs
135b5(mdo sde): pa mthong ba'o//lce rol rnam par shes par mi mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o//lus reg bya li rig par mi mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa
135b6(mdo sde): mthong ba'o yid chos la rnam par ma brtags par mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa bden smra de ltar mthong bas gal te de
135b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin na/'o na de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar blta bar bya/bden smras smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa
136a1(mdo sde): ni rigs su mi blta'o//rus su mi blta'o//mtshan nyid du mi ga//mtshan nyid med par mi blta'o//chos su mi bltag/chos ma yin par bya
136a2(mdo sde): blta'o//yang dag par mi blta'o//yang dag par ma yin par mi blta'o//dmigs par mi blta'o//dmigs pa med par mi blta'o//yid la bya bar mi
136a3(mdo sde): byasti'o//yid la bya ba med par mi blta'o//rtog par myi blta'o//mi rtog par mi blta'o//'dus byas su mI blta'o//'dus ma byas su mi blta'o//dngos
136a4(mdo sde): po yod par mi blta'o//dngos po med par mi blta'o//gong bur mi blta'o//rdzas su mi blta'o//gzugs su mi blta'o//tshor bar mi blta'o//'du shes su
136a5(mdo sde): mi blta'o//'du byed rnams su mi blta'o//rnam par shes par mi blta'o//nye bar len par mi byalta'o//nye bar lenu pa med par mi blta'o//de bzhin gshegs
136a6(mdo sde): pa ni skye bar mi blta'o//skye ba med par mi blta'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la 'dis du rjes smras so//
136a7(mdo sde): bden smra gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar mi lta na skyes bu dam pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar blta/smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo ni de
136b1(mdo sde): shin gshegs pa gzugs su mi blta'o//de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs las gzhan du'ang mi bltar/de bzhin ga h+Nas pa gzugs gzhag pa'i phyir mi blta'o///
136b2(mdo sde): btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba dang /'du shes dang / byed rnams dang rnam par shes blta'o//de bzhi rgyu shig so pa rnam par
136b3(mdo sde): shis pa las gzhan du'ang mi bka'//de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa gzhig pa'i phyir yang mi blta'o//de bzhin gshegs pa rten du gtogs par mi
136b4(mdo sde): bAlta'o//de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las rgal bar mi blta'o//de bzhin gshegs pa phung pos rab tu phye bar mi blta'o//de bzhin gshegs pa khams
136b5(mdo sde): kyis rab tu phye bar mi blta'o//de bzhin gshegs pa skye mched kyis rab tu phye bar mi blta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa tshig gi lam thams cad kyis brjod du med par
136b6(mdo sde): blta zhing ci nas kyang mi mthong ba dang rnam par mi mthong ba dang /mi dmigaso pa dang /mi rtag pa dang /rnam par mi rtog pa dang /yongs su mi rtog pa dang /rnam par
136b7(mdo sde): mtho brtsam pa med pa dang /kun nis slong ba med pa dang /len pa med pa dang /'du ba me 'dang /spros pa med pa dang /mtshan mar bya ba med pa dang /ma
137a1(mdo sde): mar bya ba med pa ma yin pa dang /bya ba med pa dang /rnam par bya ba med pa dang /yod par bya ba med pa dang /med par bya ba med pa dang /blang ba
137a2(mdo sde): med pa dang /dor ba med pa dang /bsam pa med pa dang /lhun gyis grub po med pa dang /dmigs su med pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
137a3(mdo sde): blta ste/brjod du med pa dang /brjod du med pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa blta'o//tshig gi lam dang dbyangs su brjod pa'ang ma yin pa de
137a4(mdo sde): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa blta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa blta'o//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la de ltar blta
137a5(mdo sde): ste/kho bo'ang de bzhin du blta'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa la gal te de ltar blta na/dri'i chos bstan pa'ang ji ltar nyan/smras pa//
137a6(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te kho bo la chos kyi 'du shes skye ba zhig yod dam/chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes skye ba zhig yo nA ni kho bo'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi chos
137a7(mdo sde): bstan pa nyan to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu brjod pa thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshig 'byung ba med de/de la mngon
137b1(mdo sde): par zhen pa'ang med la chos kyi 'du shes kyang mi skyed pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'du shes thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/bden smra
137b2(mdo sde): khyod chos don du gnyer ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du ma 'ongs sum/smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo ni chos don du gnyer ba'ang ma yin/chos ma
137b3(mdo sde): yin pa don du gnyer ba'ang mo yin par de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du 'ongs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos don du gnyer ba zhes bya ba de ni chos
137b4(mdo sde): thams cad la don du gnyer ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas te/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang chos don du gnyer ba de ni sangs rgyas la mngon par zhen par 'dod pa ma yin//
137b5(mdo sde): chos la sgro gdags par 'dod pa ma yin/dge 'dun bskyed par 'dod pas yin/sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya bar 'dod pa ma yin/kun 'byung ba spyang
137b6(mdo sde): bar 'dod pa ma yin/lam bsgom par 'dod pa ma yin/'gog pa mngon du bya bar 'dod pa ma yin/'dod pa'i khoms las yang dag par 'da' bar 'dod pa
137b7(mdo sde): ma yin/gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar 'dod pa ma yin/mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir
138a1(mdo sde): te/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di ltar khro bo ni chos thams cad la don du gnyer ba med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar phyin
138a2(mdo sde): par rig par bgyi'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la 'di skad ces smras so//bden smra ci las pa sems
138a3(mdo sde): te de skad ces smra/smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khro bo ni bsams pa med par chos thams cad de ltar ston to//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi dbyings la
138a4(mdo sde): ni gnyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir bsams pa'ang mi dmigs ma bsams pa'ang mi dmigs so//smras pa/bdun smra khyod 'gro ba de dag mi sbyor ram/smras pa/
138a5(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu gal te kho bos 'gro ba zhig dmigs nu ni sbyor ba'ang yod gal te kho bo la skye ba zhig yod na ni skye bar yang 'gyur/gal te kho bo la 'pho ba
138a6(mdo sde): zhig yod na ni 'pho bar yang 'gyur na/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni 'pho ba med po ste/'gro ba med cing shi 'pho dang skye ba med pa'o//smras pa/
138a7(mdo sde): bden smra de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong khyod ni skye'o//rga'o 'chi'o//'pho'o//'byung ngo zhes 'di ma gsungs sam/smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i
138b1(mdo sde): bu 'gro ba la brten cing lhag pa'i nga rgyal yod pa'i sems can rnams kyi rten pa bsal ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de skad ces ston te/bstan pa'i chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bya
138b2(mdo sde): na 'di la 'gro ba med/shi 'pho med/skye ba med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/bdon smra legs so legs so//'di ltar theg pa chen po 'di bstan pa'i don rnam parA
138b3(mdo sde): nges pa la mkhas pa legs so legs so//bden sras smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis don ni gang /rnam par nges pa ni gang yin pa mkhyen tam/shA ra dwa ti'i
138b4(mdo sde): bus smras pa/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni ston par 'dod pa ma yin gyi nyan par 'dod pa yin gyis/rigs kyi bu don ni gang /rnam par nges pa ni gang khyod kyis ston cig de skad

146a6(mdo sde): kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugs kyi thugs su chud nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam
146a7(mdo sde): dpal rigs kyi bu bden sgra 'di'i mdun du bram ze'i khye'u bden dga'o zhes bya ba 'dug pa bram ze'i byis pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu bya ba 'di de'i tshe de'i
146b1(mdo sde): dus nA de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa de dag ni
146b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa bzhin du 'gyur ro//spangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i che ba
146b3(mdo sde): de thos nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor do las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de skye byar smon khyam btab ste/gang gi tshe
146b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa badron pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
146b5(mdo sde): gyur pa de'i tshe bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar shog cig ces smon lam btab par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad
146b6(mdo sde): kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to//de nas gtsor bu pa 'bum phrag brgyad cu po de dag gis kyang tshig mthun par smras pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang /
146b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bor gyur cig ces smon lam btab po//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to//de nas steng /
147a1(mdo sde): gi bar snang las kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcus 'di skad kyi tshig brjod de/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de
147a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de byang chub brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par bltas pa'i grags pa can der
147a3(mdo sde): skye bar gyur cig/yon tan bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'ang mthong bar shog cig ces smon lam btab po//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag
147a4(mdo sde): khyod cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par bltas pa'i grags pa can der skye bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro///
147a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu khyed kyang 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par bltas pa'i grags pa can de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
147a6(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur la tshe'i tshad ni mthun par 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
147a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/sa'i 'og nas pad+me dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdab ma can nor bu rin po che chen po an+da rnyil gyi za ba'i tshogs
147b1(mdo sde): can/sdug gi snying po dang ldan pa/nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i chu ba can/bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis sa gzhi brtol nas mngon par 'phags te/pad+ma de dag
147b2(mdo sde): thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung du 'khod pa mtshan dang dpe byad bzung pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'dud
147b3(mdo sde): cing phyag 'tshal ba snang bar gyur te/de dag gos rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dra ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab nas 'di skad kyi tshig brjod
147b4(mdo sde): do//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni 'jig rten gzhan dang gzhan gyi khams nas de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab
147b5(mdo sde): pa bka' stsal pa 'di'ang nyan/bcom ldan 'das la'ang blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /rigs kyi bu bden smra 'di dang 'khor
147b6(mdo sde): 'dus pa 'di'ang blta ba'i slad du 'dir mchis te/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag tu byang
147b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
148a1(mdo sde): de'i tshe don 'di nyid shin tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//rtse gcig sems su dbang po mnyam
148a2(mdo sde): zhog ste//de ring ngas smras 'di don mnyan par gyis//de bzhin gshegs la brdzun gyi tshig mi mnga'//bde gshegs rang byung tshig ni gzhan du min//skye bo de
148a3(mdo sde): dga' bden smra 'di nyid ni//dag cing dri med gnod med bskal pa la//bskal pa grangs med mang pos 'jig rten du//'tshang rgya bden pa'i blo gros tog gi rgyal//
148a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs gnod pa de la mi 'byung ste//de phyir bskal pa de ni gnod med pa//'jig rten ming yang rnam par bltas pa ste//bskal pa de ni dpal gyi phung por
148a5(mdo sde): 'gyur//rnam par 'dren pa de yi bskal pa de//lha mi rnams kyis blta ba'i 'os 'gyur te//rin chen tshogs kyi 'obs dang rta babs rnams//nyams dga'
148a6(mdo sde): kun nas shin tu mdzes par 'gyur//dzam+bu'i klung gri gser gyi dra bas g.yogs//chos kyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba bsgrags//seng ge'i rgyal mtshan
148a7(mdo sde): rab rnams rtag tu bsgreng //rin chen tshogs kyi lnga ldi brgya dag dpyangs//rtsig pa'i rgyud ni rin chen dri med de//de ni lha yi khyim dang 'dra bar 'gyur//
148b1(mdo sde): mtshe'u dang lum pad+ma'i mtsho dag gis//de ni rtag tu legs par brgyan par 'gyur//de yi chu dang pad+ma ut+pal dang //pad+ma dkar po dag gis kun khribs 'gyur//gling
148b2(mdo sde): bzhi pa yi 'jig rten par ma de//ming ni blta na sdug cing yid 'ong ste//de ni bde gshegs de yi skye ba yis//rang byung de ni bram ze'i rigs las 'byung //
148b3(mdo sde): thub pa'i yum ni shugs dang ldan zhes bya//yab ni tshangs pa'i dbyig ces bya bar 'gyur//de yi bu ni rnam glags sgra zhes bya//dper na nga'i bu sgra gcan zin
148b4(mdo sde): 'di 'dra//bde gshegs de yi btsun mo dam pa ni//blo gros chen mo nga yi sa 'tsho bzhin//de yi ma ma mring ni grags chen to//nga yi skye dgu'i bdag mo chen
148b5(mdo sde): mo bzhin//thub pa'i rim gro byed pa'i sems can 'phags//rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhes bya ba ste//nga yi rim gro 'dun pa gus ldan bzhin//de ni 'dren pa de
148b6(mdo sde): la rim gro byed//thub pa de yi rta mchog 'gyur ba yi//shugs can zhes bya'i ming dang ldan 'gyur te//bde gshegs mngon par 'byung tshe bcibs par 'gyur//
148b7(mdo sde): nga yi rta mchog bsngags ldan gyur pa bzhi ni//bde gshegs de yi rdzogs pa'i byang chub shing //chos kyi 'phags zhes bya ba de tshe 'byung //shing mchog brgya phrag
149a1(mdo sde): stong du bsgyur ba yin//phrag ni brgyad cu dag gis de bskor 'gyur//shing mchog de drud kye ma chos kyis rgyal//rang byung zla med bden zhes bya ba zhugs
149a2(mdo sde): nas//bla na med pa'i byang chub rab zhi pa//mya ngan med pa mngon par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur//de na bdud med bdud kyi phyogs kyang myed//bdud kyi las kyang der 'byung/
149a3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro//rgyal po thub pa gang zag zla med pa'i//sangs rgyas zhing ni gnod pado med par 'gyur//mi dang lha tshogs mang po 'du 'gyur te//rnam dag shin
149a4(mdo sde): tu sbyangs pa de tshe 'byung //de kun me tog phreng ba gos dang glu//rol mo sgra yis bde gshegs drung 'dod 'gyur//rgyal bas de dag bsam mkhyen mdo sde 'di//
149a5(mdo sde): mdo gzhan lhan cig drang srong gsung bar 'gyur//rgyal ba des ni rab tu gsungs pa yi//mdo sde khyad par 'phrugs pa 'di thos nas//sems can
149a6(mdo sde): dpag yas gang+gA'i bye ma snyed//thub dbang byang chub mchog tu mi ldog 'gyur//theg pa dman pa dor 'byung mi 'gyur te//rang rgyal thug pa'ang zhing
149a7(mdo sde): der 'byung mi 'gyur//rgyal ba de yi sangs rgyas zhing mchog der//byang chub sems dpa' 'byung kun dpa' zhing mdzangs//rkang gnyis mchog de'i/
149b1(mdo sde): 'dus pa dang por ni//rgyal sras glags pa'i 'od ldan gang 'byung ba//rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog/rnam dag gang+gA'i rdul bas myang ba 'byung //blo/
149b2(mdo sde): bzang ldan pa'i 'dus pa gnyis pa ni//skye ba gcig gnas khrag khrig brgyad cu 'byung //'dus pa gsum pa byang chub sems dpa' mchog/dkrigs phrag drug cu
149b3(mdo sde): dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur//bde bar gshegs de'i tshe yi tshad 'gyur ba//bskal pa bar ma drug cu tshang ba ste//rgyal ba de ni mya ngan 'das gyur nas//mi yi
149b4(mdo sde): 'dren pa'i chos kyi sgron ma yang //lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag ni//brgyad cu tham parA gnas par 'gyur ba yino//rang gi sku gdung ring bsrel rgyas
149b5(mdo sde): mdzad cing //de ni gdul ba rab mang 'dul bar 'gyur//drang srong che de byang chub sems dpa' ni//tog chen lung bstan mdzad nas mya ngan 'da'//'di ni
149b6(mdo sde): bkod chen zhes bya'i thub dbang 'gyur//rgyal ba dag las rgyal bar 'du 'gyur ro//rgyal ba de yi zhing bkod 'di 'dra ste//'jig rten phan par mdzad
149b7(mdo sde): pa 'di bzhin no//rgyal ba'i byang chub mnyam med dri med pa//rab zhi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon por 'gyur//nga yi mkhyen pa de 'dra nam mkha'i
150a1(mdo sde): tshad//bskal pa 'byung ba mang po rab tu shes//'das pa los shes da ltar ci zhig sems//ye shes kun tu thogs pa med pa mnga'//
150a2(mdo sde): nga yi tshig ni dag cing brdzun med de//brdzun du mi smra don dam bden pa la//da granas nas ni nam yang mi smra'o//ji skad gsungs pa 'di la yid chesra gyis//
150a3(mdo sde): drang srong chen po'i gsung 'di thos gyur nas//'khor rnams kun kyang dga' ba'i sems gyur te//de tshe khams der skye bar shog cig ces//zhing mchog
150a4(mdo sde): der skyes dad pas smon lam btab//'jig rten khyams mchog der ni skye 'gyur te//'jig rten 'dren pas de dag lung bstan te//der ni khyed kyis byang
150a5(mdo sde): gshegs thob gyur nas//kun kyang sems can don mang byed par 'gyur//mdo sde rgyal po 'di bsten de yi tshe//sa chen 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos//
150a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' pad+mar gnas pa dag/de tshe thal sbyor thub la 'di skad gsol//khyod kyis chos tshul dram pa 'di gsungs pa//thub pa zla med rang
150a7(mdo sde): bzhin shin tu legs//chos kyi tshul rab dam pa mnyan pa dang //rgyal ba'i chos 'tshol bdag cag 'dir mchis lags//de nas thams cad dang
150b1(mdo sde): ldan pa'i 'khor de tshi ma zhing mgu ste/yi rangs la rab tu dga' ste/dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas gos re re bzhag ste/gos gzhan dag bcom ldan 'das
150b2(mdo sde): kyi sku lnga gsol nas tshig 'di skad kyang smras te/kye ma 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa byung bar gyur te/dang po ni grong khyer bAr na ser bskor to//
150b3(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis de ring 'dir bskor to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par tshos rin po che 'di dang mi
150b4(mdo sde): 'bral zhing skyes bu dam pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar shog cig ces smon lam btab bo//steng gi ber snang las kyang lha'i rnga chen po dag sgra mngon par 'byin par gyur to//
150b5(mdo sde): lha'i me togo ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po'i char chen po'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du mngon par babau par gyur to//steng
150b6(mdo sde): gi bAr snang la'ang lha rnams kyis lha'i gos dag g.yab mo thabs su bskor te/tshig 'di skad kyang brjed par gyur to//skyes bu dam pa gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
150b7(mdo sde): 'di 'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa de dag ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /'jam dpal
151a1(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin/
151a2(mdo sde): pa dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang /glegs bam du bgyis shing 'chang ba na bsod nams kyi phung po
151a3(mdo sde): ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam
151a4(mdo sde): dpal gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi skyong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dri na sems can gzugs can nama?/gzugs
151a5(mdo sde): can ma yin pa 'am/'du shes can nam/'du shes can ma yin pa ji snyed pa dang sems can gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis
151a6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la de dag
151a7(mdo sde): thams cad la rigs kyi bu 'amo/rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bskal par gnas pa'i tshe bde bo'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas/bla mar byas/
151b1(mdo sde): bsti stang du byas/mchod pa byas na/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams mang du skyed dam/gsol pa bcom
151b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang legs te/'di ltar bgrang ba 'am/brtsi bar yang sla ba ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
151b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal de bas kyang gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/klog gram/gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston tam/
151b4(mdo sde): glegs bam du bris te 'chang ngam/gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstan na/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lung 'bog pa de bsod nams mang du spyad do//
151b5(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs
151b6(mdo sde): praste 'jig rten thams cad la sman pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa dri mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring
151b7(mdo sde): ji srid cig tu dzam+bu'i gling ni mchis par 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpel nga mya ngan las 'das nas gang gi tshe rgyal
152a1(mdo sde): po brgyad kyis nga'i ring bsrel rgya cher bya ba'i phyir brgyad du bgos nas za ma tog brgyad du bcug ste/rang rang gi yul du mchod rten gyi
152a2(mdo sde): khyang pa yangs par 'jog par 'gyur te/rgyal po ma skyes dgra sau ni nga'i ring bsrel rnams las brgyad che blangs nas rin po che'i za ma tog tu bcug ste/rgyal
152a3(mdo sde): po'i khyab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyi rol du sa brkos nas ring bsrel la pog snod kha ga ba bcad nas spos kyis ni bdugs/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ni btsugs//
152a4(mdo sde): rin po che'i me tog ni gtor/lo brgyar byin gyis brlabs pa'i mar me mi lce gcig tu 'bar ba ni bus shing ring bsrel gyi za ma tog 'jog par 'gyur//
152a5(mdo sde): rgyal po mya ngan med pa 'byung bar 'gyur po bsdad pa'i phyir mdo'i rgyal po 'di gser gyi glegs bam la bris nas ring bsrel gyi za ma tog de nyid du 'jug
152a6(mdo sde): por 'gyur ro//'jam dpal 'di lta ste/rgyal po mya ngan med pa de ni mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na 'byung bar 'gyur te/de ni mo'u r+ya'i
152a7(mdo sde): rigs su skyes pa/dzam+bu'i gling la dbang ba/mthu dang brtson pa thob pa/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/de nga'i rnam pa las rjes su dran
152b1(mdo sde): par byed par 'gyur ro//nga'i bstan pa la yang dag pa thob par 'gyur ro//de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dbang po bde ba zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba/mthu che ba/dam pa'i chos yongs
152b2(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa/shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dzin pa/rgyal po'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/rgyal po mya ngan med pas bkur ba grong du 'jug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'jam
152b3(mdo sde): dpal de ltar rgyal po mya ngan med pa des nga'i ring bsrel rgya cher bya ba'i phyir skye bo mang pos yongs su bskor cing bkod pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu chen pos me tog phreng ba dang //
152b4(mdo sde): spos dang /phye ma dang /byug pa dang /sil snyan dang /pheg thogs tau rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por song nas mchod pa'i cho ga mngon par 'du bya ba chen po byas te
152b5(mdo sde): sa'i phyogs de nas ring bsrel gyi za ma tog de phyung nas/nyi ma bdun gyi bar du spos thams cad dang /me tog thams cad dang /me tog phreng thams cad dang /phye ma thams
152b6(mdo sde): cad dong /byug pa thams cad dang /sil snyan thams cad dang /pheg rdob pa dang /glu dbyangs thams cad kyis mchod pa rnam pa du ma byas te/skar ma dang /sbyor
152b7(mdo sde): ba dang ldan pa gcig la yul sna tshogs su chos kyi rgyal pos byas pa'i mchod rten brgyad khro bzhi stong byed par 'gyur ro//de'i chos smra ba dbang po bde bas chos kyi
153a1(mdo sde): /rnam grangs 'ang dang bskul gyi zam toganas byung nas byung phyogs kyi rgyud ky-i yul chen por 'jog par 'gyur to/skyo ba mang pos shes par mi 'gyu
153a2(mdo sde): skye bo mang pos rig par mi 'gyur/skye bo mang pos yongs su bzung bar mi 'gyur la chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzin pa nyung ba dang /klog pa nyung bar 'gyur te/'dzum
153a3(mdo sde): dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rtag tu sgrom du bcug pa dang snod du bcug par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos tshol ba med cing snod ma yin pa'i phyir
153a4(mdo sde): ro//'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri ni myos par dka' zhing yid ches par dka' la/rtogaso par dka' ba ste/mun sbrul du mngon par yid ches pa 'am/
153a5(mdo sde): 'jug par mi nus so//'jam dpal phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe snga brgya pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang la la ngag gis thos te/yid ches par gyur tam/tshol
153a6(mdo sde): lam rtog na de dag ni 'jam dpalo khyod kyiso sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/legs par spyod pa spyad pa/theg pa chen po 'di'i snod du gyur par nges
153a7(mdo sde): par rig par bya ste/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /'tshong ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa
153b1(mdo sde): dang /glegs bam du byas shing 'chang ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang bdag cag gis ni sngon de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gri bye ma snyed dag mthong bar gyur to//mnyes
153b2(mdo sde): par byas so//bsnyen bkur byas so zhes bya ba dang /de dag gis ni du'ang bskyed mos tshal 'di na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa dang /'khor 'dus pa 'di'ang
153b3(mdo sde): mthong ngo zhes de ltar shes par bya'o//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ljon pa kun dga' ba la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
153b4(mdo sde): long zhig/zung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/dbang po rnon po rnams me gtogs par gar bab bab kyi mdun du ma ston cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na kun dga'
153b5(mdo sde): bo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba yin pa dang /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang chen yin pa dang /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar med pa'i chos bstan
153b6(mdo sde): pa yin pa dang /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya yin pa dang /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba bsgom pa yin pa dang /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
153b7(mdo sde): gter gyi mchog yin pa'i phyir te/kun dga' bo de bos na nga'i bu thu bo chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/chos kyi mdzod srung ba de dag la sbyin par bya ba ma gtogs par 'di ni
154a1(mdo sde): shin tu sba bar bya zhing su la'ang sbyin par mi bya'o//kun dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lugs
154a2(mdo sde): na/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lcags/'dri ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de'i phyir
154a3(mdo sde): khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
154a4(mdo sde): gosang ba'i gnas zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir chad med pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul zhes bya ba dang /theg
154a5(mdo sde): pa gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya ba dang /'jam dpal gyis yongs su dris pa zhes bya ba dang /bden spu lung bstan pa zhes bya ba dang /bden smra'i lo'u zhes bya bar
154a6(mdo sde): yang zung zhig/chos kyi rnamo grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags khrag khrig phrag sum cu sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma skyes pa
154a7(mdo sde): las sems skyes par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' drug khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//sems can tshad med pa dag ni bla na me do pa yang
154b1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nus/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang 'jam dpal gzhon nu
154b2(mdo sde): gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dge sbyong dang /dge slong mA dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen
154b3(mdo sde): mi rnams dang /brgyu byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang sI te/

154b5(mdo sde): thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar mo dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes
154b6(mdo sde): sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtAn la phab po/rgya gar skad du/Ar+yA ta thA ga tA ma hA kA ru NA nIr de sha nA ma ma hA yAM na sU tra/bod skad du/
154b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po nges par bstan po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/bam po dang po//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems
155a1(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri sngon rgyal ba
155a2(mdo sde): bzhugs bzhugs pa'i mchod rten chen po dri bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs pa sna'i snying po//byang chub sems dpas mngon par bstod pa/
155a3(mdo sde): chos kyi gdan lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin gyis phyag byas pa'i sa phyogs/dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skul ba de bzhin
155a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'byung ba chos kyi sgo mngon par brjod pa/byang chub sems dpa' 'byung po/yon tan chad med pa las yang dag par snang ba/de bzhin
155a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i spyod yul na/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu
155a6(mdo sde): bskor/slob mo shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs ni mnga'/chos thams cad la mnga' dbang ni brnyes/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sgrub pa'i
155a7(mdo sde): ni legs par mkhyen/dbang po dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes/sems can thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba legs par 'joms pa
155b1(mdo sde): la ni mkhas//sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyun mi chad cing dge slong stong phrag drug cu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/thams
155b2(mdo sde): cad kyang cang shes pa/glang po chen paM/bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bor ba bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/
155b3(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad legs
155b4(mdo sde): par bcom pa/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/dmigs pa med pa'i chos kyis nges par byung ba/spyod lam mdzes
155b5(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa/sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
155b6(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa dang yang thabs cig ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa chags pa med pa'i spyod yul gyis nges par byung ba/
155b7(mdo sde): byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po'i chos kyi sprin las lhag mthong dang /rig pa dang /rnam por grol ba'i glog phyung zhing bdud rtsi'i chu'i rgyun gyi tshor 'bebs
156a1(mdo sde): pas 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa/sems can thams cad la semasas dang mnyam pa rjes su chags pa dang /khong khro ba dang bral ba/byang chub
156a2(mdo sde): kyi phyogs kyi chos sna tshogs kyi lo thog yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bas lhag pa'i shes rab kyi 'od zer rab tu gtong bsA gi trA~M mug
156a3(mdo sde): mun pa sel ba'i lam gyi snang ba thob pa kun tu ston pa dang /sems can gyi pad+ma kha 'byed pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa dang /sred pa'i chu skems pa
156a4(mdo sde): dang /shes pa'i las kyi mtha' la rab tu 'jog pa la mngon par shes pa chen po dang /zhi gnas kyis rgyu ba/zla ba lta bur 'gro ba thams cad la sems mnyam pas
156a5(mdo sde): mngon par zhi bar bya ba'i bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pas 'grib pa dang 'phel ba kun tu ston pa/ri rab lta bu'i lhag pa'i bsam pas tshangs pa'i
156a6(mdo sde): gnas pa'i rin po che shin tu brtan te/ngos bzhi nas yul gyi rlung thams cad kyis mi skul cing 'jig rten gyi chos las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
156a7(mdo sde): zhing thams cad kun tu bstan pa snang bar gyur pa/rgya mtsho chen po ltar gzungs dang dran pa'i snod rgya chen po chos kyi chus yongs su gang ba dang /byang chub sems
156b1(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa rin po ches 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba/ri dgas kyi rgyal po ltar bden pa'i rkang pa dang /byams pa rab tu 'phel ba'i mjug ma dang /zhi
156b2(mdo sde): gnas dong lhag mthong gi mig dang ldan zhing chos zab mo la skrag pa med pas pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms pa/bskal pa brgya stong phrag dpag tu med cing mtha'
156b3(mdo sde): yas thug pa med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun ma bcad pas yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs cig pa la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpya
156b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po kun nas snang zhing sgrib pa med par lci ba zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhing thams cad kyi rgyan bkod pa kun tu ston pa
156b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba'i spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'
156b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po spyod lam thams cad kyis 'dul ba mi 'khrugs pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa mtha'
156b7(mdo sde): yas pa'i tog gi rgyalo mtshan rnam par sprul pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser bzang po bsags pa'i 'od kyi gzi
157a1(mdo sde): brjid kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis rnam par nges pa'i chog la spobs pa zhes bya ba dang /
157a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsad nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pas brtan pas bsags pa zhes bya ba dang /de la sogs pa byang
157a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang thabs cig go//de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug
157a4(mdo sde): pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to//de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs

157a6(mdo sde): ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen nas 'di snyam du gang gi phyir ngas byang chub sems dpal
157a7(mdo sde): rgya tshor rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang /'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs po'i yul la gzud pa'i phyir
157b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshogs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib
157b2(mdo sde): pa med pa'i sgro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par bstan par bya'o snyam du dgongs so//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
157b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting
157b4(mdo sde): 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gi
157b5(mdo sde): bar snang la 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams kyi bar du 'khor gyi khyamaso/sangs rgyas kyi gnas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par
157b6(mdo sde): grub pa/byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa/sems can tshad med pa'i bsam pa tshim
157b7(mdo sde): par byed pa/lha'i gzhal med khang thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par skul ba/gzhi bai DUr+ya dkar po'i
158a1(mdo sde): dbyibs dang /dzam+bu'i gling gi gser gyi khang pa dag dang /dpal gyi snying po'i rta babs dag dang /rin po che rdo'i snying po'i sgo khang dag dang /nor bu
158a2(mdo sde): rin po che snying po'i kha khyer dag dang /rin po che dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi stegs bu dag dang /rin po che kun nas 'od kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag dang /rin po
158a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyis dgabo pa dang /mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu dpyangs pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan sbreng ba dang /lha'i dar gyi lda ldi mngon
158a4(mdo sde): par dbyangs pas bsngags pa bston pa dpag tu med cing thug pa med pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig byung ste/'khor gyi
158a5(mdo sde): khyams de'ang tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying pos bskus pa/tsan+dan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i dri yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/dri'i mchog A ga ru dam pa'i snying pos bdugs
158a6(mdo sde): bo/klu'i mu tig dang rin po che'i me tog gis rnam par smras pa/me tog sil ma bkram pa/rin po che'i shing dang /rin po che'i mkha' rten gyis mdzes par
158a7(mdo sde): byas pa ste/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na rgyan mdzes pa bkod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams de nyid na kun tu snang ngo //
158b1(mdo sde): de dgadan seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dpag tu med pa/grangs med pa/sna tshogs pa/blta na sdug pa/mtho ba/rab tu bzang ba/yangs pa/
158b2(mdo sde): rgyurgya che ba/yid du 'ong po/yid dga' bor byed pa dag byung bar gyur to//gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir thim skus kha khyer mi bdun gyi 'phyang tsam gyis bskor

158b4(mdo sde): can/tshangs pa'i ni tse 'am ci dang /rin po che ser pos smras pa rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba kun tu bskyod pas sgra 'byung ba/sa'i steng nas 'khor gyi khyams la
158b5(mdo sde): thug gi bar du gyen du mngon par 'phags pa/drang ba mu ya~M bA bzhi skyong byung bar gyur to//gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba bzhin du stong gsum
158b6(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang de lta bu'i them skus chen po dag byung bar gyur to//de nas
158b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs ma thag tu stong gsum
159a1(mdo sde): kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/snang ba chen po'ang byung bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems//
159a2(mdo sde): dpa'i tshogs dang thabs cig/nyan thos kyi tshogs dang thabs cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing nyan thos kyi chags kyis mdun du

159a4(mdo sde): pa'i tshar chen po ni 'thor/sil snyan dang /sgra dbyangs chen po ni rab tu sgrogs/'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa ni rab tu g.yo bar mdzad/'jig rte//
159a5(mdo sde): gyi/khams grangs med pa ni snang bar mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang /sangs

159a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri zo dang /lha ma yin dang /
159b1(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag du ma zhabs 'bring du 'byung zhing nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi them skas kyi dbus nas 'khor gyi khyams bkad pa
159b2(mdo sde): ga la ba der gshegs so//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das themaskas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan
159b3(mdo sde): 'das la mchod pa'i lus kyi phyir lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/nyi zla me dang nor bu'i 'od dang lha yul
159b4(mdo sde): pa yi lha 'od shin tu dri med po//thub pas 'od kyis thams cad zil gyis mnan nas ngan song gsum po dag kyang zhi bar mdzad//ri bo lhun po dang ni khor khor yug rtse mo bsgril te
159b5(mdo sde): zhing rnams gsal bar gyur pas na//dga' zhing yid rnams mgu nas don rnams thams cad grub pa'i rgyal ba la ni skyabs su mchi//de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
159b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'o zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
159b7(mdo sde): byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das tham skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i spos kyi smon
160a1(mdo sde): gyi char rab tu phab ste/thul mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/rdzu 'phrul dam pa brnyes shing rab tu mtshungs pa med pa rnam par
160a2(mdo sde): 'phrul pa shin tu ston//rgyal ba nyi ma ji bzhin 'phags te zhing rnams bye ba brgya dag tu yang rab tu gda'//rgyal bas rang gi yon tan kun gyis zhing rnams thams
160a3(mdo sde): cad brgyan te shin tu mdzes mdzad pa//gang zhig shin tu mnyam med mtshungs pa med cing rdzu 'phrul dbang du gyur la phyag 'tshal lo//de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
160a4(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo //dri nas lha'i rgyal po rab
160a5(mdo sde): 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i na
160a6(mdo sde): bza'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/bde gshegs khyod kyi mkhyen pa mtha' yas yangs pos sems
160a7(mdo sde): can bsam pa mkhyen//mkha' 'dra'i lom gyi chos gsum dag la chags med thams cad mkhyen pa nyid//sems kyi 'jug pa gcig gis 'gro ba'i sems
160b1(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa thams cad mkhyen//des na srid pa gsum po dag na lus can rnams kyis mchod par 'os//de nas 'thub bral gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad
160b2(mdo sde): pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to//de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la sogs pa dge' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis
160b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom
160b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa//gang gi slad du sgra dang yi ge ma mchis gang du'ang rgyu ba ma mchis pas//khyod kyis chos rnams mi g.yo ya ma R+Ya dang sgyu mo smig rgyu 'drar
160b5(mdo sde): mkhyen nas//bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes sems can rnams la ched du chos mchog gsungs pas na//chos kyi dngos po'i rang bzhin mkhas pa bdag med gsung ba'i
160b6(mdo sde): rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo//de nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dris mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
160b7(mdo sde): zhabs lo bring du 'brang ngo //de nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas/
161a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das lnga mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i rkyen gyi sprin gyi char rab tu pa bste/thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su bcad pa 'das/
161a2(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do//chos kyi zong gis rang gi stobs bcu mkha' 'dra 'od zer ldan pa dang //thugs rje brnyes nas byams pa'i dgongs pas sems can rnams la
161a3(mdo sde): gzugs ston pa//gru tshul chos la gnyis su med par zhugs kyang rgyal bu mtshungs par mkhyen//chos kyi khyad par sems lhag don kun grub pa'i rgyal la phyag
161a4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//de nas 'brel dga'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bskyed nas bcom ldan 'dis kyi zhabs 'byung du'othang
161a5(mdo sde): bar gyur to//de nas lha'i rgyul po dbyed sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skyes su zhugs pa dang 'bar gyi khyams
161a6(mdo sde): su mngon par phyogs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyi ro mu tig gi do shal gyi sprin gyi cher rab tu phab ste/zil mo sbyar nas bco mo ldan
161a7(mdo sde): 'das la tshigos su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//tshul khrims dri ma mi mnga' rnam dag rnam par nges pa dam pa ting nge 'dzin mchog mi g.yis
161b1(mdo sde): pa//mnyam med blo ldan rgya mtsho 'dra bar gnas shing srid las rnam grol dbang sgyur zhubs la phyug 'tshal lo//rim gyis bya mas dang ldan pa'i thugs rje yis ni bden pa'i
161b2(mdo sde): lam gyi rnam pa rab tu gnas mdzad pa//rnam thar gsum gyi lam gyi khyim na gnas pa'i bye de gshegs seng ge khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo//snying rje'i chu bo
161b3(mdo sde): tIng nge 'dzin gyis rnam 'phel ba//zhi gnas 'dab ma rnam par grol ba'i me tog rgyas//slob ma'i tshogs kyi bung pos nges par bsnyen gyur pa//bde gshegs pad+ma la ni
161b4(mdo sde): spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo//mnga' bdag g.yo ba ma mchis tshul khrims sar gnas pas//brtson 'grus mtshungs pa ma mchis skyabs kyis yang dag 'phags//yul
161b5(mdo sde): gyo rlung rnams langs pa chen pos mi g.yos pa//sangs rgyas ri bo dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//mnga' bdag thugs rjes dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa//
161b6(mdo sde): blo gtor blo mchog gis ni rab tu 'joms mdzad pa//sems can brgya dag gis ni mang pos mchod gyur pa//bde gshegs zla ba khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo//mkha'
161b7(mdo sde): ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa'i lam gshegs pa//shes rab 'od kyis phyogs bcu dag ni rgyas 'gengs shing //skye bo mang po mtshungs med pad+ma kha 'byed pa//sangs rgyas
162a1(mdo sde): nyi ma dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//mnga' bdag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gsum po dag nA yang //'dren pa khyod dang mnyam pa dmigs par
162a2(mdo sde): ma gyur te//khyod ni yon tan kun gyis yang dag grub pa lags//bdog cag khyod la bstod pas ngoms par 'gyur ma lags//lha dbang klu dang lha ma yin gyis
162a3(mdo sde): phyag bgyis po//lha mchog brgya dag gis kyang yang dag mngon bstod pa//bsngags pa brgya phrag mang pos yang dag mngon bstod pa//bde bar gshegs pa
162a4(mdo sde): bstod 'os khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod
162a5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo //de nas bcomo ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa tshad med pa lha 'bum gyis mngon
162a6(mdo sde): par bstod nas 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gshegs te/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir them skas
162a7(mdo sde): nas 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gshegs pa shes pa de bzhin du/stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
162b1(mdo sde): gyi khyams thams cad na'ang gshegs par shes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams stong gsum gyis yongs su gzung ba rin po che bkod par gdan seng ge'i
162b2(mdo sde): khri ji ltar bshams pa la bzhugs so//byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po dag kyang stan ci rig pa la 'khod par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe
162b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin
162b4(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs mo thag tu/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi spu'i
162b5(mdo sde): khung bu re re nas kyang 'od zer gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byung ste/byung nas kyang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so//de bzhin du lho dang /
162b6(mdo sde): nub dang /byang gi phyogs rnams dang /'og dang /steng dang /phyogs mtshamos rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so//'jig rten gyi
162b7(mdo sde): khams rnams snang bar byas ma thag tu/de nas sems can dmyalo ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyun chad do//
163a1(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor bya'ang rgyun chad do//sems
163a2(mdo sde): can thams cad kyang skad cig de la 'dod chags kyis gnod par ma gyur cing /zhe sdang gis ma yin gti mug gis ma yin te/nyon mongs pa gzhan gyis kyang
163a3(mdo sde): gnod par ma gyur to//de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /pha ma lta bu'i 'du shes su gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' yang dag
163a4(mdo sde): bar bskul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo //gang gis brtson 'grus stobs ni mtha' yas
163a5(mdo sde): yangs po brtan po brtsams gyur te//gang gis brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs kyis bskal pa dag las phyir phyogs sbyangs//gang gi yon tan dag ni phyogs
163a6(mdo sde): bcu rnams na methu ldan rab brjod pa//shAkya thub pa'i 'od yangs 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa mdzes//gang ches rgya chen bla med mnyan sred de yi zhabs
163a7(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal te//mkhas pa blo gros brtan pa dag ni bskal pa grangs med rtag tu nyin//blo rgyas gang zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dru pa'i bsam pa
163b1(mdo sde): tshim skyed pa//thub pa des ni gang phyir sems can bde bar bzhed pas 'od 'di phyung //mnga' bdag gang zhig brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud stobs mu stegs tshogs
163b2(mdo sde): bca so pha ma mdzad nas//pad+ma byung ba bzhin du 'phags shing phyogs bcu dag tu lhun po ji bzhin mdzes//gang zhig nyi ma bzhin du sku yi 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang mdzad pa//

163b4(mdo sde): 'khor lo dam pa stobs bcu sems can thugs brtse phyir ni de ring skor bar mdzad//srog chags rnams kyis bsten par rnyed dka' legs pa rgya chen de ring 'byung
163b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur//gang dag dad pa dang ba che yang sa don du gnyer ba de dag de ring ltos//de nas 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
163b6(mdo sde): gis go bar byas//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yo bar byas/sems can thams cad bde
163b7(mdo sde): bar byas//nyon mongs pa'i khams thams cad rnam par spangs/muni pa mun nag thams cad bsal//bdud kyi khyim thams cad mog mog por byas nas byang
164a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du slar 'ongs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar
164a2(mdo sde): gyur to//de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med rnam dag rin chen 'od byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i chos rgyun mi chad pa'i 'od zer bkod pa'i rgyalapo
164a3(mdo sde): po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i bsod nams bkod pas rgya che ba dang ldan pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal
164a4(mdo sde): kyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gda'i klung bcu'i bye ma snod kyis yongs su bskor zhing /

164a7(mdo sde): byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i nor bu bai DUr+ya'i dra ba'i char rab tu phab ste/bcom ldan 'das lo tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
164b1(mdo sde): gis mngon par bstod do//bcom ldan rab tu mtshungs myed yon tan pha rol phyin//khyed kyi yon tan bsdugs phreng phyogs bcu kun na brjod//khyod kyi yon tan
164b2(mdo sde): tshogs mchis zhing gang yon tanA gter//der ni chos don gnyer ba bdag tsog rab tu mchi//chos dbyings mnye mo nyid rnam rtag mya mchis ji bzhin du//bcom
164b3(mdo sde): ldan dri med 'od kyis mnyam pa nyid mkhyen kyang //shin tu bslabs pa'i sgyu ma mkhan ltar chos kyi rgyal//sems can rnam par dgrol slad tha dad bstan pa mdzad///

164b5(mdo sde): su gnas te/rang gi rdzu 'phral gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dug la 'khod do//de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin
164b6(mdo sde): chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa na/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag

165a5(mdo sde): dbang nugs tshal gel pa 'phel bar mdzad//bde gshegs shes rab 'od kyis gti mug mun bsal nus//ring nas srid mtshor gnyid log sems can sang

166a1(mdo sde): bsam rgyas mi khyub smras la//khyod kyi tshig ni rgyun chags gsal zhing mtshungs pa ste//'gro ba bsam dag bsam pa mnyam nyid yongs tshom
166a2(mdo sde): bgyid//sems kyi rgyu dang rnam rtog gling yang mi mnga' yung//sems can bsam pa rnams la rgyal ba dag gi 'byung //de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dgra

169a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa dri ma med par rab tu gnas pa na/byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' yas dri med ces bya ba 'od des

169a4(mdo sde): gyur nas/skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
169a5(mdo sde): 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la ldan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las
169a6(mdo sde): byed cing rtag tu sgra 'byung ba'i sil snyan gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
169a7(mdo sde): par bstod do//zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing rab tu zhil mos//khyod kyis chos kun stong zhing mtshan ma med par mkhyen//khyod kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa
169b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun ma 'tshal//mtha' yas blo mnga' sems kyi bsam pa cho ga mkhyen//sems can gcig gi spyod bzhin sems can kun gyi spyod//gang dag dus gsum
169b2(mdo sde): ldan pa de dag khyod kyis mkhyen//sems can 'du shes mi 'jug sems kyi 'du shes mun//'du shes yongs shes mkhas shing mnyam pa nyid dang ldan//de nas
169b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
169b4(mdo sde): logs su gnas te/rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do//de nas 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ut+pa
169b5(mdo sde): la dmar po'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang byed du snang bAn/byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od dris
169b6(mdo sde): bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar te/lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar
169b7(mdo sde): gyu nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
170a1(mdo sde): 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod/
170a2(mdo sde): pa'i las byed cing nor bu rin po che'i gling gi phreng gi dra bas bcom ldan 'das lo mngon par bkab ste/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
170a3(mdo sde): bstod do//galA te khrag khrig zhing na ji snyed rdul mchis pa//de snyed bde gshegs sras po rgyal ba'i drung lhags te//bskal pa bye ba stong mang zhu ba zhus pa dag/
170a4(mdo sde): de dag thams cad tshig gcig dus kyis go bar mdzad//blo la mkhas pa rab rdzogs shes rab shin tu rdzogs//gzungs dang ting 'dzin rab rdzogs bsod nams
170a5(mdo sde): mtha' yas te//bskal pa mang po mtha' yas bsngags pa rab brjod kyang //ske rtses rgya mtsho ji bzhin zad par mi nus so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis
170a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas 'og gi phyogs lcags su gnas te/rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis
170a7(mdo sde): sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do//de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra bsgrags mchog gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
170b1(mdo sde): rgyan gyis brgyan pa na/byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thug tu byang chub sems dpa' grang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma
170b2(mdo sde): snyed kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du badrar te/lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi
170b3(mdo sde): mjed 'dir phyin te/'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgro bos phyag btsal te/
170b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rgyan thams cad bkod pa dang /rin po che'i dril bu gr-i yer ka'i dra bas
170b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do//bde gshegs sku yi phrin las mtha'
170b6(mdo sde): dang dbu la ma mchis//bla med rnams kyi gsung thugs spyod yul mtha' yas pa//de ni sangs rgyas mkhyen gyi sems can gzhan gyis min//dper na nam mkha'i
170b7(mdo sde): mtha' ma skye bos mi rnyed bzhin//mtshungs med spyod pa mtha' dpung med pa ji bzhin du//byang chub 'khor lo de bzhin 'on te mya ngan 'das//sa bon ji bzhin
171a1(mdo sde): de ltar 'bras bu 'byung ba ltar//de bzhin phyogs brgyar rgyal ba'i gnas kyang tshwa ma mchis//de nas byang chub sems dang shA de dag gis byung chub
171a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas steng gi ber snang la dong ste/rong gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i
171a3(mdo sde): rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do//de ltar phyogs bcu dge nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu 'dus pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag 'od ngos bskul
171a4(mdo sde): ma thug tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam la 'jig rte gyi khams mi bajed 'dir phyin te/'khor gyi khyams don pa che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
171a5(mdo sde): 'khrod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang ldan/lding mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/gsung gsal ba'i sgra mdzad nas/gsung gsel
171a6(mdo sde): ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur te/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di n+da gang
171a7(mdo sde): dag dad pa dang ldan zhing snod du gyur pa'i dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen+d+ra dang /dge bsnyen ma dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag gis
171b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gsal ba'i sgra de thos nas lus dang /sems tshim par gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi mthus ji ltar byung ba'i them skas dag nas skad cig
171b2(mdo sde): thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par phyin te/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig
171b3(mdo sde): tu ji ltar mthun pa'i stan dag la 'khod do//gsung gsal ba'i sgra de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /tshangs
171b4(mdo sde): 'khor dang //tshangs chen dang /'od chen dang /'od chung dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dag dang /dge rgyas dang /
171b5(mdo sde): sprin myed dang /bsod nams skyes dang /'bras bu che ba dang /'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /gya nom snang dang /shin
171b6(mdo sde): tu mthong dang /'og min gyi lho rnams kyang bskul nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par phyin te/de dag gis bcom ldan
171b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas ston rab tu brten pa dag la 'khad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa chen po de mkhyen nas smin
172a1(mdo sde): mtshams kyi mdzod spu nus byang chub sems dpa'i stobs nye bar ston pa sa byAts+tsha'i 'od zer phyung spro/des thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub
172a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor b+h+yo byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu skyes ji nyid zo skye bor mi snang par gyur te//dr-i nas byang chub sems dpyi'i mye tog
172a3(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur pa 'od des reg ma thag tu/de'i tshe sang sA rgyus kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyun thams ci de
172a4(mdo sde): bkod pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so//byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying pos chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting
172a5(mdo sde): nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/de nas de'i tshe 'khor gyi khyams ri ru po tsha bkod pa'i dbus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
172a6(mdo sde): gdan song ge'i khri 'phang du shing ta la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu tsam du mtho ba/rin po che thams cad kyis smras pa/kha khyerare rgyan thams
172a7(mdo sde): cad las byas pa/ras bkod pa thams cad bting ba/me tig sil ma sna tshogs thams cad bkram pa/bla re yid du 'ong ba thams cad bres pa/khyang
172b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/'khor thams cad kyi mig gis bltas pa/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta bu bzhin du ston
172b2(mdo sde): pa/bsam pa tshim par byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas de bzhin gshegs
172b3(mdo sde): pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri chen po bskul bar bsngags pa mtha' yos zhes bya ba mngon par skul nas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/
172b4(mdo sde): gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsal pa/nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gro ba'i dgos pa rab tu
172b5(mdo sde): bgyid //lha dbang gzi brjid yon tan sum cu rtsa gsum dga'//tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rnam par mdzes//sangs rgyas mthu yi yul
172b6(mdo sde): gyis rnam par 'phrul pa 'di//chos rnams mi g.yonam mkha'i rang bzhin ya mA r+Ya//sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chu yi zla 'dra zhing //rje med byed pa po dang tshor ba po med
172b7(mdo sde): par//mkhyen nas mgon po 'dir ni rnam par sgrub pa ston//bkod pa'i sems kyi dbang pa'i gro sems ni gzugs can min//rnam sgrub thams cad sems kyi rang
173a1(mdo sde): bzhin dbang du 'gro//bkod pa thams cad 'dir ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'dra//rnam sgrub bdag gis ma mchis gang na'ang gnas ma mchis//gang
173a2(mdo sde): gis sems rgyun ma mchis rang bzhin dag 'tshal ba//de la glo bur gnas pa'i nyon mongs ma mchis so//rtog dang kun rtog yongs su rtog las sems grol ga/
173a3(mdo sde): de ni sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston//sa steng rdul tsam mngon par 'phags pa ma mchis kyang //sa steng nor bu rin chen sna tshogs kun tu bstan//
173a4(mdo sde): gdan gang bzhugs nas sems can bye ba 'dul 'gyur ba//khyod kyi seng ge'i khri gdan rab mdzes bdag gis bgyis//gdugs dang rgyal mtshan mchog
173a5(mdo sde): dang dar gyi phreng ba bsgreng //de ni gang du'ang 'gro ba ma mchis 'ong ma mchis//khyod kyis gang nas chos rnams 'du ba mkhyen nas kyang //sems can
173a6(mdo sde): dam pa rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs ston//tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan legs shing shin tu bsrungs pa'i gsung //'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa bsod nams
173a7(mdo sde): gzi brjid mang //bdag la thugs brtsa'i slad du 'dzegos te gdan la bzhugs//rga dang 'chi dang na ba gcod pa'i chos bshad gsol//khyod la bsnyen
173b1(mdo sde): bkur bgyi dang chos ni mnyan slad du//rnam dag sems can 'di rnams phyogs bcu dag nas lhags//gang gi don du lhags pa'i don de stsal du gsol//seng ge'i
173b2(mdo sde): khri la bzhugs te chos kyang bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i lhag
173b3(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa brnyes nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
173b4(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa dang /sangs rgyas
173b5(mdo sde): kyi chos zab mo thams cad dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa yongs su sgrub pa dang /ye shes kyi 'byung gnas chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i gzungs
173b6(mdo sde): kyi phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug pa/so so yang dag par rig pa la rnam par gtan la dbang pa la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes la
173b7(mdo sde): gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor la mi skye ba'i chos ston pa theg pa thams cad theg pa gcig tu mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba/chos
174a1(mdo sde): kyi dbyings tshul gcig cing ma 'dres pa la 'jug pa/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po la 'jug pa ston pa snying po dang ldan pa/
174a2(mdo sde): chos rnam par gdon mi za ba/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa/tshul bzhin gyi chos kyi tshul la gzhol bar 'jug pa//
174a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa/thub pa med par yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i
174a4(mdo sde): thabs dang ye shes ston pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/chags pa med pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi sgor 'jug pa/chos thams cad
174a5(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par nges pa ston pa/rtog pa med pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad
174a6(mdo sde): bsags pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa/sangs rgyas kyi sku dang /gsung dang /thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan
174a7(mdo sde): ba dran pa dang /blo gros dang /rtogs pa dang /mos pa dang /shes rab zad mi shes pa mngon par sgrub pa/nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i
174b1(mdo sde): bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang /ngag dang sems rab tu dben par shes pa/theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir
174b2(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sngar dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad brjod pa'i phyir chos thams cad la dbang sbyor ba'i
174b3(mdo sde): tshul la 'jug pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang /bsnyad pa dang /bshad pa dang bklag pa dang /gzung ba dang /rnam par
174b4(mdo sde): shes par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi bsgom pa yongs su bskang ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa yang dag par
174b5(mdo sde): bstan pa dang /'khor gyi the tshom thams cad bcad pa dang /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar bcad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bar
174b6(mdo sde): bar bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po yongs su thob par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gud na seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so///
174b7(mdo sde): bam po gnyis pa//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub se mos dpo'i rin chen sreg shing zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi rkyen bkad pa zhes bya ba'i ting ngo //
175a1(mdo sde): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlabs so//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub
175a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgra bsgrags stobs kyi rgyal pos pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lag pa rnams su me tog go lnga ldi dag
175a3(mdo sde): dang /me tog gi skoni bu rnams byin gyis brlabs te/me tog gi lnga ldi dang /me tog gi sgron bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la mngon
175a4(mdo sde): par 'thor ro//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i blo mchog rgya mtshos dri bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
175a5(mdo sde): gyi spu'i khung bu thams cad du tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri byin gyis brlabs so//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can gyis 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i
175a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la lus kyi 'od mtha' yas pa byin gyis brlabs so//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'
175a7(mdo sde): snying rje chen po sems pas mig mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs
175b1(mdo sde): shing mig mi 'dzums par byin gyis brlabs so//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' yas dri med kyis chos la mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
175b2(mdo sde): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chos don du gnyer zhing chos la dga' ba dang mos par byin gyis brlabs so//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang
175b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pas rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel
175b4(mdo sde): bar byin gyis brlabs so//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos brjod pa med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
175b5(mdo sde): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor byang chub kyi sems dran zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa mi brjed par byin gyis brlabs so///
175b6(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas snang ba zhes bya bas zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
175b7(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bdud dang /phyir rgol ba bcom par byin gyis brlabs so//de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems
176a1(mdo sde): dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/byang //
176a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i bdud rab tu 'joms pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/de nas de'i tshe
176a3(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcus/g.yog 'khor dang bcas te myur ba myur
176a4(mdo sde): bar ring thabs su rang rang gi bdud kyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas de dag
176a5(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyug btsal te/lha'i mchod pa rnam pa brgya stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas gus pa dang bcas
176a6(mdo sde): shing zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab nas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba 'tshul na be com ldan 'das
176a7(mdo sde): chos bshad du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol/byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis bdag cag
176b1(mdo sde): bdud kyi sug las 'dor zhing sran chud sems can rnams la mig gis mi tshol bar 'gyur ba'i las mi bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la dbugs dbyung ba stsol
176b2(mdo sde): cig dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te/bdag cag chos nyan par bgyid do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud de dag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir 'di ska
176b3(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to//grogs po dag legs so legs so//gang gi phyir khyed bdud kyi las kyang 'or la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga chos bshad paru gsol ba'ang thob
176b4(mdo sde): shig dang /de nyid khyed kyi bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir/
176b5(mdo sde): ro//grogs po dag 'di lta ste/dper na mun pa mun nag lho du mar bro sogs pa ni mAr me gcig gis med par 'gyur ro//grogs po dag de bzhin du nyon mongs po'i
176b6(mdo sde): munu pa mun nag bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'ang ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro//grogs po dag 'di lta ste/dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
176b7(mdo sde): gcig dang /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang /nor bu rin po che chen po gcig gis mun pa mun nag thams cad sel to grogs po dag de bzhin du dge ba'i sems
177a1(mdo sde): lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig gis mi shes pa'i mun pa rdzun nAka thams cadasal to//grogs po da /de'i phyir khyed dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ra
177a2(mdo sde): gyis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal nas chos kyi snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal
177a3(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba 'khor du nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bac+doM mi ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul de bzhin
177a4(mdo sde): gshegs pas byin gyis bai rlabs pa dang /kun tu bstan pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo//deng ni de bzhin gshegase pa byang chub semos dpa'i spyod pa la
177a5(mdo sde): 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhod par the tshom ma mchis so//
177a6(mdo sde): 'i skad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das e ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni tshe ste/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam
177a7(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/mngon por shes pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par rol pa/phyogs bcur sgra bgrags pa sems shin tu bya ba
177b1(mdo sde): bgyis te drim pa mchis pa rig pa dang /rnam par sgrol byas snang bar gyur pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstang skyong bsngags pa/chos thams cad la dbang phyug gis//
177b2(mdo sde): dbyang sbyar ba/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa thabs mkhas pa thams cad las nges par skyes kyi/bdud kyi las ngag /rtsod pa dang /nyan
177b3(mdo sde): mongs po thams cad bsnol bya/phas kyi rgol ba dang /dran pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul ba cig thams cad rab tu da ba bstan pa shes byal
177b4(mdo sde): mkhas pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags bla ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu sonA pa/dran pa dang /blo gras dang /rtogs pa dang /khrel yod pa dang /
177b5(mdo sde): pa dang /gzungs dang /ye shes rab tu thob pa byin gyi brlabs thogs pa ma mchis shing spobs pa chun mi chud pa/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog
177b6(mdo sde): dang /mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa/sems can thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos sbyin pa/'khrul pa ma mchis par kha na ma tho ba ma
177b7(mdo sde): mchis pa'i chos ston pa/sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang /skad la mkhas pa/me 'am rtse dang byi ka la bid dang /khrung khrung gi sgra dang /tshangs pa'i sgra
178a1(mdo sde): dbyangs can/shin tu bshes gnyen bgyis pas sems can thams cad yongs su mya dran las 'das pa la 'gyod pa byams pa chen po dang /
178a2(mdo sde): snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni/brtan zhing shin tu gnas la mi g.yo zhing ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa/chos kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par
178a3(mdo sde): bsgreng blar bgyid pa/rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi shigs pa'i khar yug lta bu smon pa ma mchis pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo blta
178a4(mdo sde): dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba la zhugs pa/chad pa dang /rtag pa'i mtha' gnyi ga dang /lci bar gyur pa thams cad dang /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba
178a5(mdo sde): yang dag par bcad pa tshogs can chen po'i tshogs kyi rgyal po yongs su 'gugs pa/ded dpon chen po bskal pa grangs med par chos dkon mchog gis bsod nams
178a6(mdo sde): yang dag par bsgrubs pa/sman pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzugs can mA legs pa'i rlud gso bar bgyid pa/seng ge'i
178a7(mdo sde): sgra chen po sgog pa/snrel zhi'i rgyud dang /spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la mi skrag pa/mtshan dang dpe byad
178b1(mdo sde): bzang pos lus legs par brtan pa/gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin bgyid pa thams cad la sems dpa'/bdud bzhi dang /nyon mongs pa'i g.yul 'dul ba/mnyan pa lta
178b2(mdo sde): bur gyur pa/dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa/shin
178b3(mdo sde): tu yongs su sbyang ba bgyis pa/sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol ba la brtson pa/ri lta bur gyur pa/'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang /ma rnyed pa dang /grags
178b4(mdo sde): pa dang /ma grogs pa dang /smad pa dang /bskyod pa dang /bde ba dang /sdug bsngal las log pa/dga' ba dang /dang ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba'i chos la
178b5(mdo sde): sems zhugs pa/chos dko ni mchog gi 'od zer dang ldan pa/shes rab kyis ngoms nas ngoms par bgyid p+ta/pad+ma lta bu 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos
178b6(mdo sde): pa/'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/zla ba dang /nyi ma dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa'i 'od myog mog por bigyid pa/rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob
178b7(mdo sde): pa/chos dkon mchog thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod pU/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang //
179a1(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i cho ga 'tshal ba/sangs rgyas kyi chos dkon mchog thams cad kyi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang yang
179a2(mdo sde): dag par ldan pa bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa bsags pa/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa//
179a3(mdo sde): phyi ma'i mthe'i mu'i bskal par bsngags pa mthar mi phyin pa 'di lta bu rnams kyi 'dus pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan
179a4(mdo sde): 'dus ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par
179a5(mdo sde): bzhed pa snyam bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba/sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba/
179a6(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skyed pa//sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa
179a7(mdo sde): yongs su sbyong ba/spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul gcig la 'jug pa/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs
