179b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos la dbang bskur ba/skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba/nges pa'i sems can rnams la rkyen nye bar
179b2(mdo sde): sgrub pa/ma nges pa'i sems can rnags la snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa/log pa nyid du nges po'i sems can rnams 'dzud pa/theg pa gsum la mos pa'i sems can
179b3(mdo sde): rnams la rnam par dgod pa ston pa ste ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan lags
179b4(mdo sde): so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
179b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'khor gyi khyams 'dir sems bskyed pa gcig gis bkod pa gang byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang
179b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa brgya phrag stong du'ang ston pa'i rngo mi thog go/bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/e ma ji tsam du gang rdzu 'phrul
179b7(mdo sde): gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong yang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la re ba skyed pa'i sems can shes rab 'chal pa can
180a1(mdo sde): de dag ni ngo mtshar che ba snyam bgyid do//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis nyan thos dang /
180a2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper na shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mo la la zhig nor bu rin po che ba
180a3(mdo sde): DUr+ya bor nas nor bu mching bu la dmigs pa snyam du sems pa dang /bcom ldan 'das gang dag theg pa chen po bor nas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
180a4(mdo sde): po la dmigs par bgyi ba snyam du sems pa'i sems can dag ni 'dra ba nyid du bdag la gda'o//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang dag lhag pa'i bsam
180a5(mdo sde): pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /skyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni ring por mi thogs par chos 'di lta bu
180a6(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'khor de las
180a7(mdo sde): srog tshegs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//rgyan po kod pa zhes bya ba
180b1(mdo sde): 'dus pa'i le'u'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po de gzigs nas e ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni/
180b2(mdo sde): chos don du gnyer ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba/sgrib pa med pa'i
180b3(mdo sde): sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu bshad pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pas spobs pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer skyes bu chen po'i mtshan spyi gtsug nas byung ngo //bcom ldan
180b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi 'od zer de phyed ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs lnga lan bdun bskor ba byas te/byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi
180b5(mdo sde): dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i lus la ldan brgyar bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i skye gtsug du mi snang bar gyur to//'od nges
180b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po lnga re go ma thag tu de nas spangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos
180b7(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'od dang /seng ge'i khri dang /lus brgya 'gyur du zil gyis mnan nas lam me/lhang ngo /lhan ne'o//
181a1(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs rig nas stan las langs te/bla
181a2(mdo sde): gos phrag pa gcig le glo zar nas pras mo g.yas pa'i lha du sA li btsu gos te/bcom ldan 'das glal po de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan
181a3(mdo sde): 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gri bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyun ces bya ba yu ba ni b+he T+TA/g.yogs ma ni gser/
181a4(mdo sde): snying po ni rin po che ni co 'am ci/rtsibs ni An+d+ra rI lI las byas pa/mu tig gi do shal rab tu dbyangs po/dar g+ho lnga ldis mdzes par byas pa/dril bu g.yer
181a5(mdo sde): kwa'i dra ba 'khrol ba/byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis bzung ba/rgyur stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khrims kyi tshad tsamo zhig byin gyis brlabs
181a6(mdo sde): so//de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i gdugs de lta bu byin gyis brlabs nas me togra gi char yang phye ba ste/skyil spyan dang /sgra
181a7(mdo sde): dbyangs rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sgra 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod de//kun
181b1(mdo sde): tu snang ba kun nas 'od zer can//don rnams ma lus ston pa kun nas spyan//rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas//bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan kun dang ldan//
181b2(mdo sde): skyes bu khyu mchog gis ni 'od zer byung //zhal yang rnam par sbyong zhing 'od mdzad pa//'dren pa de ni bdag gi lus la yang //lan borgyar basbyor ba bgyis nas spyi
181b3(mdo sde): bor zhi//mi yi 'dren pa'i 'od kyis reg pa snga na//gang dag bdog gis sngon thob dran pa dang //blo gros spobs pa snang ba de bzhin gzungs//rnam pa stong du khyad par 'phags/
181b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur//bdag lus rab sim sems ni rnam par dag/bdag gi blo gros dga' mgu mnyam par gyur//gzhan yang sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas dang //
181b5(mdo sde): spobs pa bdag gi lus la rab tu zhugs//sangs rgyas mthu chen bsnyen par dka' ba la//nyams chung dag gis mnyes par bgyid mi nus//sangs rgyas gnang
181b6(mdo sde): nas 'gro kun phan slad du//sangs rgyas la ni zhu ba zhu bar 'tshal//rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 'jug dang //'jig rten rnam 'dren dag gi 'byung ba
181b7(mdo sde): dang //snang dang nges 'byung rnam par sprul pa dang //dbang bskur ye shes yongs su zhu bar 'tshal//thag mchog dam pa rtogs par khong chud cing //mtha' yas
182a1(mdo sde): rgya che ba mi 'khor lcags dang //gang dag rgya chen chos don gnyer ba dag/de dag n+d+ha sma sangs rgyas la yang zhu//bdud kyi dkyil 'khor
182a2(mdo sde): shin du tshar bcad cing //sangs rgyas bsten pa 'di ni shin tu gzung //bcom ldan phung po mi mchis de mchos mdzod//lus can rnams la bshud pa'i dus
182a3(mdo sde): 'di legs//skyes bu khyu mchog mkhyen pa mtha' yas pas//bcom ldan de la bdag gi blo mi chug/bde gshegs mkhyen pa shes pas mi dpogs pas//
182a4(mdo sde): mkhas pa yangs pa bdag ni zhu bar 'dz+wal//ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen 'jug dang //ji ltar yun ring nas ni bslabs pa dang //chos kyi dbang
182a5(mdo sde): phyag rgyal po rab brlabs pa//'dren pa rnams kyi spyod yul bshad du gsol//de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i tshogs su
182a6(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon por bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
182a7(mdo sde): ba'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ni tsha de ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ni yongs su
182b1(mdo sde): mo skyo bar chos ston pa lags par rig cing de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i thugs rje chen po la gnas par mthong nas don 'di zhu bar 'tshal lo//
182b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyun dag ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rgyan gang dag gis brnyan ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
182b3(mdo sde): pa spyod pa na mdzes pa lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ches kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas gti mug gi min pa dang bral zhing the tshom ma
182b4(mdo sde): mchis pa dang /chos kyi sgo chen po shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi mi gtong ba'i snying /
182b5(mdo sde): rje chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas pa mchog dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong por gnas pa rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang
182b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dag byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa la zhugs pa dang /legs par bgyid pa'i las bgyid pa dang /las kyi mtha' gdung ba ma mchis pa
182b7(mdo sde): rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom zhing the tshom dang bral nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug
183a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i yul la mngon du 'phags par 'gyur ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la 'jug par 'gyur
183a2(mdo sde): ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dag yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang /bdud kyi dkyil
183a3(mdo sde): 'khor tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur pa dang /myur du chos thams cad la dbang ba thob par 'gyur
183a4(mdo sde): bar de bzhin gshegs pas blo shin tu rnam par nges pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas mngon par 'phags pa'i chos kyi sgo de legs par bshad
183a5(mdo sde): du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyag gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
183a6(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so//legs so//khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa la zlum par nges pa tho ba nas khyod blo rnam par nges pa 'di
183a7(mdo sde): lto bus de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dro bar sems pa ni skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so//de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la
183b1(mdo sde): zung zhig dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yon tan 'di dag dang /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan chad med pa gzhan dag kyang yongs su rdzogs
183b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang /myur du chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do//byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos
183b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu byang chub
183b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshul khrims kyi rgyan dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan dang /shes rab kyi rgyan dang /
183b5(mdo sde): gzungs kyi rgyan te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag go//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims
183b6(mdo sde): kyi rgyan gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gcig ste/gcig grang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams cad la gnod/
183b7(mdo sde): pa mi byed pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang ba'i sems med pa ni sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba ste/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems
184a1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan gcig go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag skye/
184a2(mdo sde): gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ngan 'gro'i sgo gcod pa dang /bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa ste gnyis po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul
184a3(mdo sde): khrims kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dge ste/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lus rnam par drag pa dang /ngag rnam par dag pa dang /yid rnam par dag pa ste/
184a4(mdo sde): gsum po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gang 'dod pa de
184a5(mdo sde): 'byor pa dang /gang smon pa de yang dag par grub pa dang /gang 'dod pa de thob pa dang /gang rtsom pa de nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ste/bzhi po 'di dag go//rigs
184a6(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgyu med pa
184a7(mdo sde): yin/shes rab sgyu med pa yin/rnam par grol ba skyo med pa yin/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba sgyu med pa yin/yongs su mya ngan las 'odas pa
184b1(mdo sde): chen po bla na med pa sgyu med pa yin te lnga po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/drug gang zhe na/'di
184b2(mdo sde): lta ste/yid la chags pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang /
184b3(mdo sde): 'dren ma ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir 'dres pa mi yin pa'i tshul khrims dang dge ba'i chos shin tu rnam par 'phel ba'i phyir/sra sre ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang /
184b4(mdo sde): gang gis 'dod par 'gro ba'i tshul khrims kyi phyir rang dga'i tshul khrims dang /gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i shes pas rang gi dbang sbyar ba'i tshul khrims te drug po
184b5(mdo sde): 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/bdun gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i
184b6(mdo sde): sbyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /bzod pa rnam par dag pa dang /brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa dang /bsam gtan rnam par dag pa dang /shes rab rnam par dag pa dang /
184b7(mdo sde): thobs rnam par dag pa dang /bag yod pa rnam par dag pa ste/bdun po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni brgyad po
185a1(mdo sde): 'di dag ste/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /su phun sum tshogs pa dang /rnam par 'phro ba med pa pun
185a2(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa dang /lhod pa med pa phun sum tshigs pa dang /'khon du 'dzin pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa
185a3(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa dang /ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu bar byed pa phun sum tshogs pa ste brgyad po 'di dag go//rigs
185a4(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/dgu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'jigs pa med pa yin/skrag pa med pa yin//
185a5(mdo sde): bsdam pa nges pa yin/nye bar zhi ba yin/bsil ba yin/bcings pa lhod pa yin/sems las su rung ba yin/sems cad shes pa yin/dul
185a6(mdo sde): ba'i sa rjes su thob pa yin te/dgu po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/bcu gang zhe na/
185a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir lus kyi rgyan dang /ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa'i phyir ngag gi rgyan dang /nyon mongs
185b1(mdo sde): pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi rgyan dang /smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir zhing gi rgyan dang /bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rkyen
185b2(mdo sde): dang /sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa'i phyir skye ba'i rgyun dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa la rjes su slob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyun dang /nga rgyal
185b3(mdo sde): med pa'i phyir shes pa'i rgyan dang /dge ba'i rna ba yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyun dang /tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba la gnas pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir stobs dang //
185b4(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rgyan te/rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan no//rigs kyi bu de la
185b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gcig ste/gcig gang zhe na/'di
185b6(mdo sde): lta ste/sems can thams cad la byams pa ste 'di ni gcig go//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/gnyis
185b7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/drang ba dang /mnyen pa ste gnyis po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/
186a1(mdo sde): gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sgyu med pa dang /g.yo med pa dang /bcos ma med pa ste gsum po 'di dag go//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
186a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdun pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro
186a3(mdo sde): ba dang /gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang /'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste bzhi po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i
186a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sgrib pa lnga spong ba ste/lnga po de dag gang zhe na/'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /
186a5(mdo sde): gnod sems dang /rmugs pa dang gnyid dang /rgod pa dang /'gyod pa dang /the tshom ste/sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag spong ba'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
186a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun
186a7(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa dang /btong ba rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa ste drug po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
186b1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/bdun gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom pa ste/dran
186b2(mdo sde): pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /chos rab tu 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /dga' ba yang dag
186b3(mdo sde): byang chub kyi yan lag dang /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /btang snyoms yang dag byang
186b4(mdo sde): chub kyi yan lag ste/bdun po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
186b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa ste/'di ltar yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngag dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi
186b6(mdo sde): mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te brgyad po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu
186b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/dgu gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjed pa med pa'i sems kyis
187a1(mdo sde): snying rje chen po'i gnas la gnas te/sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas nas 'dod pa dag las dben pa/sdig pa mi dge ba'i
187a2(mdo sde): chos rnams las dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan drang po rdzogs par byas
187a3(mdo sde): te gnas so//de rtog pa dang /dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes
187a4(mdo sde): ba'i dga' ba dang badre ba can bas mo gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing
187a5(mdo sde): dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de ngan pa dang ldan pa/bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes
187a6(mdo sde): brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de bde ba'ang sbyangs te/snga nas sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing yid
187a7(mdo sde): bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas bde ba'ang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa/btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi
187b1(mdo sde): bya rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna
187b2(mdo sde): tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha'i mtha' yas so//snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de rnam pa thams
187b3(mdo sde): cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas
187b4(mdo sde): so//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci'ang med do snyam nas ci'ang med pa'i skye mchod rdzogs par byas tog nas so//
187b5(mdo sde): de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de rnam pa thams
187b6(mdo sde): cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med mon skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang
187b7(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha'i mngon sum du'ang mi byed la sngon gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis yang dag par gnas/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par
188a1(mdo sde): byed pa ste/ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun ni bcu po 'di dag ste/bcu
188a2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi 'khrugs pas nges par sems pa dang /zhi gnas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /mngon par brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang /nang du yang
188a3(mdo sde): dag 'jog sbed pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba dang /sems dben pa dang /lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang /chos rnams la sems shing 'jal la so sor rtog
188a4(mdo sde): pa dang /sems la dbang sgyur ba dang /'phags pa'i rigs thob pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go/rigs kyi
188a5(mdo sde): bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyun gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyun ni gcig ste/gcig gang zhe na/'di
188a6(mdo sde): lta ste/chos thams cad le the tshom med pa ste/'di ni gcig go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi brgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/gnyis
188a7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'gyod pa dang bral ba dang /kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba ste/gnyis po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni
188b1(mdo sde): gsum po 'di dag ste/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gti mug spong ba dang /ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs nges par gcog pa dang /mun pa mun nag sel ba ste/gsum po 'di dag go/
188b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba'i shes pa dang /kun
188b3(mdo sde): 'byung ba spang ba'i snang ba dang /'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon gsal dang lam bsgom pa'i byin gyis brlabs te/bzhi po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
188b4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dmigs pa med pas tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang /shes rab mchog
188b5(mdo sde): gis bsam gtan pa yin pas ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang /gnyis dang bral bas rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa dang /dus gsum mnyam
188b6(mdo sde): pa nyid pas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid pas chos kyi phung po yongs su dag pa ste/lnga
188b7(mdo sde): po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'khor gsum yongs su dag
189a1(mdo sde): ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas bdag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang /rmi lam dang mnyam pa nyid pas sems can gyi
189a2(mdo sde): 'khor yongs su dag po dang /rnam par smin pa la rlo ba med pas byang chub kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o//'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
189a3(mdo sde): phyin pa ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir lus kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang /brag ca lta bu'i shes pas dag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang /sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid
189a4(mdo sde): byas sems kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o//'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyes par smras pa'i tshig rnams la khong khro ba spong ba
189a5(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa dang /bstod pa dang bsngags pa dang /rjes su chags pa sbyong ba yongs su dag pa dang /yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa dag la chos kyi sku la
189a6(mdo sde): rab tu rtog pa yongs su dag pa'o//'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur mos pas yongs su mi skyo
189a7(mdo sde): ba yongs su dag pa dang /rdo rje lte bu'i bsam pas bstan pa yongs su dag pa dang /mtshan ma thams cad las sgrol bas blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa yongs
189b1(mdo sde): su dag pa'o//'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'gyur bar shes pas de la ma chags pa yongs su dag pa dang /mngon par zhen
189b2(mdo sde): pa med pas lhag mthong yongs su dag pa dang /mngon par shes paskyed pas dmigs pa yongs su dgu pa'o//'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i thabs kyi pha rol tu
189b3(mdo sde): phyin pa ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pas bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su dag pa dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas gzungs yongs su drag pa dang /sangs
189b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan gyi phyir smon lam yongs su dag po ste/drug po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyun ni bdun po 'di dag ste/
189b5(mdo sde): bdun gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams la skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa
189b6(mdo sde): med par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis lus dang sems dben pa dang /dbang po rnams la dbang po yongs su shes pa dang /stobs rnams kyis bdud
189b7(mdo sde): dang nyon mongs pa thams cad tshir gcod pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ches thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang /lam rnams la 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro/
190a1(mdo sde): pa med par shes pa ste bdun po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyun ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/brgyud gang
190a2(mdo sde): zhe na/'di lta ste/shin tu zhi ba'i phyir zhi gnas shes pa dang /rab rib dang bral ba'i phyir lhag mthong shes pa dang /chos kyi phung po rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir phung po
190a3(mdo sde): shes pa dang /nam mkha' khams dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir khyams shes pa dang /grong stong dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye mched shes pa dang /bdag med pa'i
190a4(mdo sde): phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa dang /mi khrugs pa'i phyir bden pa shes pa dang /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi ni rab tu rtogs pus chos thams cad nges par
190a5(mdo sde): rtogs pa shes pa ste/brgyad po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyun ni dgu po 'di dag ste/dgu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
190a6(mdo sde): sngon gyi mtha' dag pas 'das pa shes pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dag pas ma 'ongs pa shes pa dang /bar gyi mtha' dag pas de ltar byung ba shes pa dang /rgyu chung
190a7(mdo sde): mi za bas nges pa rnams shes pa dang /rkyen nye bar bsgrub pas ma nges pa rnams shes pa dang /yongs su smin par byed pas log pa nyid du nges pa rnams shes pa
190b1(mdo sde): dang /chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid
190b2(mdo sde): du shes pa dang /'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir 'phags pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/dgu po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
190b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rnam par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang /yongs su rtog pa'i
190b4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyi phyir rmi lam lta bur shes pa dang /rnam par 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir smig rgyu lta bur shes pa dang /'pho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir gzugs brnyan/
190b5(mdo sde): lta bur shes pa dang /'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir mig yor lta bur shes pa dang /rkyen gyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir brag ca lta bur shes pa dang /chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa
190b6(mdo sde): med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang /de bzhin nyid gnas med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang /
190b7(mdo sde): 'dus byas dag 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan na bcu po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu de la byang
191a1(mdo sde): chub ses dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyun ni gang na/rigs kyi bu byang chub senas da zla rnams kyi gzungs kyi nan gdag ga ga na/
191a2(mdo sde): na/'di lta ste/dran pa brjod pa med pa ste/'di ni gcig go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rkyen ni gonyas pa 'di dgra ste/gnyis ga
191a3(mdo sde): zhe na/'di lta ste/kun tu 'dzin pa dang /'dzin pa ste/gnyis po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpe' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di
191a4(mdo sde): drag ste/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/don la mkhas pa dang /tshig 'bru la mkhas pa dang /nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa ste/gsum po 'di dag go/rigs
191a5(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chags pa med pa'i tshig dang /rtsab pa ma yin pa'i
191a6(mdo sde): tshig dang /rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang /brdzun pa med pa'i tshig ste/bzhi po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rkyen ni lnga po 'di
191a7(mdo sde): dag ste/lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/thos pa thams cad kyi nang nas don la rton pa dang /yi ge'i tshigs thams cad kyi nang nas ye shes la rton pa dang /mdo sde
191b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nang nas nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa dang /gang zag gi sgra thams cad las chos nyid la rton pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las 'jig rten las 'das
191b2(mdo sde): pa la rton pa ste/lnga pa 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ji skad smras pa
191b3(mdo sde): de bzhin du byed pa dang /bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshig rab tu thob pa dang /nga rgyal med pas gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang /g.yo med pas blang bar 'os pa'i tshig
191b4(mdo sde): dang /snying rje chen po la sbyor bas 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa dang /snod la mkhas pas phyed par chos ston pa dang /'jig rten shes pas dus su chos ston pa ste/drug pa
191b5(mdo sde): 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyun ni bdun po 'di dag ste/bdun grang zhe na/'di lta ste/mgyogs pa'i spobs pa dang /shugs
191b6(mdo sde): can gyi spobs pa dang /myur ba'i spobs pa dang /chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /shin tu
191b7(mdo sde): nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa ste/bdun po 'di dag go//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni brgya po 'di dag ste/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta
192a1(mdo sde): ste/lha'i skad sha pa dang /lU skad shis po dang /gnod sbyin gyi skad shes pa dang /dri za'i skad shes pa dang /lha ma yin gyi skad shes pa dang //
192a2(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding gi skad shes pa dang /mi 'am ci'i skad shes pa dang /lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa nas sems can thams cad kyi bar gyi skad shes pa ste/brgyad po
192a3(mdo sde): 'o'adi dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/dgu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'khor gyi nang du spa gong ba med pa dang //
192a4(mdo sde): smra ba'i nang du zhum pa med pa dang chos bshad pa'i nang du 'jigs pa med pa dang /'dri ba rnams la nges par 'byung ba shes pa dang /mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams la
192a5(mdo sde): snrel zhi bstan pa shes pa dang /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rjes su mthun pa bstan pa shes pa dang /khengs pa dag la lag na rdo rje ston pa dang /mngon par chags
192a6(mdo sde): pa rnams la sreg pa'i bskal pa ston pa dang /yongs su smin pa rnams la theg pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa ste/dgu po 'di dag go rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
192a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dogs pa thams cad la the tshom med par ston pa shes pa dang /blos chos/skye
192b1(mdo sde): ba'i sgo dang /shes rab kyi snang ba gzhan la lhag ma ma lus pa dang /yi ge bstan pa mi zad pa dang /don bstan pa rgyun chad pa med pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa mtha' yas
192b2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rab tu brjod pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skyon mu med par brjod pa dang /rnam par byang ba'i bsgrags pa tshad med pa ston pa dang /dbang po thams cad la
192b3(mdo sde): gzhol bar 'jug pa tshugs pa med pa dang /sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
192b4(mdo sde): gzungs kyi rgyan na bcu po 'di dag go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//gang gis theg mchog
192b5(mdo sde): dam pa 'di mdzes pa//blo gros chen po rnams kyi rgyan bzhi ste//tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab mchog/shin tu rnam des don dang de bzhin gzungs//de ni
192b6(mdo sde): lus can kun gyi yid 'ong dgu'o//lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid drag cing //de yi rnam par ltung ba kun chad pa//'di ni tshul khrims ldan pa'i rgyan yin no//lha mi
192b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du mkhas pa skye//de yi smon lam ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'grub//nan tan snying por byed dang yang dag ldan//'di ni tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan yin
193a1(mdo sde): no//dA yi tid 'dzin sgyum mA yin te//shes rab rnam gro snang bzhin po sa mthong //de yi mya dran 'das pa sgyum min//'di ni tshul khrims rnam
193a2(mdo sde): par dag pa'i rgyan//tshul khrims skyon med tshul khrims rnam par dag/tshul khrims sra su ma yin 'dren ma med//de yi rang dga' de bzhin rang dbang yin//'di ni gang
193a3(mdo sde): dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan//tshul khrims kyis ni sbyin pa dag par 'gyur//bzod pa dag cing de bzhin brtson 'grus dag/bsnam gtan dag cing de
193a4(mdo sde): bzhin shes rab dag/thabs dang de bzhin bag yod drag pa yin//groyo ba med cing brtan la shin tu gnas//sa mchog thob cing rnal 'byor rnam 'phro
193a5(mdo sde): med//lhod pa spangs shing dra gang sle gso yang smra//'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyun//brtson 'grus 'bar zhing tshul khrims bsngags pa ste//de yi
193a6(mdo sde): sems ni nam yang gdung mi 'gyur//de la yid la chags par 'gyur myed de//'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyun//'jigs pa med cing mi
193a7(mdo sde): smug mi zhum ste//bsim pa nges shing ni la yid rab ni//'dir ni de yi bcings pa lhod par gyur//'di ni gang dge tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyun//gras
193b1(mdo sde): tshan sems ni las su rung ba yin//de ni dul zhing de bzhin cang shes yid//'dir ni rang lus mtshan gyis brgyan byed pa//'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan//
193b2(mdo sde): de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed//mkhas pa de ni ngag gi rgyan thob ste//de ni nyon mongs med pas rtag sems brgyan//'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyun//khyad
193b3(mdo sde): par 'phags pa'i zhing ni legs par brgyan//theg pa mchog la sems can yongs smin byed//gang phyir sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas//rang gi skye ba legs
193b4(mdo sde): par rgyan par byed//byang chub spyod pa rtag tu rgyan byed cing //byang chub snying po dam pa rgyan par byengad//stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dag rgyan byed cing //nga rgyal mod pas
193b5(mdo sde): shes pa legs par brgyan//de ni byams pas sems can kun khyab byed//mkhas pa rtag tu dang dang mnyen pa yin//g.yo ni med cing sgyu med bcos pa med//gti
193b6(mdo sde): mug 'dod sdang 'jigs pas 'gro ma yin//de ni sgrib pa lnga po rnam par sel//bag yod gyur nas rjes su dran drug bsgom//byang chub yan log bdun dang lam sgom ste//
193b7(mdo sde): mthar gyis dgu dang ting 'dzin bsam gtan byed//rnal 'byor pa ni zhi gnas nges sems sbyor//de ni tshul bzhin dge ba chud mo gson//dben dang shin tu sbyangs dang so
194a1(mdo sde): sor rtog/'phags pa'i rigs la dbang ni sbyar ba yin//chos rnams la ni the tshom med par gyur//de la kun nas ldang dang 'gyod pa med//de la ma rig gaN+DI
194a2(mdo sde): mug mun pa med//bden pa snang ba yongs su shes pa shes//tshul khrims dag pa dmigs pa med pa ste//shes rab dam pa bsam gtan ting 'dzin drag/gnyis
194a3(mdo sde): bsal nas ni rnam par grol ba dag/lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing shes pa dag/dus gsum dgra la ye shes mthong mi chags//'dod chags bral ba'i shes pas
194a4(mdo sde): chos kyang dag/drag nus 'dir ni de la rlom sems med//'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan//shes rab kyis ni sbyin pa brgyan gyur te//rmi lam sgyu
194a5(mdo sde): ma tshol ba med pa'i phyir//bdag dang byang chub de bzhin sems can rnams//'khor gsum po dag de dag rnam par sbyong //shes rab kyis ni tshul khrims brgyan
194a6(mdo sde): gyur te//gzugs brnyan sgyu ma brag ca 'dra ba'i phyir//lus dang ngag rnams dang ni de bzhin sems//'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong //shes rab kyis ni bzod pa brgyan
194a7(mdo sde): gyur te//mkhas dang mtho min dme' bar 'gyur min dang //dam pa'i chos sku rtag tu rab rtog pa//'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong //shes rab
194b1(mdo sde): kyis ni brtson 'grus brgyan gyur to//skyo ba med cing bsam pa brtan pa dang //de ni blang ba med cing dor med pa//'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong //shes rab kyis
194b2(mdo sde): ni bsam gtan brgyan gyur to//de la mo chags gyur dang lhag mthong dang //mkhas pa mngon par shes pa skyed pa dang //'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong //shes/
194b3(mdo sde): rab kyis ni thabs kyang brgyan byed de//shin tu sdud dang gzungs dang yang dag smon//'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam sbyong zhing //sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing
194b4(mdo sde): rnams sbyong //dran pa nye bor bzhag la dran mi 'jug/yang drag spong ba rnams la gnyis med de//rdzu 'phrul gyis ni lus dang sems kyang dben//sems can
194b5(mdo sde): gyis ni dbang po kun mi shes//bdud dang nyon mongs rnams kyis zil mi non//chos kyi rang bzhin tshul bzhin rjes su rtogs//de bzhin lAm la 'od med 'gro ba med//'di
194b6(mdo sde): ni gang dgra shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan//de na shin tu zhi bas zhi granas shes//de yi lhag mthong spyod yul mtha' yas te//chos kyi phung po ci zhig phung po shes//
194b7(mdo sde): khams ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra bar shes//des ni stong pa lta bur skye mched shes//rten pas bsags pas chos rnams 'byung med de/
195a1(mdo sde): don dam badren par 'khrugs pa med par shes//tshul bzhin gyis ni nges par rtogs par shes//dus gsum la ni chags med ye shes 'jug
195a2(mdo sde): rnam par bzhag phyir phung po gsum yang shis//dkon mchog gsum ni mtshan nyid gcig tu shes//'di na gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan//rnam bsgrubs
195a3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bur shes//yongs brtags rtsu ba rmi lam ji bzhin no//nam 'phrul mtshan nyid smig rgyu 'dra ba ste//'pho med chos rnams gzugs brnyan
195a4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid do//'di 'phrong byung ba mig yo lta bu ste//rkyen rnams kyis ni brag ca ji bzhin no//chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu ma 'dres shes//de bzhin nyid ni gnas
195a5(mdo sde): med de rab shes//yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mi ga mo chos//'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas gnyis su med//shes rab zab cing bla ni dpya yangs par//brgyan
195a6(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas chos rnams tshul bar byed//de ni nam+b+ha yang dran pa brjod pa med//chos rnams kun tu 'dzin cing 'dzin phyur byed//don dang tshig 'bru
195a7(mdo sde): la ni rtag tu mkhas//nges tshig shes pa rtag par rtogs khong chud//chags med tshig dang rngub pa ma yin dang //rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang brdzun med cig/
195b1(mdo sde): thos pa kun don rtag tu rtog pa dang //mkhas pa de ni ye shes rton par byed//des don mdo sde rtogs par rab tu shes//gang zag med pa'i chos nyid rton byed cing //'jig
195b2(mdo sde): rkyen 'das pa'i chos nyid la yang rton//de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin//de yi tshig ni bden pa'i rje/su mthun//gzung bar 'os dang dus su 'os pa yin//de yi
195b3(mdo sde): chos bstan de ni 'bras bu yod//phyed pa dang ni dus su rgyun chags 'jug/de yi spobs pa mgyogs pa skye ba ste//shugs can dang ni myur dang rtag mi chags//rgyun chad
195b4(mdo sde): med dang 'khrul med nges pa'i tshig/legs par brgyas pa'i phreng bas legs brgyan bzhin//lha dang klu yi skad ni rab tu shes//gnod sbyin dag dang dri za lha min dang //
195b5(mdo sde): mkha' lding mi'am ci dang lo 'phye che//sems can kun gyi skad kyang rab tu shes//'khor lhags shes nas spa gong med pa ste//smra ba mthong nas zhum par gyur pa'ang
195b6(mdo sde): med//'jigs pa med par chos kyi gtam yang rjod//'dri ba rnams la nges 'byung rab tu shes//lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mthong skyel zhi yi//gtam brjod rnal
195b7(mdo sde): 'byor mthong nas rjes su mthun//nga rgyal can la lag na rdo rje ston//yul mngon chags pa sreg pa'i bskal pa ste//theg pa gsum gyi rim pa'i gtam yang rjod//
196a1(mdo sde): dgas pa kun tum tshom gcod pa ste//blo mtshos rnams mngon sum 'gyur ba yin//de'i shrI m+b+har ba rnam ya gzhan ma Sh+T+r-Is//mig mas cung /
196a2(mdo sde): tan tu zang mi shes//don rnams nges padag la rkyen chags te//'di ni sangs rgyas chos rnams mapa' yas brjod//de ni gzungs shes brtan par gyur pa yin/
196a3(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs spyan ni mtha' yas shes//rnam par byang ba'i pha ni skyon thug pa med//de bzhin sems can dbang po thams cad shes//sangs rgyas gnang
196a4(mdo sde): 'i so so rig pazlog/de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa ste//de yi yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang //bskul par rgyun chad med par rab brjod kyang /
196a5(mdo sde): snod tan pa ni rtogs par mnus so///bami phyo gas pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang byung chub sems dang 'gazungs kyi dbang rgya
196a6(mdo sde): / la gA/rigs kyi ba snang ba gang dag gas snang bar m+WA na byu chub sems dru smin pa skyon nag rlung bral da byung chubs nas
196a7(mdo sde): spyod pa yongs su dag pa spyod par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi snang po ni brgyad po 'di dag go//brgyad gang shin/'di lta ste/dran pa'i snang
196b1(mdo sde): dang /blo gros kyi snang ba dang /rtogs pa'i snang ba dang /chos kyi snang ba dang /shes pa'i snang ba dang /bden pa'i snang ba dang /mngon par shes pa'i snang ba dang /
196b2(mdo sde): sgrub pa'i snang ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang po ni brgyad po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang
196b3(mdo sde): glagang zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang bya ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud
196b4(mdo sde): me gzon pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa bI ma byas pa sogs pa dang /thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjod pa dang don rdom par nges pa rjes su thob pa deng /yul drug gis mi 'phrogs
196b5(mdo sde): pa dang /mi dge ba'i chos spang zhing dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dran pa rgya chen po phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /de dran pa phun sum tshogs
196b6(mdo sde): rIg nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi grong khyer srung bar 'jog pa dang /dran pa sngon du 'gro bas chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa yin te/rigs
196b7(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi snying ba ni brgyad po 'di dag
197a1(mdo sde): ste/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/don gyi blo gros yin gyi tshig 'bru'i blo gros ma yin pa dang /ye shes kyi blo g+hos yin gyi rnam par shes pa'i blo gros
197a2(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang /chos kyi blo gros yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang /rigs pa'i blo gros yin gyi 'akal ba'i blo smos ma yin pa dang /byang chub kyi sems kyi blo
197a3(mdo sde): gros yin gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang /rlabs po che'i blo gros yin gyi dman pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi blo gros yin gyi bdud
197a4(mdo sde): kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang /snying rje chen po'i blo gros yin gyi sems can la rnam par 'tshe ba'i blo gros ma yin pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros
197a5(mdo sde): kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams
197a6(mdo sde): cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /dgongs te bstan pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /sems can gyi bsam pa rnams rtogs
197a7(mdo sde): par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab
197b1(mdo sde): mo rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /snrel zhi'i rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud bstan pa rtags par khong du chud par
197b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba ni brgyad
197b3(mdo sde): po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni brgyad pa 'di dag ste/brgyud gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can rnams la las
197b4(mdo sde): bya ba la 'jug pa ston pas 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang /thar pi 'dod pa rnams la shes rab kyis ston pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang /lam
197b5(mdo sde): shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang /'dod pa dang /srid pa dang /ma rig pa dang /lta ba'i zag pa mi skyong ba'i phyir zag pa med pa'i chos kyi
197b6(mdo sde): sdang ba dang /'phagaso pa rnams kyi nges par gyur pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi snang bya dang /glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa la shin tu rtogs pa'i
197b7(mdo sde): phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang /sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnam par byang ba'i chos kyi snang ba dang /chos rnams shin tu nye bar zhi
198a1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni brgyud po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu bya
198a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/brgyad pa'i shes pa'i snod pa dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa'o shes
198a3(mdo sde): pa'i snang ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang /dgra bcom pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang /rang sangs
198a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi shes pa'i snang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa'i snang ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub
198a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/brgyad gang
198a6(mdo sde): zhe na/'di lta ste/bden pa bsgrim pa gang gis nges par gar phra pa 'ang b+hA pa de la de'i snang ba dang /bden pa bsgom pa gangags 'bras bu dang po thob par 'gyur
198a7(mdo sde): bde la de'i snang ba dang /bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu gnyis pa thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang /bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu gsum
198b1(mdo sde): pa thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang /bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu bzhi pa thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang /bden pa bsgom pa gang gis rang sangs rgyas nyid
198b2(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang /bden pa bsgom pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang /bden pa bsgom
198b3(mdo sde): pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i snang
198b4(mdo sde): ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lha'i
198b5(mdo sde): mig gis gzugs thams cad yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir gsal ba'i snang ba dang /lha'i rna bas sgra thams cad thos pa'i phyir nges par rtog pa'i snang ba dang sngon
198b6(mdo sde): gyi gnas bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran pa'i phyir rjes su dran pa'i snang ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems la lto ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal
198b7(mdo sde): ba'i snang ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i phyir nam mkha' sgrib pa med pa'i snang ba dang /zag pa med pa'i shes pa yongs
199a1(mdo sde): su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir shes pa'i snang ba dang /sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi snang ba dang /sems can
199a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod pa'i phyir ye shes kyi tshogs kyi snang ba skye/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag
199a3(mdo sde): go/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni dgu po 'di dag ste/dgu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sgrub pas ye shes kyi snang ba dang /sgrub pas
199a4(mdo sde): shes rab kyi snang ba dang /sgrub pas blo'i snang ba dang /sgrub pas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i snang ba dang /sgrub pas zhi gnas kyi snang ba dang /sgrub pas lhag mthong gi snang ba
199a5(mdo sde): dang /sgrub pas sems can gyi bsam pa snang ba dang /sgrub pas 'khrugs pa med par sems rnam par grol ba'i snang ba dang /sgrub pas shin tu mthar thug pa'i snang ba snang
199a6(mdo sde): ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni dgu po 'di dag go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs
199a7(mdo sde): so//dran pa de dang yang dag 'dres pa ni//sngon chad las dge bsags pa chud mi gzon//phra bar sngo ba phun sum tshogs pa te//phyi phyir zhing ni yang dag sgrub par
199b1(mdo sde): byed//thos pa'i chos rnams la ni brjed pa med//rnam par nges pa myur du thob par 'gyur//nye bar zhi bas yul rnams las ni sbas//dran dang ldan pa mi dge rnams dang
199b2(mdo sde): bral//dran pa rgya bo che ni shin tu bsags//bya ba bya ba dag ni rnam par 'byed//dran pa dag dang ldan par rig nas ni//rgyal ba rang byung dag gi byin gyis rlab//dam pa'i
199b3(mdo sde): chos kyi grong khyer skyong byed pa//de ni 'gro ba rnams la chos ston nus//shes rab ldan pa mun pa rnam bral te//lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don kyang byed//blo gras bzung ldan
199b4(mdo sde): snang ba thob gyur naso//dwags pa dang ni the tshom rnams kyang gcod//drin dang ldan pa rang 'byung ye shes kyis//byang chub myur du rjes su rtogs par byed//de ni don
199b5(mdo sde): gyi blo gros can yin gyi//tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug sgra la'ang min//sems can dag pa ye shes blo gros can//rnam par shes pa'i blo gros 'dod ma yin//chos kyi blo/
199b6(mdo sde): gros ldan par gyur pa de//nyon mongs blo gros sel cing gti mug bral//shes rab dang ni thabs kyi tshul shes pa//de ni rgyalnga ba'i byang chub 'gal mi byed//de ni
199b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i blo gros ldan//nyan thos 'gyur min rang rgyal 'gyur ma yin//rtag tu rlabs chen blo gros can yin gyi//de ni blo gros chung ngu 'dod ma
200a1(mdo sde): yin//sangs rgyas blo gros rtag tu ldan yin gyi//bdud kyi phyo gas su ni 'gyur ba yin//blo gros ldan pa snying rje cher gzhol gyi//sems can sna
200a2(mdo sde): la'ang rnam par 'tshe ba min//chos 'ga' bstan pa gang yin de la ni//the tshom med cing rtogs par khong du chud//de ni dgongs te gsungs la mkhas 'gyur zhing //
200a3(mdo sde): sems can spyod pa rnams la rtogs dang ldan//so so yang dgra rig la rtogs ldan zhing //de yi shes pa 'jug pa chags pa med//rkyen byung byed pa po dang rnam bral
200a4(mdo sde): bar//rten pa'i chos rnams dag ni rab tu shes//de ni snrel zhi'i rgyu la mkhas gyur cing //spre'u tshugs tshul ni rtogs par khong du chud//sangs rgyas kyi ni chos
200a5(mdo sde): rnams ji snyed pa//thams cad kyang ni rtogs par khrod du chud//'jig rten pa yi chos kyi snang ba yis//lha mi rnams kyi las kyi bye ba shes//'jog rten lngas ni
200a6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i ye shes kyis//shes rab snang ba dang ni ldan pa yin//kha na mthor bcas dang mtho med//ye shes rab tu gsal ba chen po 'jug/lam ni shin
200a7(mdo sde): tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir//rtag tu 'bras bu yod par chos ston to//zag par bcas dang zag pa med pa yi//chos la de yi snang ba rab tu 'jug/de ni
200b1(mdo sde): zag pa thams cad spong byed cing //lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don kyang byed//'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas chos rnams la//de yi shes pa rtag tu rab tu 'jug/de ni de yis dri
200b2(mdo sde): bral rab rib med//skyon med thob nas spyad pa rnams kyang spyod//rnam par byang dang kun nas nyon mongs pa//de yi shes pa sgrib pa med pa 'jug/rang bzhin gyis ni sems
200b3(mdo sde): 'od gsal ba dang //kun nas nyon mongs pa yi tshul yang shes//ji ltar mya ngan 'das par gyur pa ni//skye ba med cing 'byung ba med par shes//'di 'dra 'di ni theg
200b4(mdo sde): pa chen po la//chos kyi snang ba mtha' yas gyur pa yin//de ni brgyad pa yi ni shes pa dang //rgyun tu zhugaso la shes pa 'jug pa dang //lan cig phyir 'ong ba ye shes
200b5(mdo sde): pa dang /phyir mi 'ong la shes pa 'jug pa dang //de ni dgra bcom pa dang rang rgyal dang //'jig rten mgon po byang chub sems dpa' dag/kun la de yi shes dang sgrub
200b6(mdo sde): pa rnams//lhag ma lus pa med par rab tu 'jug/gang gis 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang //'khrugs med don dam nges par 'byung 'gyur ba//de la rab
200b7(mdo sde): bsgoms smra ba dpa' bo rnams//bden pa'i snang ba dag dang ldan pa yin//bden pa dag ni bsgom pa byas pas na//skyon med 'jug dang 'bras bu dang po thob//
201a1(mdo sde): gnyis dang gsum dang de bzhin bzhi pa dang //ra N+Dal rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur//bsgom pa gang gis su ni smra ba'i smra//de dag pa dang/
201a2(mdo sde): drag ni thob 'gyur dang //gdugs rgyal ba byang chub 'chung rgya ba//bden pa de dag la ni snang bar 'gyur//lha yi myig gris dz+nyA ni de yi sa nga //gzugs kyi rnamang dge
201a3(mdo sde): ni thams cad mthong //lha yin pa nges par rtogs pa yis/'a ga hU~M rnams rtogs par 'gyur//sngon gyi gnas shes pa yi d+hang ba des//bskal ba ldan
201a4(mdo sde): khrig drug ni rnaMs s+yA d+hAn//'od gsalnga ba ye shes pa'i snad bu sa//gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams la ma bste//rdzu 'phrul gyi ni she skye pa'i snang ba yis//
201a5(mdo sde): ban+d+ha'i klung ni khrag khrig rnams su 'a//zag pa myed pa'i shes pa'i snang ba ni//nam mA khyA' dang ni mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin//bsod nams kyi ni spang man
201a6(mdo sde): yas pa'i//mngon shes thog ma 'gro bya nye bar 'gro//de ye shes pa chags pa med pa yis//'gro ba'i ngogs pa dag ni gcod par byed//nan tan snying por byeng
201a7(mdo sde): pa'i rnal 'byor pa//dran dang blo gros rtogs dang chos shes snang //bden pa yi ni snang ba mtha' yas te//mngon par shes pa'i snang bar gyur pa yin//
201b1(mdo sde): pas ye shes dang ni shes rab dang //rgya rnon blo dang sgribs pa mtha' yas dang //yang dag lta ba nga ni lhag mthong dang //shin tu 'khrugs pa med pa mthar thug gyur//snang
201b2(mdo sde): ba shin tu rnam par dag pa brgyad//'di dag mthu chen gang la yod pa ni//re zhig byang chub thob par ma gyur kyang //de ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur//bcom
201b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa bcu drug gis sems
201b4(mdo sde): can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//bcu drug gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'dri la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni 'jig
201b5(mdo sde): tshogs la lta bus bcings pa/lta ba sna tshogs dang 'dres pa dag ste/lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub
201b6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log tu gyur nas mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/sdug bsngal ba la ba
201b7(mdo sde): bar 'du shes/bdag med po la bdag tu 'du shes/mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pad ste/phyin ci log thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bsten par bya
202a1(mdo sde): snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas
202a2(mdo sde): pa dngos po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa dog ste ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang
202a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sgrib pa lngas bsgribs te 'dod pa'i zug rngus zug pa/khong khro ba mung pa/rmugs pa dang gnyid
202a4(mdo sde): la chags pa dam pa ma yin pa la 'gyod pa kun nas langs pa/zab mo'i chos la nges pa ma thob pa dag ste/sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan
202a5(mdo sde): par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang kye ma sems can 'di ni skye mched drug gis chags pas chags te/mig gis
202a6(mdo sde): gzugs rnams mthong nas mtshan ma ro 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin po yin/rna bas sgra thos/snaswa dr-i snams lces ro myangs/lus kyis reg bya rnams la
202a7(mdo sde): reg/yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa dag yin te/skye mched drug gis chags pa spangs pa'i phyir de
202b1(mdo sde): dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nga rgyal dang /lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang //
202b2(mdo sde): nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang /nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyalabs/log pa'i nga rgyal gyis bcom pas chung ngu dag pas
202b3(mdo sde): bdag cag che'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa/mtshungs pa dag pas ni bdag cag che'o snyam du bdog la rlom sems su byed pa dang /ches che ba dag pas kyang
202b4(mdo sde): bdag cag ches tshe'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa/gzugs la bdag tu khas len pa nis rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag tu khas len pa/ma thob par
202b5(mdo sde): bdag la thob pa snyam du shes pa/bdag cag ni 'phags pa'o snyam du bdag la sems pa/log pa'i lta ba la yang dag pa'i lta bar mos pa dag ste/nga rgyal gyi rnam
202b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /kye ma sems can 'di dge
202b7(mdo sde): ni lam ngan par zhugs pa/'phags pa'i lam dang bral ba dag ste/lam ngan pa spang zhing 'phags pa'i lam thob par bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o/
203a1(mdo sde): snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /kye mu sems can 'di dag ni sred pa'i khol po chung ma dang /bu po dang /
203a2(mdo sde): bu mo la yongs su zhen pas spags pa/rang dbang med pa/bdag la mi dpogs pa dag sto rang dbang yod cing bdag la dpogs par bya ba dang /gar dga' bar 'gro bar bya
203a3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni phan tshun mi 'phrod
203a4(mdo sde): pa/khro ba dang /zhe sdang dang /gnod sems mang ba dag ste/khro bo dang /zhe sdang dang /gnod sems spong bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du
203a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /kye ma sems can 'di dgu ni sdig pa'i grogs blos yongs su zin pa/dge ba'i bshes
203a6(mdo sde): gnyen dang bral ba/sdig pa'i las byed pa dag ste/dge bo'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang /sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spang bar bya ba'i phyir
203a7(mdo sde): de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni brkam po/chags
203b1(mdo sde): pas zil gyis non pa/chog mi shes shing 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi gnas pa dang bral ba dag ste/chags pa spangs pa dang /'phags pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i phyir
203b2(mdo sde): de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni las kyi rnam par smin pa med por
203b3(mdo sde): lta zhing rtag pa dang chad pa la gnas pa dag ste/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo dang /lus dang /bya ba la gzung ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du
203b4(mdo sde): sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po skye ba dang /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mi rog pa dang gr-it+ta mug gis ldongs pa/bdag dang /sems
203b5(mdo sde): can dang /srog dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag la mngon par zhen pa dag ste/'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par bya ba dang /lta
203b6(mdo sde): bar gyur pa thams cad srung byar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye bo dang /
203b7(mdo sde): ma sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba/phung po lnga'i gshed mas yongs su zin pa dag ste/khams gsum thams cad las dbyung ba
204a1(mdo sde): do dag la rgyas bstan byar ba'osnyam du sems can rnams la byung rgyu sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye bdag/ma sems rgyan 'di dag ni bdud kyin/
204a2(mdo sde): pa'i bcing bas bcings pa/g.yo ba dang /rlom sems la gnas pa dag ste/bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa thams cad lus rnam par dgrol ba dang /gau yo
204a3(mdo sde): rlom sems spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /kye ma sems can 'di dag
204a4(mdo sde): ni mya ngan las 'danya bo'i slobacad cing dran 'gro sgo phye ba dag ste/mya ngan las 'da' bo'i sgo dbye ba dang /dran 'gro'i sgo btsud pa'i phyir de dag la chos bstan pa
204a5(mdo sde): bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skyo ba ste/rigs kyi bu rnam pa bcu drug po de dag gis sems can rnams la byang chub sems
204a6(mdo sde): dpa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las mi 'dres pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te/de dag la brtson nu byang chub sems dpa'
204a7(mdo sde): rnams legs par byed pa'i las byed pa rnams yin no//sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can dag gti mug gi gnyid kyis log pa dang /khang
204b1(mdo sde): shes rab kyis sad par mthong nas shes rab kyi sems can rnams bsdad par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i las ma 'dres pa dang po'o//sems can dag chung ngu la mos
204b2(mdo sde): pa dang /bdang rgya chen po la myos par mthong nas theg pa chen po la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /sems can dag chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang /
204b3(mdo sde): bdag chos la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams chos 'dod pa la rab tu 'god pa dang /sems can dag 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa dang /bdag 'tsho ba yongs
204b4(mdo sde): su dag par mthong nas sems can rnams 'tsho ba yongs su dag par sbyor ba dang /sems can dag lta bar gyur par bying ba dang /bdag yang drag pa'i lta bar zhugs
204b5(mdo sde): par mthong nas sems can rnams 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba lo rab tu 'god pa dang /sems can dag ma rig par gyur cing tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la
204b6(mdo sde): byed pa bsags par mthong zhing bdag rig pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la gnas par rig nas sems can rnams rig pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshul bzhin
204b7(mdo sde): yid la byed pa la rab tu 'god pa dang /sems can dag log pa'i chos la gnas pa dang /bdag yang dag pa'i chos la zhugs par mthong nas yang dag pa'i
205a1(mdo sde): chos bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /sems can dag ser m+b+ha n+dan du gyu ti kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
205a2(mdo sde): bdag bdog pa thams cid yongs su gtong bar mthong nas sems can rnams bdog pa thams cad yongs su ga tong po mi sbyor ba dang /sems can dag ngang tshul ngan pa
205a3(mdo sde): tsidadu klu te/sdom pa la mI gnas pa dang /bdag tshul khrims yongs su dag par gnas nas/sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi smom pa la rab tu 'gro
205a4(mdo sde): sems can dag gnod sems mang zhing khro bya shas che ba dang /bdag po med pa'i skab sa dang /byams pa lce gnas par mthong nas sems can dum s+ya brji
205a5(mdo sde): bas dang byams pa la gnas pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /sems can dag le lo can du myur te/brtson 'grus chung ba dang /bdag la la meng cing brjid
205a6(mdo sde): sa coms par mthong nas sems can rnams brtson 'grus rlom pa la sbyor ba dang /sems can dag sems g.yengs shing dran pa nyams pa dang /bdag many+dzu
205a7(mdo sde): rje dzi na nas/ngas ma gtan la bsam gtan byed par mthong nas sems can rnams sems mi g.yeng ba dang /dran pa dang /shes bzhi ni la rab tu 'ag
205b1(mdo sde): pa dang /sems can dag shes rab 'chal par gyur te/dman zhing gti mug dang ldan pa dang /bdag shes rab dang ldan zhing gti mug dang bral bar mthong nas sems can rnams
205b2(mdo sde): shes rab chen po dang /gti mug dang bral ba yang dag par shin tu 'jug pa dang /sems can dag rigs pa ma yin par lhung zhing yang ba'i byed pa brtsams pa dang /bdag
205b3(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yang dag pa'i las brtsams par mthong nas sems can rnams thabs mkhas pa dang /yang dag pa'i ltos rtsom pa yang dag par
205b4(mdo sde): 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /sems can dag nyon mongs pas bcom zhing kun tu rtog pa dang /rnam par rtog pa dang /yongs su rtog pa'i spyod yul par gyu pa dang /
205b5(mdo sde): byadag nyin mongs pa thams cad lus logs par mthong nas sems can rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba la rab tu 'god pa dang /sems can dag 'jig
205b6(mdo sde): tshogs la lta ba'i bcing bas bcings shing dmigs pa la rab tu gnas pa dang /bdag 'jig tshogs la lta ba spongs su mos pa dang ldan zhing dmigs pas
205b7(mdo sde): bcings pa las yongs su grol bar mthong nas sems can rnams 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa dang dmigs pa dang bral ba la sbyor ba dang /sems
206a1(mdo sde): can dag ma dul zhing ma sbas te byang ba ma yin pa dang /badrag dul zhing sbas te byang bar mthong nas sems can rnams dul ba da /smras pa dang /
206a2(mdo sde): byang ba la rab tu 'gong ba dang /sems can dag byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi shis te/dge bo'i rtsa ba 'joms pa dang /bdag byas pa brazlo zhing byas pa shes
206a3(mdo sde): te dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung bar gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams byas pa gzo ba dang /byas pa shes pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba chung me gzon pa la rab tu
206a4(mdo sde): 'god pa dang /sems can dag chu bor lhung zhing sdig pa 'dod pa'i dbang du song ba dang /bdag chu bo thams cad las yang dag par 'das par mthong nas
206a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams chu bo thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba la sbyor ba dang /sems can dag bka' blo mi bde zhing mthun par 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang /
206a6(mdo sde): bdag bka' blo bde zhing mthun par 'dzin par mthong nas sems can rnams la bka' blo bde zhing mthun par 'dzin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa
206a7(mdo sde): dang /sems can dag phonges pa mang zhing dam pa ma yin pa la yongs su zhen pa dang /bdag ma phongs pa mang zhing dge ba bdud rtsi la gnas par mthong
206b1(mdo sde): nas sems can rnams yongs su zhen pa dang bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnas par sbyor ba dang /sems can dag dbul zhing 'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba dang /bdag/
206b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i nir dang ma bral zhing nor bdun dang ldan par mthong nas sems can rnams 'phags pa'i nor thob par bya ba la rab tu 'god pa dang /sems can dag
206b3(mdo sde): rtag tu na zhing khams rnam pa bzhi po'i sbrul gdug pas zin pa dang /bdag nad med cing bde la 'gyur ba med par mthong nas sems can rnams nad thams cad
206b4(mdo sde): spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang sems can drag mi shes pa'i mun pas kun tu gtibs shing ye shes kyi snang ba dang bral ba dang /bdag ye shes kyi
206b5(mdo sde): snang ba thob par mthong nas sems can rnams ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la rab tu 'god pa dang /sems can dag khrims gsum la chags pas chags shing
206b6(mdo sde): rgyud lnga'i 'gro ba'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rjes su 'jug pa mthong zhing bdag khams gsum yongs su shes pa la mkhas par shes nas sems can rnams
206b7(mdo sde): khams gsum yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /sems can dag g.yon phyogs kyi lam du zhugs shing gr-i yas phyogs
207a1(mdo sde): kyi lam dang bral ba dang /bdag g.yas phyogs kyi lam la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams g.yas phyogs kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa
207a2(mdo sde): dang /sems can dag lus dang srog la chags shing nyes pa ma mthong ba dang /bdag lus dang srog la mi lta zhing nyes pa mthong ba yin par mthong nas sems can rnams
207a3(mdo sde): lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang /nyes pa mthong ba la rab tu 'god pa dang /sems can dag sangs rgyas dang /chos dang dge 'dun dang bral ba dang /bdag dkon mchog
207a4(mdo sde): gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa la 'dzud pa dang /sems can
207a5(mdo sde): rnams dam pa'i chos las nyams pa dang bdag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa
207a6(mdo sde): la rab tu 'god pa dang /sems can dag ston pa rin po che dang ring du gnas shing /rjes su dran pa drug dang bral ba dang bdag rjes su dran pa drug ma btang ba mtho
207a7(mdo sde): nas sems can rnams rjes su dran pa dag bsgom pa la rab tu 'god pa dang /sems can dge las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang /bdag la'o/
207b1(mdo sde): dang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar mthong nas sems can rnams las dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba la rab tu 'grod pa dang /sems can dag mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan
207b2(mdo sde): zhing dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa dang /bdag mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing /dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par mthong nas sems can rnams mi dge
207b3(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la rab tu 'god pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i las sum cu rtsa gnyis
207b4(mdo sde): po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag phul yin te/de dag la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs par byed pa'i las byed pa rnams
207b5(mdo sde): yin no//rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa'i las ni tshad med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs po'i sgo ji snyed
207b6(mdo sde): par byang chub sems dpas rnam par byang ba'i sgo yang dgu par bsgrub par bya ba'ang de snyed do//rigs kyi bu gal te gang dag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten
207b7(mdo sde): gyi khoms kyi sems can de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi thog pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la rab tu gnas par gyur kyang sems can de dag thams cad kyi
208a1(mdo sde): las gang yin pa de sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi pargya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//skyong gri cha dang /brgya skyong gi cha dang /
208a2(mdo sde): bye ba'i cha dang /bye ba brgya phrag sbyong gi cha dang /grangs dang /che dang /baglang ba dang /dpe dang /rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nyan thos dang /
208a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dag ni rang gi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa spong bar nye bar gnas pa yin gyi/byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sems can thams cod kyi nyon mongs pa spang bar nye
208a4(mdo sde): bar gnas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu de ltar na sems can thams cad kyi lus gang yin pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las gang yin pa bas
208a5(mdo sde): 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i las nyid mchog ces brjod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi las ni phyin ci log dang ldan pa/nyan thos dang //
208a6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las ni nyi tshe ba dang ldan pa yin gyi/byang chub sems dpa'i las ni phyin ci log med cing tshod med pa'i rnam pa'i yon tan rtsom pa ste//
208a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyu 'dis sems can thams cad dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non to//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
208b1(mdo sde): gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'
208b2(mdo sde): ste rjes su yi rang nas/yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan dang /byang
208b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i snang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i las legs par gsungs pa de dag ni ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das
208b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang bshad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can dag la sangs rgyas bcom
208b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po 'jug/de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po ni ci tsam/rnam pa ni gang lags/rtags ni gang lags/mtshan ma ni gang
208b6(mdo sde): lags/gnas ni gang lags/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phrin las ni ji ltar mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las ni ci tsam/rnam pa ni gang
208b7(mdo sde): lags/rtags ni gang lags/mtshan ma ni gang lags/gnas ni gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/thams cad gzigs pa/
209a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las rnams mngon sum du gyur pas mngon sum du bdag cag la legs par yang dag par bshad du gsol/de skad ces
209a2(mdo sde): gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod de'i phyir legs
209a3(mdo sde): par nyon la yid la bzung zhig dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las la 'jug pa tsam cung zad tsog khyod la bshad
209a4(mdo sde): par bya'o//rigs kyi bu sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni skye ba'ang med/'jug pa'ang med do zhes brjod par
209a5(mdo sde): bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni rtag tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro//de ni bskal pa grangs med par yongs su sbyang
209a6(mdo sde): bo byas pas yang dag par bskyed pa ste/'jug pa'ang med/log pa'ang med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni ma btang po//
209a7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la gonas pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po de ni ci tsam du las yongs su thob par bya bar sla ba ma yin pa de tsam du chad
209b1(mdo sde): med/de nam du bsam gyis mi khyab ste/de tsam du mi zad cing /de tsam du ring du song ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar byang chub thob
209b2(mdo sde): pa de ltar sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po 'jug go/byang chub ci 'dra ba thugs rje chen po'ong de 'dra'o//de bzhin grwa shugs pas byang chub ji ltar thob cem
209b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa dang /gnas med par byang chub thob bo//de la rtsa ba ni gang /gnas ni gang zhe na/'jig tshogs ni rtsa ba'o//yang dag pa ma
209b4(mdo sde): yin pa kun rtog pa ni gnas so//de gnyis ni/de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par yongs su shes te/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
209b5(mdo sde): pabs rtsa ba med pa dang gnas med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//sems can 'di dag gis ni rtsa ba med pa dang /gnas med pa'i chos
209b6(mdo sde): 'dri dag khong du ma chud par de dag gros khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/rigs kyi bu byang chub
209b7(mdo sde): ni zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba'o//de la zhi ba ni gang /nye bar zhi ba ni gang zhe na/nang ni zhi ba'o//phyi ni nye bar zhi ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mig ni bdag dang /bdag
210a1(mdo sde): zhes stong ste/de ni de'i rang bzhin no//rna ba dang /sgra dang /skye dang /lus dang /yid ni bdag dang bdag gis sbyang ste/de ni de'i rang bzhin no//
210a2(mdo sde): mig stong par yongs su shes nas gzugs rnams la mi rgyug ste/de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o//rna ba stong par yongs su shes nas sgra rnams la mi rgyug ste/de'i phyir
210a3(mdo sde): nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o//sna stong par yongs su shes nas dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/de'i phyir nye bur zhi ba zhes bya'o//lce sbyong par yongs su shes nas rnams po ma
210a4(mdo sde): rgyug ste/de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o//lus stong par yongs su shes nas reg bya rnamase la mi rgyug ste/de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o//yid stod par yongs
210a5(mdo sde): shes nas chos rnams la mi rgyug ste/de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o//sems can 'di dag gis ni zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi ba khong du ma chud pas de dag gi
210a6(mdo sde): khong du chud par bya'o//snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go//rigs kyi bu sems rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i phyi
210a7(mdo sde): byang chub ring bzhin 'dagasal ba'o//ci'i phyir rang bzhin 'od gsal ba zhes bya zhe na/rang bzhin gang yin de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/nam mkha'
210b1(mdo sde): dam su pa/nams brlo/rnamapa 'dud mnyam par gnas /dbyu sa ma stsa rnam pas+ho/ na da shin 'a dgas pa da//
210b2(mdo sde): m+b+ha ma'i sgru ba rnams kyis na rang bzhin dgas pa pa 'ad byung du bas nyan ma sme nanas na sa pa sa /rang bzhin byed gsal ba dag
210b3(mdo sde): khyo du chung par bye'i snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs chen po'i rgyun go//rigs kyi bu byung chub ni blang ba med pa dang /do bu med pa'i//
210b4(mdo sde): myed pa nigang /der ba med pa ni ga zhin/zung ba med pa'is kyi ba chos rnams ca sde na pa'o//dung bsod pa zhes bya ba na chos rnams cad mi 'ad ban//de 'aM
210b5(mdo sde): sbyin ga shegs pa byung ba medade pa dang /deng brnyed byang chubar 'jug papa/de bzhi das pa la med pa dang /phyi po med pa ma yin par snang dge bar chus sgyu
210b6(mdo sde): lta nal te//du ltar du bzhin ga shegs pas chos rnams cadri pa mi ming byed nga/pi rim dang bral bar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de'i phyir de bzhin
210b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa zhes bya'o//byis pas sa'i spyi bo dag gis ni blang ba med pa dang /de ba med pa 'di khang du ma chud pas de dag gi khang du chud por bya'o//skye mdus /
211a1(mdo sde): rnams pa da zhan gshegs pa'o thugs chen pa 'jug//rigs kyi bu byung chu blan mtshan ma snad pa dang /dmigs pa med pa'o//des mtshanan
211a2(mdo sde): med pa ni gung /dmigs pa med pa ni gang zhe na/mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med blon mtshan me med pa'o//gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bad migs
211a3(mdo sde): ba med pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmig skyes med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o snam nyan du med pa dmigs pa med pa'o//sgra'i rnam par shes pa de mags sa ma
211a4(mdo sde): de bachernam mdanga'o//dri bsnams med pa ni dmigs pa meng pa'o//d+h+rU'i rnam par shes pa du migs su med pa na mtshun ma med pa'o//da myad du med pan dmigs
211a5(mdo sde): med pa'o//lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o//reg bya rig par byer med pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o//yid kyi rnam par shes
211a6(mdo sde): pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o//chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni dmigs pa med pa'o//de ltar na mtshan ma med pa dang /dmigs pa
211a7(mdo sde): mad pe ni'aphags pa rnams kyi snong tshuma'o//'phags pa rnams kyi skye yul gang ni ni/gang khams gsum pa'i spyad yul ma yin pa de ni dgas pa rnam
211b1(mdo sde): spyo yul lo//de ltar na gang stod yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/'phags pa'i spyod yul 'ang byis pas san skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas
211b2(mdo sde): dag gi khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/rigs kyi bu byang chub ni 'das pa ma yin/mi 'ongs pa ma
211b3(mdo sde): yin/da ltar byung ba ma yin te/dus gsum mnyam pa 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa'o//de la 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa gang zhe na/gang 'das pa la sems
211b4(mdo sde): mi 'jug pa dang /ma 'ongs pa la rnam par shes pa mi rgyug pa dang /da ltar byung ba la yid la byed pa mi 'jug pa'o//de sems dang /yid dang /rnam par shes pa
211b5(mdo sde): myi gnas pas 'das pa la rtog par mi byed/ma 'ongs pa la mi sems/da ltar byung ba spros par mi byed do//de ltar dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang /'khor gsum
211b6(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gi khang du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje
211b7(mdo sde): chen po 'jug go rigs kyi bu byang chub ni lus med cing 'dus ma byas pa'o//de la lus med pa ni gang mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin//
212a1(mdo sde): rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi rnam pa shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o//'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni gang la skye
212a2(mdo sde): pa med pa dang //'jig pa med pa dang /gnas med pa ste/de ni mtshan nyid gsum dang bral ba'i 'dus ma byas zhes bya'o//'dus ma byos ji lta bur 'dus byas kyang
212a3(mdo sde): de bzhin du khong du chud par bya'o de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni med pa'o med pa gang yin pa de la ni gnyis med do//lus med pa
