316b7(mdo sde): khyed kyi nang nas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyin dam pa'i chos yun reng du gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom
317a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'di yongs su bsrung bar su spro//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug nus
317a2(mdo sde): mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams de bzhini gshegs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis par bsgrubs pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /slad
317a3(mdo sde): ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus de na'ang rgyas par bgyid par spro'o//bcom ldan 'das 'on gyis kyang ci nas de'i dus nu skye bo mang po gnas par 'gyur ba/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun
317a4(mdo sde): ba'i sems can de dag gi rna bar grags par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byon gyis brlab tu gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
317a5(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bden pa gsung //bden pa'i chos la rab tu gnas//byin gyi brlabs kyis de dag
317a6(mdo sde): la//mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs//snying rje chen po'i go cha bgros//byams pa chen po rab tu gnas//kun la byams pa nyid kyi phyir//mdo sde 'di ni
317a7(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs//bsod nams tshogs ni phun sum tshogs//ye shes tshogs kyis byung 'gyur ba//tshogs rnams kun dang ldan pa yis//mdo sde 'di ni byin
317b1(mdo sde): gyis brlabs//bdud rnams thams cad nges 'joms la//smra ba thams cad rab 'dul zhing //lta ba thams cad rgyan gcod pa//mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs//'jig
317b2(mdo sde): rten skyong dang brgya byin dang //de bzhin lha ma yin rnams dang //lha dang dri za klu dag kyang //ngas ni byin gyis brlab pa byas//sa dang de bzhin par snang la//lha rnams/
317b3(mdo sde): mang po gang 'khod pa//sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin brlabs kyis//tshul 'dri rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur//'khor 'di bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir//tshadris pa'i gnas pa
317b4(mdo sde): rnams ldan zhing //bden pa bzhi yis brgyan gyur pa//mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs//nam mkha' gzugs can byed kyang sring //gzugs ni gzugs med byed
317b5(mdo sde): srid kyi//sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin brlabs ni//rnam par dkrug par mi nus so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis mgrin gcig tu
317b6(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad po 'di gnyis gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag rnams//mdo 'di kun tu bsrung slad du//rtsa lag dang ni bcas rnams kyis//
317b7(mdo sde): bsrung ba bzang po bgyi bar 'tshal//mkhas pa byang chub blo gros kyis//gang dag 'dzin par bgyid pa dag/de dag la ni phyogs bzhi nas//rtag par kun
318a1(mdo sde): tu bsrung ba bsti//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to//bdag ni bcom ldan
318a2(mdo sde): mdzad pa gzo//'dren pa chos kyi dbang bdag lags//mgon po mdo sde mchog 'di las//sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu bstan//sangs rgyas rnams ni thems//
318a3(mdo sde): cad kyi//mdzad pa gzo ba bsrung bgyid cing //'di 'dra'i mdo dang de bzhin du//mdo sde 'dzin pa bsrung bar 'tshal//de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi
318a4(mdo sde): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to//bsam gtan gleng dang tshad med dang //theg pa kun gyis 'byung ba gang //de
318a5(mdo sde): dngag don ldan zab mo yi//mdo sde 'dri las nges par 'byung //bdag ni tshangs pa'i bde bor te//glang na tshul 'di 'chad par ni//mnyan pa'i slad dang de bzhin
318a6(mdo sde): du//bsrung ba'i slad du mchi bar bgyi//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu rAb dga' ldan gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to//gang zhig
318a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gsung ba yi//mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur ba//skye ba gcig gis rab gnas nas/dga' ldan rnams su gnas par 'gyur//mgon
318b1(mdo sde): po bdag ni lha yul ba'i//phun sum tshogs pa bor nas su//tshul 'di rab tu ston bgyid cing //dzam+bu gling du gnas par spro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi bu
318b2(mdo sde): ded dpon gyis tshugs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to//gang zhig don dang ldan pa yi//mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur ba//de dag bdud las 'dri skyengs pas//bdud
318b3(mdo sde): dbang du mi mchi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa bdag kyang ni//mdo 'di kun tu bsrung slad du//ci nas kyang ni rgyas 'gyur bar//brtson par bgyid cing 'dun par
318b4(mdo sde): bgyid//de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to//rnam par 'dren pa gang zhig ni//nyon mongs thams
318b5(mdo sde): cad tshar gcod pa//'di 'dzin bgyid pa de dag la//bdag ni sgrib par mi bgyid do//mdo sde mchog ni 'byung ba der//bdud kyi go skabs ma mchis so//
318b6(mdo sde): mgon pos gsungs pa dran bgyid pa//de la bsrung ba bgyid par 'tshal/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu mtshams rab kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis
318b7(mdo sde): gsol to//sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni//mdo sde 'di las rab bshad pas//gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa//des ni sangs rgyas kun la mchod//
319a1(mdo sde): mgon po bdag ni mdo sde 'di//lha ni bye ba rnams la bshad//gang+gA dag gus par nyan pa dag/byang chub yang dag 'dzin du sprul//de nas bcom
319a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to//mi gang byang chub rab zhugs te//dam chos yongs su bsrung slad du//
319a3(mdo sde): bdag kyang stong bgyid de dag ni//gsol ba ma btab bshes gnyen lags//bdag ni dga' ldan mchis nas su//sangs rgyas kyi ni byin brlabs kyis//'di
319a4(mdo sde): lta bu yi mdo sde 'di//shin tu rgyas par bgyid par 'tshal//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol
319a5(mdo sde): to//ston pa las ni bdag gis su//mdo sde stong phrag mang thos kyang //bdag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu//sngon chad nam yang ma thos so//mngon sum du ni
319a6(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di//blangs shing kun tu bzung lugs te//byang chub sems dpa'i ched du ni//shin tu rgyas par bgyi bar 'tshal//de nas bcom ldan 'das
319a7(mdo sde): kyis brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang /lha'i bu de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /nyan thos chen po de dag la
319b1(mdo sde): legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/skyes bu dam pa dag khyed kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i seng ge'i sgra skyugs pa legs so lcags so//skyes bu
319b2(mdo sde): dam pa dag khyed la bsgo'o khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o sems can gang dag theg pa chen po la zhugs pa bzod pa ma thob pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ang so rnams
319b3(mdo sde): kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu bzung ste/bzung nas kyang kun chub par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa
319b4(mdo sde): ma thob kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro//gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa par 'gyur ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i
319b5(mdo sde): nyan thos 'dus pa dang po'i grangs su chud par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag ni nga yongs su
319b6(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gzhan las ma thos par rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos yongs su zhus pa bstan pa'i chos kyi
319b7(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan sa na sems can dpag tu med pa dag byang chub rgya sems bskyed do//byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag ni
320a1(mdo sde): phyir mi ldag pa la rab tu gnas so//'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//snang ba chen pos kyang gsal bar gyur
320a2(mdo sde): me togs la mas cing gto ba Sh+TA ti//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten nu khyams nas 'dres pa byeng chub sem sna pa 'di dag gis ts+tsham ldan 'das da'i
320a3(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gis rnam par bkru bar
320a4(mdo sde): byas te/ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rnyed par bgyi ba legs par rnyed de//gang gis slad du bdag cag gis
320a5(mdo sde): rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu thos pas bdag cag 'dir mchis pa don ma mchis pa ma lags so//kye ma bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
320a6(mdo sde): pa'i sku tshe yongs su bskyang du gsol/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad yun ring du gnas par gyur cig/dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang
320a7(mdo sde): dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag kyang dus ring por yun du tshe yongs su sbyong bar gyur cig sems can thams cad la'
320b1(mdo sde): ldan pa byed par gyur cig/de nus bcom ldan 'das la byang chub se su dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsal to//kye ma bcom ldan 'dadun
320b2(mdo sde): tsam du rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di den bzang ba dang /tshig 'bru bzang ba dang /legs par brgyan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ma
320b3(mdo sde): d+ha dga' bskyed pa dang /bdun nang pa rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms pa dang /chos thams cad la mkhas pa 'dzin pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
320b4(mdo sde): tshim par bgyid pa dang /thug pa thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba'i phyir 'byung bya dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan la 'jug pa'i rjes su song
320b5(mdo sde): dang /thams cad kyis brtson par bgyi ba las gti mug ma mchis por sbyin pa ngo mtshur to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mang ci lags/'di
320b6(mdo sde): lhultar+ya bzung bar bag+h+nAM/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
320b7(mdo sde): de'i phyir gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar bzung zhig/de bzhin gshegs/
321a1(mdo sde): pa'i las don yod pa nyan pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang bzung zhig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems
321a2(mdo sde): dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /nyan thos kyi tshogs de dag thams cad dang /lha dang /mi dang /lcelha ma yin
321a3(mdo sde): dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen
321a4(mdo sde): po bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang /zhu chen gyi lits+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur ci
321a5(mdo sde): zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya ga ga na gany+dza pA ri prits+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tA//bod skad du/
321a6(mdo sde): 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam pa dang po//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
321a7(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod phul rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi
321b1(mdo sde): khyams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyi tshogs bsags pa/spyod pa chen po'i rgyu mthun pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par smin
321b2(mdo sde): pas mngon par grub pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnas mtha' yas pa nges par bstan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa'i byin
321b3(mdo sde): brlabs/mi chags pa'i spyod yul gyi ye shes la 'jug pa/dga' ba rgya chen po rab tu skyed pa/dran pa dang /blo gros dang /rtogs pa la 'jug pa/kun nas mo smad
321b4(mdo sde): pa/ye shes kyis rnam par do byed pa/de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa la 'jug pa/phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par mngon du bstod pa/yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad dpag tu
321b5(mdo sde): med pa na bzhugs te/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor/slob ma shin tu
321b6(mdo sde): dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs ni mnga'/chos thams cad la ni mnga' brnyes/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i bya ba ni shin tu mkhyen/dbang po dam pa'i pha
321b7(mdo sde): rol tu ni byon/sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'jom pa la ni mkhas shing /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun
322a1(mdo sde): gyis grub pa ni rgyun ma bcad do//dge slong sa ya phrag drug gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig ste/thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang
322a2(mdo sde): ldan pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'jom pa la brtson pa de bzhin
322a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/dmigs su med pa'i chos las nges par byung ba/spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs/
322a4(mdo sde): pa/sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go/sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i byang chub
322a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med pa gzhal du med pa tshad med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
322a6(mdo sde): med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig ste/thams cad kyang sems kyi skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro
322a7(mdo sde): ba la mkhas pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa/chos nyan pa la mi ngoms par yang dag par tshol ba rtag tu
322b1(mdo sde): rgyun mi chad par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa la brtson pa/thabs dang shes rab dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la rab
322b2(mdo sde): tu gnas pa/rtog pa dang /rnam par rtog pa dang /spros pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa sha sta ga la
322b3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' glogs kyi lha zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnam
322b4(mdo sde): par snang mdzad snying po zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gnon pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' yid gnyis yang dag par 'jom
322b5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bsgrags ldan zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par lta ba'i mig ces bya ba dang /byang chub sems
322b6(mdo sde): dpa' mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab
322b7(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med gzhal du med/dpag gis mi lang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag dang yang thabs cig go//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa chen
323a1(mdo sde): po'i le'u zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la rab tu ston te 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam
323a2(mdo sde): grangs 'di bshad pa na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khrod cing bkod pa chen po'i khang po ro rtsegs pa'i nang na bdag 'dug pasnyam du
323a3(mdo sde): sems so//khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi bkod pa nyid sems can rnams kyi mig sngar du snang bar gyur te/khang pa brtsegs pa nu 'khod pa'i byang chub sems
323a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyan thos chen po rnams dang /gzhan yang lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za'i 'khor de dag thams cad
323a5(mdo sde): ma gtogs par stong gsum gyi stod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba lhag ma gzhan thams cad myed par gyur te thams cad kyang num mkha'
323a6(mdo sde): lta bur gyur pa snyam du shes so//'di lta ste dper na/bskal pas shin tu bsregs te nu ma mkha' bzhin du gyur pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
323a7(mdo sde): gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba gang yang mig sngar snang bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/de'i tshe na gang gzugs su snang ba rnams sems can dag gi mig sngar
323b1(mdo sde): mi snang bar gyur to//'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba na byang chub sems dpa'
323b2(mdo sde): de dag gi khyang ba brtags pa yongs su longs spyod pa de 'dra ba'i khang pa btsugs pa de na snang ngo //nam mkha' lta khang pa brtsegs pa 'dug pa de drag mo gtogs par sbyong
323b3(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chenu po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa'i steng dang /gzhi'i bar du thams cad kyang mi snang ba snyam du rab tu shes te/de'i rgyal po ri rab dang khyor yug gi
323b4(mdo sde): dang khyor yug gi ri chen po dag sems can gang gi mig sngar yang mi snang bar gyur to//grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /yul 'khoraru dang /rgyal
323b5(mdo sde): po'i pho brang 'khor rnams kyang mi snang ste/gzhan du nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag nyin du shes shing /bcom ldan 'das kyis seng gle'i khri
323b6(mdo sde): ni 'thung du dpag tshad khrir 'phags pa rab tu smyung ngo //gang la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i seng ge'i khri de'i 'od kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
323b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/gang stong gsum gyi snying chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i nyi ma dang /zla ba dang /skar ma dang /brgya byin
324a1(mdo sde): dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od de dag thams cad kyang mog mog por byas par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag
324a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul ngo mtshar dang rmod du byung ba mthong nas phan tshun du smras pa khang pa brtsegs pa 'di bkod pa ci 'dra ba de ni bdag cag gi tshe'i tshad
324a3(mdo sde): bskal par 'dug par gyur kyang bdag cag gis rgya cher rnam par dbye ba bstan par sla ba ma yin te/de tsam du khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi yon tan bkod pa ni
324a4(mdo sde): tshad med do zhes 'dzer te//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus gnas brtan shA ri'i bu khang pa brtsegs pa de nas langs nas nam mkha' la 'dug ste/pus mo
324a5(mdo sde): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btud nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
324a6(mdo sde): 'das nam mkha' la mchis pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di ma lags pa gzhan stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkhar gyur
324a7(mdo sde): cing nam mkha'i rang bzhin can du gda' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu khyod kyis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di
324b1(mdo sde): mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu khyod kyis khakhung pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi bsngags pa yongs
324b2(mdo sde): su brjod pa'i mtha' shes par nus sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi tshe'i tshad bas par gyur kyang khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi bsngags pa'i mtha'
324b3(mdo sde): rtogs par mi nus so//bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu ji ltar na 'kho 'di dag thams cad nam mkha' la song zhing khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen por zhugs par snang bzhin
324b4(mdo sde): du bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khang pa brtsegs pa de'ang 'di 'dra'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gang gi
324b5(mdo sde): phyogs na mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de ni 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis yongs su
324b6(mdo sde): gong ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'das pa na bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba
324b7(mdo sde): da lta bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub kyi sems rin po che las rin po che gzhan
325a1(mdo sde): mi 'byung ngo //dwe da sAnA de bzhin gshegs pa de rin po che bko pa gcig bzhis bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang nam byang chub sems
325a2(mdo sde): dpa' de dag la chos 'chad pa de na seng ge'i khri dang bcas te tA la bye ba phrag brgyad cu srid kyi nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon par 'phag go/byang chub sems dpa' de
325a3(mdo sde): dgra kyang khang pa brdegs pa bkod pa chen po der nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon par 'phags nas/de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos nyon te de bzhin gshegs
325a4(mdo sde): pa de'ang nam mkha'i dkyil ljongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston to//shA ri'i bu bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na grang
325a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i yongs su longs spyod pa de ni bskal par yang brjod mi nus so//shA ri'i bu khyod kyis nga'i seng ge'i khri 'di
325a6(mdo sde): mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin
325a7(mdo sde): po che bkod pa gcig pa de'i seng ge'i khri'ang 'di 'dra ste/rdul bcom ldan 'das de bzhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis
325b1(mdo sde): 'jugs nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston to//rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa na ma mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i
325b2(mdo sde): chos kyi phyag rgya de gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dngos po med pos chos thams cad yod pa dang med pa dang bral ba dang /rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos thams cad
325b3(mdo sde): dngos po med pa dang /snang bar gyur pa med pas chos thams cad rnam par rig pa med pa dang /rgyu dang dmigs pa med pas chos thams cad snang bar gyur pa med pa
325b4(mdo sde): dang /nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid pas chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa dang /gnyis su med pas chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang /so so tha dad pa med pas chos
325b5(mdo sde): thams cad gnyis su med pa dang /tshul gcig la zhugs pas chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa dang /ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang bral bas chos thams cad tshul gcig
325b6(mdo sde): pa dang /dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang /thams cad la mi gnas pas chos thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil dang /
325b7(mdo sde): thams cad du mi snang bas chos thams cad mi gnas pa'i sgo dang /yul gyi lam las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad snang ba med pa dang /nang dang phyi'i
326a1(mdo sde): rnam par dag pas chos thams cad yul med pa dang /rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas chos thams cad rnam par dgra pa dang /
326a2(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid kyis nye bar zhi bas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su drug pa dang /sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa med pas chos thams cad nye bar ni ba dang /
326a3(mdo sde): bzod ma nas ma byung bas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang /nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma byung ba dang /bdag po med
326a4(mdo sde): pas chos thams cad nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag po med pa dang /gzod ma nas rnam par dag pas
326a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa dang /ldog pa med pas chos thams cad gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa dang /sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin
326a6(mdo sde): pas chos thams cad ldog pa med pa dang /dngos po med pas chos thams cad rgyu ma lta bu dang /mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos thams cad
326a7(mdo sde): dngos po med pa dang /sems dang lus dben pas chos thams cad mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang /mtshan nyid med cing mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i mtshan nyid
326b1(mdo sde): medangs chos thams cadang rin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid las ma g.yos pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang /gnas dmigs su med pa su chos
326b2(mdo sde): thams cad ma g.yos pa dang /dmigs pa med pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas pas chos thams cad gnas med pa dang /kun gzhi med pas chos thams cad dmigs pa
326b3(mdo sde): med pa dang /kun gzhi dang bral bas chos thams cad kun gzhi med pa ste/shA ri'i bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de byang chub sems dpa'
326b4(mdo sde): de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston te/de thos pas kyang byang chub sems dpa'
326b5(mdo sde): tshad med pa dag mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa la bzod pa chos thams cad la dbang byed pa rjes su thob bo//yang shA ri'i blo bkad pa chen po'i
326b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyis khams de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pas brgyan cing /bskal pa grangs med par gtong ba'i rjes su stong pa/tshul khrims kyis brgyan cing
326b7(mdo sde): bro shin tu byang ba/bzod pas brgyan cing sems can thams cad la zho 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/brtson 'grus kyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi chos
327a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa/bsam gtan gyis brgyan cing bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par
327a2(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang /mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtsen pa/shes rab kyis brgyan cing bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang
327a3(mdo sde): bral ba/byams pa chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par gnas pa/snying rje chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi
327a4(mdo sde): gtong bar gnas pa/dga' ba chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad dga' ba dang bde ba rab tu dga' ba la so sor 'god pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa/btang snyoms
327a5(mdo sde): chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad mi mtho mi dma' ba la 'god pa rgyun mi gcod par sbyor ba sha stag go/yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
327a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod ces bya ba 'dug ste/bsod
327a7(mdo sde): nams kyi gzi brjid kyis shin tu brjed pa/ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med pa/mtshan rnams kyis lus brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis byams pa
327b1(mdo sde): brgyan pa/spobasangs dge brgyan pa/gzungs nas sems brgyan pa/thos pas dran pa brdzun pa/nges par sems pas bden pa brgyan pa/rtog pas ngon rtogs pa
327b2(mdo sde): brtan pa/bsam pas dam bcas pa brdzun pa/khyad par du 'gro bas lhag pa'i bsdam pa brgyan pa/sbyor bas brgyan cing chos thams cad la the tshom med par gyur
327b3(mdo sde): pa/btang skams chen pos brgyan cing mtho dman med pa/mngon par shes pa chen pos brgyan cing rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtsen pa thams cad mngon par shes pa/bsod
327b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis bai rtan cing lag na rin po che gtong bas mngon par grub pa/ye shes kyis brgyan cing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa la zhugs pa/blos brgyan
327b5(mdo sde): cing sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rna ba rtogs par byed pa/mig gis brgyan cing mig lnga'i yul la shin tu rnam par dag pa/rna bas brgyan rnying sgra dang don thams cad
327b6(mdo sde): rtogs pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/so so yang dag par rig pas brgyan cing don dang chos deng nges pa'i tshig dang stobs pa sa so yang dag par rig pa mi zad par ston pa/
327b7(mdo sde): stobs kyis brgyan cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rjes su thob pa/mi 'jigs pas brgyan cing phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa yin tan
328a1(mdo sde): /ung na ngas su nas kyiso tanamatha' grus pa / na ci smra'i blugasas su sa sgrog gas ga pa sas sung /
328a2(mdo sde): snang bas brgyan cing sangs rgyas chos thams cad lag mthil du thob pa/'od kyis brgyan cing skyengs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang byar b+had bA/kuni nas ston
328a3(mdo sde): ces brgyan cing phyud par lung ston pa/gdams pa dang rjes su bsnun pas brgyun rnyed dbyed pa'i chos rmer phyin pa/rdzu 'phrul gyi/tshe 'phrul gyis brgyan cing
328a4(mdo sde): 'am rnam par dag pasna rnam par snrel ba thams cad sbyin pa skyed sa rgyam thams cad kyis mngon par bstud pa sgo ba rgyan ning gzhan la dag sa'i smra pa'i se gas la/
328a5(mdo sde): tshogs rnams cad kyi yon tan m+b+ha bAn+dan d+hings mi rgyas thams cad kyi chos 'dril ba'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/shArlu'i du gung bkod pa 'ang la bkun
328a6(mdo sde): mi byang chub sems dpa'i nam mkha'i mdzod kyi b+hin nas rlabs so//'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen byinam ma khri'i mdzod de ngul ba/ba dang /phyog
328a7(mdo sde): sbyin bkur byed pa dang /'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu yongs su bzung ba dang /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham pa nas dus pa 'byang du
328b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di dag chos kyi dga' ba dang /bde ba dang /mchog tu dga' bskyed pa dang /theg pa chen po 'dri'ang rab tu yongs su gzung ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
328b2(mdo sde): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nga'i kun du 'ong ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod de bzhin gshegs
328b3(mdo sde): pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de la gsol nas/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu mngon du gyur pa'i
328b4(mdo sde): 'phrul mngon par 'du mi byed pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas m-i snang bar gyur te/sems kyi
328b5(mdo sde): skad cig gcig byung ba tsam gyis mi mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin nas de bar snang la 'dug ste/bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi me tog dang /phreng bya
328b6(mdo sde): dang /phye ma dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba da ni ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i char rab tu phab pa/'di lta ste/zla ba dang /zla ba chen po
328b7(mdo sde): dang /shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang /nyi ma'i 'od dang /nyi ma rab tu 'bar ba dang /me shel dang /mdog mdzes dang /mdog mdzes chen po dang /mdog mdzes
329a1(mdo sde): na pa dang /sbrum dang /sgrapa rten po dang /skal rabya ma rjes dang /rjes sbed pa dang /banan drim myong pa d+ma ma da /
329a2(mdo sde): du s+yAng dang /rnam mkha'i phreng ba dang /reg kyi dang /dri chen de//8 dang /'dab brgya pa dang / bsteng ldan dang /m-i ngan sel bu dang /dga' byud dang/
329a3(mdo sde): dang /b+h+rUM ri me tog dang /dga' ba bde bkun skyed pa dang /bsam gtan yan lag dang /dris dga' ba ded /lus sems tshim byed dang /stong gsum dzod dri/
329a4(mdo sde): ni kun nI n+yA dang /na kun sel dang /bdag g-i gzi brjid kyis brgyan cing dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyis grub pa/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpas
329a5(mdo sde): pa de lta bu'o me tog gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu khebs par byas pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
329a6(mdo sde): du mi tog gis pus mA nu hrIsh+tsam gung bar myur to//de nas rnams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sngon ma thos ma mthong ba'i me tog du mtha~Md nas bcom ldan
329a7(mdo sde): 'dzi skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i me tog bltan sdug pa 'di dag ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skyes
329b1(mdo sde): dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod dag/ pa rgyan po 'jig na gyi khams dra nas 'angs te nam mkha' rjel du 'dug nas 'di lta bu'i ma
329b2(mdo sde): go char rab tu bab po//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis pa 'di dag dang lhan cig
329b3(mdo sde): nur mkha'i dkyil de nas babs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas lan gsum bskor ba byos te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
329b4(mdo sde): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig po de bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/nyam du ni chung ngam/bskyod pa yang
329b5(mdo sde): ngam/stobs dang bde ber reg pa la gnas sam zhes spyan gsol zhing /byang chub sems dpe' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzad la sogs pa byang chub sems
329b6(mdo sde): dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyon 'tshal ba 'di dag ji ltar chos thams cad la dbang ba myed cing /chos chen po dang
329b7(mdo sde): ldan pos slar ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi bka' mchid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis mgu bor mdzad cig ces de skad kyang gsung ngo //de nas byang chub sems
330a1(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad stong phrag bcu tsam gyi rin po che'i gdugs byin gyis
330a2(mdo sde): brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/chos dang don dang yon tan ye shes 'phags
330a3(mdo sde): par na//yongs dag rname dag snga nas dag cing dri ma med//gnas med nam mkha' dri ba mi g.yo rab tu brnyes//rab zab kun nas spyod yul min la phyag 'tshal
330a4(mdo sde): lo/rgyal ba chos kyi skus ni rab phye sku mnyam yang //gzugs mdzes ldan zhing gzugs bzang sku yang ston par mdzad//sems can rnams la phan pa'i
330a5(mdo sde): thugs rje rab bskyed nas//bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyi sku yi mchog kyang ston//khyod ni mi gsung rtog med sgra dang tshig kyang med//tshig gi rang bzhin
330a6(mdo sde): brag ca'i mtshan nyid gzung du med//sgra modado rtags med yi ge med pa mkhyen nas kyang //byams pa khyod ni snying rje can pas rgyal ba'i tshig kyang gsung //
330a7(mdo sde): sems can kun gyi sems dang sems byung rjes su rig/khyod ni sems kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid mkhyen//sems kyi rgyud kyi rang bzhin ji 'dra rab
330b1(mdo sde): mkhyen kyang //sems dang yid rnams la ni khyod kyi sems mi gnas//'gro ba rnams la khyed kyis spyod pa kun bstan te//bde bar gshegs pa'i sku ni 'gyur ba yong ma
330b2(mdo sde): mchis//gang gi gzugs dang sems dang yon tan ci 'dra bar//mtshan deng spyid lam+ba dag kyang de yo tshul du ston//bde gshegs chos 'di la ni nga yir 'dzin pa med//
330b3(mdo sde): khyod ni chos la gnas pa med cing 'dzin pa med//sems can mang po kun rtogs chos kyi 'dul mkhyen nas//khyod ni bla na med pa'i chos rnams rtag tu ston//rgyal ba'i//
330b4(mdo sde): sgrol 'khor 'di kun gyis bltas pa na//gzugs dang mtshan ma tha dad bskal pa mi mnyam nas//khyod kyi sku ni mi 'gyur rtog med mchin med de//'khor rnams
330b5(mdo sde): ji lta'i sems dang bsam bzhin tshim par mdzod//chos 'di thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa ste//byed med ngo bo nyid med kun tu rtog la skyes//bde gshegs
330b6(mdo sde): de 'dra'i chos kyi tshul rnams mkhyen nas su//byang chub mi 'gyur zhi ba blo ni med po brnyes//mtha' dang de bzhin dbus bcad rnam par rtog po med//stong zhing
330b7(mdo sde): gsog la rang bzhin gso ba ste ya ma brla//khyod kyis de 'dra chos nyid rnam dag mkhyen nas su//'gro ba rnams la rgyu dang las dang byed pa ston//chos 'disems
331a1(mdo sde): da da// 'dus ma smras las mas nan mang sa sa//'byu zlas na skyeng du /
331a2(mdo sde): ga ban+d+ha m+b+ha//sgrub pa pa pa nan tan mtshan ny-id b+h+ya/nga pa sbed de'i don darjes par da/
331a3(mdo sde): panyidan mnyam par ba zhig mkhyen pas//rab dang 'bring dang tha ma dag kyang mnyam par mkhyen//mnyam pa nyid la mtsham nyid drug bzhugs rnapa hU~M
331a4(mdo sde): daphyir la mnyam par banig bang mi 'gyur ba//phreng po khams dang dbyung ba skar ma ldanan//'jog rten gsum pa hU~Mn 'di ste 'bre brum /
331a5(mdo sde): can rnams ni rmi lam lta zlar dngas med de//mkhyen pas rmi lam bzhin du gas nis chos 'di gsung //byang chub mchog rab brda yi rang ba ni
331a6(mdo sde): brgyas//de na thab dang ma thob pa zhes brjod du med//ji myur byang chub khyod kyis de bzhin 'khor mi yang //rdul dang tshul med mjug
331b1(mdo sde): bskor//rgal nas sems can mang po bsam yas rab sgrol ba//grol nas bcings pa'i nang na mchis pa shin tu grol//theg chen bla med 'di la 'gro ba dbugs
331b2(mdo sde): 'byin cing //nges 'byin mnyam pa brnyes pa mya ngan 'das la 'god//gang na sems can+da nAm yang mya ngan 'das ma mchis//sems can gdod nas rnam dag
331b3(mdo sde): sems can nyid mi sgrub//sems can sgyu mra'i mtshan du byang chub sangs rgyas nas//'di yi mtha' rnams sems can mang po rtogs par mdzad//nam mkha'
331b4(mdo sde): la ni gzugs rnams nam+b+ha yang mi snang bzhin//de ltar 'gro bya kun gyi gzugs ni gzugs nyid mtshungs//chos de gzugs dang gzugs med gzugs min
331b5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid de//gang gis de ltar don rnams yang dag dben rtogs pa//ci tsam rgyal ba'i bsngags pa dag gis dper bgyis pa//de dag thams cad
331b6(mdo sde): bsngags pa 'di la mthong chags te//rang gi yon tan rnams kyi 'dren bsngags nam mkha' 'dra//gnyis med bsngags brjod de ni rgyal ba'i bsngags
331b7(mdo sde): pa'i//sangs rgyas 'gro ba sad par mdzad cing dmigs med pa//sems med sems nyid brnyes pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//ji ltar 'dren pa kun gyi mi
332a1(mdo sde): seng ge bsngags//de ltar de bzhin nyid phyir yang dag yon tan bsngags//sems can thams cad bdag med mtshan nyid ye shes mnyam//
332a2(mdo sde): thams cad rtogs nas chos dbyings rjes su rig par bgyi//chos kun 'dod chags bral ba mtshan gyi tshul shes pa//des ni mnyam pa nyid kyis 'dren pa mchod
332a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras ma thag tu/nam mkha' la 'dug pa'i
332a4(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs po bkod pa chen po de'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//bar snang las kyang gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med
332a5(mdo sde): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bre sgrubs pa/bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
332a6(mdo sde): po nom mkha' mdzad kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis kun tu brjod do//byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rmi lam na'ang mngon par zhen pas dmigs
332a7(mdo sde): par lta ba mi 'byung ngo //gang dag tshigs su bcad pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas mos pa dang /gang yang thos nas sgrub pa de dag ni ji ltar byang chub
332b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod dAltar song po'i sgra sgyogs pa bzhin du/de dag kyang song ga'i sgra stsogs par 'gyur ro zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo //de nas byang chub
332b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyi sa tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'dis bdag kyang 'dus pa chen
332b3(mdo sde): po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur
332b4(mdo sde): bgyi ba dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la'ang chos snang bar bgyi ba gang chung zad bstan pa'i slad du 'dir mchis so//bcom ldan 'das gang skyes bu dam po
332b5(mdo sde): 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rang rang gi chos la the tshom du gyur pa de ngos par bstan pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa la yongs su
332b6(mdo sde): zhus te/de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo la rab tu gunasna pas de dag gi the tshom thams cad kyang rab tu bsil cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar
332b7(mdo sde): bgyis pa de legs so//bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la skabs phyen chos rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa'i bka' mchid rlung
333a1(mdo sde): zad cig bdag zhu'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das ni mi chags pa'i ye shes can te sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog
333a2(mdo sde): dang mchog ma lags pa mkhyen pa ye shes la mkhas pa/bcom ldan 'das ni snang ba brnyes pa ste mun pa thams cad dang bral ba/bcom ldan 'das ni don
333a3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa ste tshigs thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/bcom ldan 'das ni dus mkhyen pa ste tshod las mi 'da' zhing phyed par lung ston pa/bcom
333a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ni tshod mkhyen pa ste sems can thams cad la so so ci rig par chos ston pa/bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par rol pa ste mngon por shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul
333a5(mdo sde): gyi rkang pa rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/bcom ldan 'das ni shin tu rnam par gzigs pa'i blo dang ldan pa ste sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi
333a6(mdo sde): spyod pa phyag mthil du 'jog par kun tu ston pa/bcom ldan 'das ni mngon par 'phags pa ste spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/bcom ldan 'das ni zil
333a7(mdo sde): gyis mnon pa ste stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dpa' bo gcig po//bcom ldan 'das ni rang byung ba ste slob dpon med par chos
333b1(mdo sde): thams cad rang gis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren pa ste 'dren pa med pa dang lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la thar pa dag pa'i
333b2(mdo sde): lam ston pa/bcom ldan 'das ni sman pa'i rgyal po ste thog ma dang the ma ma mchis pa'i 'dod pa dang /nyon mongs pa dang /kun tu bsgribs pa dang /shin tu
333b3(mdo sde): bsgribs pa dang /kun nas ldang bas bsgribs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa rnams nad ma mchis pa 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i gnas kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa/bcom
333b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ni stobs dang drag shul 'chang ba ste gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa la mkhas shing gsum rig pa'i rig pa brnyes pa/bcom ldan 'das ni mi
333b5(mdo sde): 'dzegs pa chen po brnyes pa ste zag pa zad cing mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa la
333b6(mdo sde): mkhas pa/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du khyu mchog seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa
333b7(mdo sde): ste dus gsum la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes can bcom ldan 'das ni sku dang gsung dang thugs yongs su dag pa ste 'khrul pa dang ca co mi mnga' ba/snyims
334a1(mdo sde): par 'jug pa thams cad dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa/bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa chen po la gnas pa ste zhe 'grus pa med pa'i
334a2(mdo sde): blo dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i 'ad zer gyis gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa/bcom ldan 'das
334a3(mdo sde): ni thugs rje chen po la gnus pa ste legs par byas pa dang /nyes par byas pa dang /bde ba dang sdug bsngal bas mi skyod pa/sems can thams cad la
334a4(mdo sde): mnyam par 'jug pa'i blo dang ldan pa/bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa ste mnyam pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa la zhugs pa//
334a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni bye brag med pa ste nam mkha' lta bur shin tu rnam par dag cing sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor ba/bcom ldan 'das ni 'dod
334a6(mdo sde): pa med pa ste shes rab kyis ngoms pa/rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang /tshigs su bcad pa dang bral ba/bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad
334a7(mdo sde): gzigs pa spyan lnga'i tshul yongs su dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan deng chos dang ye shes tshad ma mchis pa dang /
334b1(mdo sde): ldan pa bdag gis rig nas chos rab tu brjod pa'i sgra yongs su zhu bar 'tshal te gus pa dang bcas shing chos la gces smras su bgyi ba dang ldan pa ste/nga rgyal ma
334b2(mdo sde): mchis shing sems can thams cad chos la sbyor ba/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par sgrub pas chos 'chal ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la
334b3(mdo sde): yongs su zhu'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
334b4(mdo sde): to/legs so legs so//skyes bu dam pa ji ltar gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dris pa rnams lung bstan pa thob pa rigs
334b5(mdo sde): kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang dris pa de dang de nyid du lung bsten pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//de nas
334b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa'
334b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so//ci zhig gi phyir rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar 'dod/de nas byang
335a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyis rgyal po rab tu snang ba ra/
335a2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa slar smras pa/gang rnams sems dang sems la sems yid mtshungs//shin tu bsams sems ye shes mnyam la gnas
335a3(mdo sde): sems la sems med par ni zhugs pa'i tshul//de dag don du rgyal la bdag zhu'o//snang ba thob cing mun pa dri ma med//yid gnyis can gyi yid gnyis
335a4(mdo sde): blo gcod pa//nges byas rnam par thar pa la gzhug pa//de dag ched du bde bar gshegs la zhu//bdag la bdag myed shin+da tu rnam dag yid//sems
335a5(mdo sde): can don zhugs sems can med la dga'//sems can bdag med gnyis las thar byed pa//rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi gtam 'di'o//cho ga spyod
335a6(mdo sde): yul brtul zhugs yongs su dag/bsam pa dag cing sems ni nam mkha' 'dra//lhun po lta bur brtan cing mi g.yo ba//de dag ched du don yo
335a7(mdo sde): mdzad la zhu//mi zlogs brtan pa brtson 'grus kun nas bzang //dpa' bo bdud kyi dgra ying rgyal bcom//nyon mongs rab tu nyon mongs dri
335b1(mdo sde): sbyor ba//mthong dga' de dag don du 'dri zhu'o//thos sbyin tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga'//bsgom gtan na mthar shes rab mchog tu gyur//mngon
335b2(mdo sde): shes pasam gtan rnam par glal po'i 'dri//rab dag du med don du bdag 'o//stong pa mtshan ma med cing ma smin gnas//bsams bzhin ni 'byong ngan
335b3(mdo sde): skye ba ston//skyes pa med cing myi gnas 'chi 'pho med//de dag don du mi yi spyod pa zhu//nyan thos rang rgyal skye bo gzhan dag gis//rtogs par dka' zhing
335b4(mdo sde): zab mo mthong dka' ba//skye bo kun gyi yid rnams kun skul ba'i//chos kyi gtam ni bde b.raru gshegs la zhu//legs par byas pa rdzogs pa'i chos la
335b5(mdo sde): dga'//chos la chos modo 'dzin pa gnyis las grol//rtag tu mnyam bzhag mchog gi chos la dga'//sems kyang na mo mkha' mtshungs pa'i don du
335b6(mdo sde): zhu//gang dgu sangs rgyas rigs gnas chos la dge'//rtag tu sangs rgyas bstod pa kun med blo//grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum du thos//
335b7(mdo sde): yon tan rgya mtsho de phyir 'di zhu'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol
336a1(mdo sde): to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/tshul khrims nam mkha'
336a2(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa dang /bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs
336a3(mdo sde): pa dang /shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams
336a4(mdo sde): lags/sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /gtong ba rjes su
336a5(mdo sde): dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams legs//
336a6(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'ang spyod de sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa
336a7(mdo sde): rnams lags/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mtshig gi mdzod 'dzin pa dang /mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos gang de bzhin
336b1(mdo sde): gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang /thog mu nas sems can rnam par dag pas

336b3(mdo sde): lcags/mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang bgyid pa rnams lags/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shun tu
336b4(mdo sde): rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la zhugs pa rnams lags/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te mtha' gnyis su
336b5(mdo sde): lta ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa shes pa mkhas pa rnams lags//
336b6(mdo sde): chachos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs shIng chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yong dag par gzhol ba rnams logs/bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de theg
336b7(mdo sde): chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba rnams lags/sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa rnams lags//
337a1(mdo sde): gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa rnams lags/spobs pa thogs pa med pa rgyun mi chad la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
337a2(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs pa rnams lags/skye ba dang 'tsho 'pho ba dang /'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa rnams lags/bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par
337a3(mdo sde): 'ongs shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa rnams lags/bsod nams kyis tshogs tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad kyi 'a
337a4(mdo sde): bar gyur pa rnams lags/sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa rnams lags/rgya mtsho'i

337a6(mdo sde): 'odas pa dang nam mkha' la rlung dmar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa rnams lcogs/cho ga dang spyod pa'i tshul shes pa dang mun pa dang bral shing snang ba thob pa
337a7(mdo sde): rnams lags/gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang byung gi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa rnams lags/myur du theg pa chen po las thams cad mkhyen pa'i
337b1(mdo sde): ye shes 'di thob par 'gyur ba lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la
337b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs so//skyes bu dam pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs
337b3(mdo sde): so//'di lta ste khyod ni sems can thams cad kyis gsol ba ma btab pa'i bshos gnyen sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa/byams pa chen po
337b4(mdo sde): dang snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa/bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/rtag tu chos las mi ngoms pa/ye shes kyi mtshon cha can
337b5(mdo sde): nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can gyi don la brtson pa/'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las yang dag par
337b6(mdo sde): 'das pa/nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa ste/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyi
