338a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams kyis yon tan 'di rnams dang gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba bshad do//bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas bya
338a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang
338a3(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag pa la
338a4(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang /sems can rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang /sbyin pa rnam par dag pas bsngo ba rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang /
338a5(mdo sde): bsngo ba rnam par drag pas byang chub rnam par dag po la 'jug pa ste/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha'
338a6(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa yin no//des rnam par dag pa brgyad kyi sgo nus sbyin pa de byin te/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ngar 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin
338a7(mdo sde): pa de byin/nga yir 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/rgyu rnam par drug par sbyin pa de byin/lte bo rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/mtshan
338b1(mdo sde): ma rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/tha dad pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/rnam par smin pa la mi re bA rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/nam mkha' dang
338b2(mdo sde): mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin te/de rnam par dag pa brgyad po 'di dag gi sgo nas sbyin pa de byin no//dz+ha ltar nAm mkha' mtha' med pa
338b3(mdo sde): de bzhin du sems mtha' med par byas te sbyin pa de byin/ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che zhing sgribs pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub tu bsngos te sbyin pa de byin/ji ltar
338b4(mdo sde): nam mkha' la gzugs med pa de bzhin du gzugs thams cad la mi gnas par sbyin pa de byin/ji ltar nam mkha' la tshor ba med pa de bzhin du tshor ba thams cad
338b5(mdo sde): dang bral bar sbyin pa de byin/ji ltar nam mkha' la 'du shes med pa de bzhin du 'du shes thams cad kyi mdud pa med par sbyin pa de byin/ji ltar nam mkha'
338b6(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas po de bzhin du 'dus byas thams cad med par sbyin pa de byin/ji ltar nam mkha' mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa myed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ma
338b7(mdo sde): gnas par sbyin pa de byin/ji ltar nam mkha' sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la khyab pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la byams pas khyib par sbyin pa de byed/
339a1(mdo sde): ji ltar nam mkha' mi zud pa de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi zad par bsngo zhing sbyin pa de byin/ji ltar nam mkha' la mun pa med
339a2(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi mun po med par sbyin pa de byin/ji ltar nam mkha'i rtag par rab tu snang ba de bzhin du sems kyi rang bzhin yongaso
339a3(mdo sde): su dag par sbyin pa de byin/ji ltar na ma mkha' sems can thams cad kyi go skabs 'byed pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar sbyin pa de
339a4(mdo sde): byin/ji ltar nam mkha' la nga yi ba med pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad yid lo byed pa thams cad dang bral bar sbyin pa de byin/ji lta ro sprul pas
339a5(mdo sde): sprul pa la sbyin pa de byin pa lta bur rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub ste/sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral zhing chos thams cad la re ba med
339a6(mdo sde): ba de ltar gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag par byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa de byin te/rigs kyi bu gang de lta bur
339a7(mdo sde): sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de ni shes rab kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su 'dor zhing thabs kyi ye shes kyi
339b1(mdo sde): na sems can thams cad mi gtong ba ste/rigs kyi bu de lta bur mi gtong ba'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no//de nas byung
339b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na mar mAM zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
339b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'di 'dra ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu byang
339b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de dag gi rnam pa med pa ste rnam par dag pa/sems can gyi rnam pa ste/sems can rnam par dag pa/chos kyi
339b5(mdo sde): rnam pa ste/chos rnam par dag pa/ye shes kyi rnam pa ste/ye shes rnam par dag pa/shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/shes rab rnam par dag pa/sems
339b6(mdo sde): kyi rnam pa ste/sems rnam par dag pa/'jig rten gyi rnam pa skye/'jig rten rnam par dag pa/gzugs med pa ste gzugs su ston pa dang mi ston pa'i
339b7(mdo sde): ye shes rnam par dag pa/mun pa med cing mun pa rab tu snang bar byed pa/mtshan ma thams cad rnam par baM shig pas mtshan ma med pa'i mthar gyur pa/
340a1(mdo sde): mthar byin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa/mi zad pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan pa'i lung bstan pa
340a2(mdo sde): thob pa/mtshams bcod cing byang chub sems dpa' nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa/phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab cing dbang bskur ba thob pa/sangs rgyas
340a3(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par zhugs zhing mnyam pa nyid kyi mnyam par spyod pa/legs par spyod pa la spyad pa/sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i
340a4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid dang chog shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi spyod yul te/skyes bu dam pa de dang de dag ni de lta bu'i sbyin pa byin par
340a5(mdo sde): byed do//bstun pa 'di bshod pa na byang chub sems dpa' khri drug skyong nam mkha'i dang mtshungs pa'i sbyin pa la bzod pa stes so//de nas bcom ldan
340a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//dag pa'i sems kyis rtag tu sbyin pa byin//byang chub phyir te rnam smin yong mi 'dod//dga'
340a7(mdo sde): zhing mgu nas rjes su gdung med de//rab tu grol nas rtag tu sbyin pa byin//mkhas pas chos rnams sgyu 'dror shes nos su//lus dang sreg la'ang chags
340b1(mdo sde): bar mo 'gyur zhing //de dag la ni nam yang 'dzin pa med//de ltar de dag bsam pa byang chub nges//thams cad gtad yang mi dgar mi 'gyur zhing //de la num
340b2(mdo sde): pa med de gong ba med//de yis nam mkha' mtshungs par chos rnams bsgoms//ngo bas dga' bar mi 'gyur zhum pa med//bdag gi rang bzhin snga nas rnam par
340b3(mdo sde): dag/byang chub rnam par dag pas sbyin pa byin//de ni sems kyi rgyud la mi chags par//spros pa med par sbyin pa rab tu byin//sems mnyam yid kyang mnyam//
340b4(mdo sde): pas sbyin pa gtong //rab 'bring tha ma gsum yang med par sbyin//bsam pa yongs dag dri mi med pa yis//thams cad gtong yang rnam par smin mi 'dod//
340b5(mdo sde): lus dong tshe ni mi rtag sgyu ma 'dra//longs spyod rmi lam glog bzhin snying po med//'jig rten kun la snying rje brtse bskyed nas//'jig rten chos kyis mi gos sbyin
340b6(mdo sde): pa byin//nyon mongs dag phyir bdag gi nor kun gtong //rgyal ba'i tshig gi gnas su 'gyur snyam ste//bdud rnams kyis kyang bdag la glags mi rnyed//de ltar
340b7(mdo sde): brtogs nas thams cad gtong ba yin//stobs brgyas sbyin pa rtsa ba yin zhes gsungs//de la rab tu gnas na tshul khrims ldan/6/tshul khrims yon
341a1(mdo sde): tan gnas nas bsam gtan rnyed//bsam gtan ma chags shes rab rdzogs par byed//sbyin pa dang ni dul bas sems rab tshim//nyon mongs//
341a2(mdo sde): rnams kyang tshig nas phyir mi skye//sbyin pa bdag dang gzhan la phan par gsungs//phanu dang bde ba 'dus byas sbyin pas mgu//sbyin gtong nyon mongs
341a3(mdo sde): spang zhing dge ba'i phyir//des na 'dzin pa la ni chags mi 'gyur//pha rol nyon mongs phyir ni mi gtong ste//bdog blo rnam dag byang chub phyir gtong ngo //
341a4(mdo sde): ji lta ji ltar ma zhum sems kyis gtong //de ltar des ni byang chub yon tan mthong //ji lta ji ltar byang chub yon tan mthong //de lta de ltar sems can brgya
341a5(mdo sde): tshim byed//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu chos
341a6(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzugs
341a7(mdo sde): brnyan lta bu'i lus mnyam pa nyid dang /brag cha lta bu'i sgra mnyam pa nyid dang /sgyu ma lta bu'i sems mnyam pa nyid dang /nam mkha' lta bu'i blo mnyam
341b1(mdo sde): pa nyid de/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims nam+bu mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu brgyud po 'di dag ni
341b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshub khrims yongs su dag pa ste/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems dang mi
341b3(mdo sde): 'bral ba dang /tshad mar gyur pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir nyan+da thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med pa dang /dam bcas pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir bslab pa
341b4(mdo sde): thams cad mi 'dor ba dang /smon lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir skye ba thams cad du mi 'jug pa dang /mngon par 'du mi byed pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir phyir mi
341b5(mdo sde): ldog pa dang /mtshan ma yongs su dag pa'i phyir byang chub tu bsngo ba dang /nyon mongs pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir kun+do nas gdung ba med pa dang byang chub
341b6(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i phyir smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste/rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims yongs su rig pa'o//
341b7(mdo sde): gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni nam mkha' dag pa ste tshul khrims de yang dag pa'o//nam mkha' dri ma med pa ste tshul khrims de'ang dri ma
342a1(mdo sde): rnyed pa'o//nam mkha' zhi ba ste tshul khrims de'ang zhi ba'o//nam mkha' mi mtho ba ste tshul khrims de'ang mi mtho ba'o//nam mkha' mi dma'
342a2(mdo sde): ba ste tshul khrims de'ang mi dma' ba'o//nam mkha'i gzung nga med pa ste tshul khrims de'ang gzung du med pa'o//nam mkha' gnas med pa ste tshul khrims de'ang
342a3(mdo sde): gnas med pa'o//nam mkha' med pa ma yin te tshul khrims de'ang med pa ma yin pa'o//nam mkha' rtag pa ste tshul khrims de'ang rtag pa'o//nam mkha'
342a4(mdo sde): mi zad pa ste tshul khrims de'ang mi zad pa'o//nam mkha' mtshan ma med pa ste tshul khrims de'ang mtshan ma med pa'o//nam mkha' rgyu ba med pa ste tshul
342a5(mdo sde): khrims de'ang rgyu ba med pa'o//nam mkha' spros pa med pa skye tshul khrims de'ang spros pa med pa'o//nam mkha' zag pa med pa ste tshul khrims de'ang /
342a6(mdo sde): zag pa med pa'o//nim mkha' 'dus ma byas pa ste tshul khrims de'adi 'dus ma byas pa'o//nam mkha' mi 'gyur ba ste tshul khrims de'ang mi 'gyur
342a7(mdo sde): ba'o//nam mkha' rnam par mi rtog pa ste tshul khrims de'ang rnam par mi rtag pa'o//nam mkha' thams cad du song ba ste tshul khrims de'ang thams
342b1(mdo sde): cad du song ba'o//nam mkha' michod mi phyed pa ste tshul khrims de'ang mi chod mi phyed pa'o//nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor ba ste tshul khrims de'ang mtshungs par skyong
342b2(mdo sde): bya'o//nam mkha' rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste tshul khrims dri'ang rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o//rigs
342b3(mdo sde): kyi bu de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
342b4(mdo sde): dag gsungs so//sems kyi tshul khrims dri med srung zhing gdung ba med//lus dang sems kyang rnam dag ngag yid thams cad bsdams//mkhas pa rtag tu
342b5(mdo sde): nad zhi tshul khrims dregs mi snyems//blo 'chang sems la mi gnas byang chub sems la rton//las grang ma byas ma bsams de bzhin ma brtags te//de ni
342b6(mdo sde): dmar sngo ser min kha dog gzugs mi gnas//gzugs med mi badren mi g.yo dben pa nam mkha' bzhin//tshul khrims lta ba'i gnas med mkhas pa kun
342b7(mdo sde): gyis bsdigs//tshul khrims de ni rab zhi zhi byed nyon mongs zhi//zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gi mthar phyin mthar ston pa//gang su bcings las grol ba deng nga/
343a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims brten//de bas tshul khrims thar byed byang chub rtsa ba'i gzhi//gang su sbyangs pa dgon gnas 'dod nyung chog shes pa//yo byad brdungs
343a2(mdo sde): shing bsam gtan dben tshogs sems sbyangs pa//tshul khrims de yi gnas des sems rkang thar po'i rten//de phyir tshul khrims brgyan pa lam bde thar gnas
343a3(mdo sde): pa//g.yo ba rlom sems kun bral lta ba'i nyon mongs gtsang //nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam byams pas khyab cing mthar 'dzin spyod//byang chub phyir nges mi
343a4(mdo sde): gtong byang chub kun mi rtog/gang mkhas chos shes de 'dra tshul khrims pha rol phyin////'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis nus pa zhes bya ba//
343a5(mdo sde): bram po gnyis pa//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub
343a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshig nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir gshe yang slar mi gshe
343a7(mdo sde): ba dang /lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir brdegs kyang slar mi rdeg pa dang /sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spyos kyang slar mi spyo ba dang //
343b1(mdo sde): bsam pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir khros kyang slar mi khro ba ste/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshus /
343b2(mdo sde): ba yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dge ba 'di brgyud de/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nam
343b3(mdo sde): mkha' la zhe 'gras pa med de sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /nam mkha' la rjes su chags pa med de rnyed pa dang
343b4(mdo sde): bkur sti la rjes su chags pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang nam mkha' ni mnyam par sbyor ba ste sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'i bzod pa yongs
343b5(mdo sde): su dag pa dang /nam mkha' ni me smad ma nyams pa ste lus dang sems zad pas nyams pa med po'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /nam mkha' ni bag la nyal
343b6(mdo sde): thams cad spangs pa ste bag la nyal med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /num mkha' ni yid dang dmigs pa med pa ste yid dang dmigs pa med pa'i bzod
343b7(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag pa dang /nam mkha' ni ma skyes ma byung ba ste ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /nam mkha' ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa
344a1(mdo sde): thams cad la khyab pa ste byams pas khyab pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /rigs kyi bu brgyud po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
344a2(mdo sde): kyi bzod pa yongs su dgu pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa ni 'di
344a3(mdo sde): brgyad de/brgyud gang zhe na/stong pa nyid la bzod kyang lta ba gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang /mtshan ma med pa la bzod kyang mtshan ma sel ba ma yin pa
344a4(mdo sde): dang /sman pa med pa la bzod kyang byang chub tu smon pa meng+ga pa ma yin pa dang /mngon par 'du mi byed pa la bzod kyang 'dus byas rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir
344a5(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang /skye ba med pa la bzod kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid kyis ma yin pa dang /'byung ba med pa la bzod kyang skye bo drang gnas pas ma yin po dang //
344a6(mdo sde): sems can med pa la bzod kyang dngos po rnam par gzhog pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang /ji lta ba bzhin du bzod kyang dus rnam pa ro gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa ste/
344a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o//bzod pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag bdag la gshe'ang
344b1(mdo sde): brjod do snyam pa de ni du yir 'dzin pa'i maud bste 'di ni namam pa' dang ma tshungs pa'i brjod pa m+b+ha yin no//'di dag gshe ba bdag gis bzod par bya'o snyam pa de ni dang
344b2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'i bzod pa ste/de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no//'di dag ni yi ge basbyor ba'o snyam pa de ni sgra dang skad kyi bzod pa ste/de ni nam mkha'
344b3(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no//'di'ang stong pa bdag kyang stong pa'i snyam pa de ni yid la byed pa sbyor ba'i bzod pa ste/de ni nam mkha'i rung mtshungs pa'i bzod
344b4(mdo sde): pa ma yin no//bdag gis bzod pa bya'o//snyam pa de ni rnam par rig pa'i bzod pa ste/de ni nim mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no//'di lta ste/
344b5(mdo sde): dper nu shing sA la chen po'i tshul yod par la laM zhig 'ongs te/shing sku la bcad ni dril shing sA la bcad pa'i lhag ma rnams 'di snyam du 'di dag ni bcad do//
344b6(mdo sde): bdag ni ma bcad do snyam du mi sems te/de dag la rjes su chags pa'ang med/khong khri ba'ang med de mi rtog rnam par mi rtog yongs su mi rtog pa de bzhin du/gang
344b7(mdo sde): bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dag pa'i mchog go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
345a1(mdo sde): dag gsungs so//zad pa shes pa bzod pa mi zad gtsang //yid ni yul lo ma chags shin tu bsgoms//phyi nang shin tu rnam dag mi gnas pa//
345a2(mdo sde): nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam sems mchog bzod pa'o//lus 'di gzugs brnyan rtsi shing rtsig pa 'dra//sems kyang gzugs med mi snang sgyu ma 'dra//chos
345a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ba'i gnas med nam mkha' bzhin//lus kyang mi 'gyur yid la khro ba med//bkur sti byed la dga' dang zhe sdang med//mtho dang dma' bar rnam par rtog/
345a4(mdo sde): pa meng //theg pa gang 'dra sa ltar sbyor ba de//sems can dag par bstan 'dir bzod smra yin//srog med gang zag bdag med sems can med//chos
345a5(mdo sde): 'di thams cad stong par gang bzod cing //rgyu dang rkyen dang byed dang 'gal mi byed//de ni bstan 'dir bzod mchog yang dag nyid//kha ngan zer ba'i tshig
345a6(mdo sde): thos mi gashre zhing //byed pa med pa nam mkha'i sprin sgra bzhin//bdag rnam bsal yid stong pa'i mchog mthong de//bstan 'dir sems can gtsang ma
345a7(mdo sde): bzod smra yin//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi
345b1(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus nam mkhazhi dang mtshungs pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rtsom pa
345b2(mdo sde): yang chos thams cad yongs su ma grub par rab tu shes pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba mngon par 'du byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
345b3(mdo sde): rnams chos kyi sku mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can rnam par dag pos sems can mi dmigs pa
345b4(mdo sde): dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi
345b5(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
345b6(mdo sde): kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de brgyad gang zhe na brtson 'grus gang gis lus brgyan pa'i lus de gzugs brnyan lta bur rig pas mi dmigs pa
345b7(mdo sde): dang brtson 'grus gang gis tshig mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshig de ya ma brlang rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang /brtson 'grus gang gis sems ting nge
346a1(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi gnas su 'jog pa'i sems de sems kyi chos nyid kyis rnam par byartags te mi dmigs pa dang /brtson 'grus gang gis pha rol tu phyin
346a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyogs thams cad rab tu spyad par byed kyang de gcig nas gcig tu sems zed pa'i chos nyid kyis shin tu brtags te mi dmigs pa dang /brtson 'grus go
346a3(mdo sde): gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub kyang byang chub de dngos po'i mtshan nyid rnam par brtags te yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang //
346a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus gling gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i zhing de'ang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas rnam par brtags te mi dmyigs pa dang /brtson
346a5(mdo sde): 'grus gang gis thos pa thams cad 'dzin par byed pa de 'di skye brag cha dang mtshungs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /brtson 'grus gang gis
346a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrub pa de 'ong chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid du rnam par brtags nas mi dmigs pa ste/rigs kyi bu
346a7(mdo sde): brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa'o//rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams/
346b1(mdo sde): kyi brtson 'grus te/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus so//de la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ni lus
346b2(mdo sde): dang ngag dang sems dang rab tu ldan pa'o//yongs su chud pa'i brtson 'grus ni len pa med pa/'dor ba med pa gnas med pa ste/nam byang chub sems dpa'
346b3(mdo sde): lus dang ngag dang sems sbyor ba brtson 'grus rtsa ba nas mi gnas pa shin tu brtags nas mi dmigs shing yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni chos kyi rje sA su
346b4(mdo sde): 'jug pas rjes su 'gro ba ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no//ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs med cing
346b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad rab tu rgyu ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang chos thams cad la mi gnas shing sems can thams cad
346b6(mdo sde): yongs su smin par byed do//ji ltar nam mkho' gzugs thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing bla gab med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson
346b7(mdo sde): 'grus de'ang semaso can thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'o//ji ltar nam mkha' las ts+tsho dang /nags tshal dang /lo tog
347a1(mdo sde): skye'ang rtsa ba med cing gnas med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed kyang 'jig
347a2(mdo sde): tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba la gnas pa med do//ji ltar nam mkha' thams cad du song yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
347a3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus de'ang dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rjes su song yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no//ji ltar nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor zhing gzugs tha
347a4(mdo sde): da par ston pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sems can thams cad la chos thams cad mtshungs par sbyor zhing spyod pa sna
347a5(mdo sde): tshogs kun tu ston to//nam byang chub sems dpa' gang kun tu sgrub par byed pa de mnyam pa nyid pas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /gang la rtsom
347a6(mdo sde): pa de'ang rnam par brtags nas mi dmigs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no//de nas bcom
347a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyis mthu bskyed nas//lus dang srog la'ang phangs
347b1(mdo sde): par mi byed cing //bdag nyid chen po byang chub spyad pa spyod//sems can phan pa'i dron byed phan sems pa//sngon gyi srid par 'dus byas ci srid pa//byang chub
347b2(mdo sde): yon tan phyir ni de srid 'khor//de dag skye b.ro 'gyur ba'ang yong med de//phyi phyir brtson 'grus dag ni rab tu skyed//sems can bsam mi khyab pa 'gro bar
347b3(mdo sde): brtson//sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab pa myangon par brtson//zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab lta bar brtson//bsam gyis mi khyab bdud rnams gdul bar
347b4(mdo sde): brtson//sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong bar brtson//tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyob srung bar brtson//bzod pa bsam gyis mi khyab sgom par brtson//
347b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab dge bar brtson//bsam gtan bsam gyis mi khyab sems par brtson//shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom par brtson///
347b6(mdo sde): byams pa bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom byar brtson//don dang yon tan sgrub pa rab tu brtson//srog dang lus kyang mi phangs brtson par byed//nyon mongs pa
347b7(mdo sde): 'thab pa kun las rnam pararo grol//stong pa rnam thang bdag med mngon par brtson//bdag la bdag med che ba'i bdag nyid brtson//lha las rnam grol byang
348a1(mdo sde): chub phyir yang brtson//sgyu ma smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid du brtson//sems med sems kyang sems ma yin pa thob//g.yo ba med pa'i chos rnams skyon/
348a2(mdo sde): pAr brtson//'gro ba kun tu spyod cing rnam par grol//bshad cing klog pa la ni// tu brtson/chos dang chos min gnyis las shin tu 'das/smra dang /
348a3(mdo sde): yi ge'i ngo bo nyid la brtson//'gro ba rnams la mdo sde stong rnams sgra//sangs kyis yon tan rnams ni mtha' yang med//sems can spyod pa rnams la'ang
348a4(mdo sde): mtha' med de//mkhas pa de la rtag tu brtson 'grus sbyor//sems can spyod mtha' med la rab tu 'jug/chos 'di rnams ni skye med 'gag med de//
348a5(mdo sde): mkhas pa de dag sems kyang mi zhum zhing //phyi phyi brtson 'grus rlabs tshon rab bskyed de//'di 'dra'i chos la sems can bsgom du bcu de/rigs/
348a6(mdo sde): kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bras ma gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs po yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
348a7(mdo sde): bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste sems nang du yang dag 'jog la nang du sems gnas par yang yang dag
348b1(mdo sde): par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /sems phyi rol nas kyang zlog la phyi rol du sems rgyu ba'ang mi dmigs pa dang /bdag gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams
348b2(mdo sde): cad kyi sems kyang mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa dang sems mnyam pa nyid de'ang sems kyi sgyu ma'i chos su mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa ste/rigs
348b3(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
348b4(mdo sde): kyi bsam gtan yongs su dge bo 'di brgyad de/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bsam gtan byed kyang phung po la gnas te bosam gtan mi byed pa dang //
348b5(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed kyang khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang /bsam gtan byed kyang skye mched la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang /bsam
348b6(mdo sde): gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang /bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten pha rol la gnas te bas mo gtan mi byed pa dang /
348b7(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed kyang 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gautan mi byed pa dang /bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs kyi khams la gnas te bsamo gtan mi
349a1(mdo sde): byed pa dang /bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa ste/rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang
349a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'o//gzhan yang nges par rtog pa'i sems ni bsam gtan yongs su dag pa ste/de la nges
349a3(mdo sde): par rtog pa'i sems nyid gang zhe na/gang chos rnams la mi mtho mi dma' ba/mi stod mi smod pa/'gyur ba med pa/rnam par mi rtog pa/stsogs pa
349a4(mdo sde): med pa/'bri ba med pa/'dzin pa med pa/gtong bra med pa/mun pa med pa/snang ba med pa/rtogs pa med pa/rnam par rtog pa med pa/'du
349a5(mdo sde): shes med pa/yid la byed pa med pa/gcig pa'ang mA yin/gnyis pa'ang ma yin/gnyis ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa/g.yo ba med pa/rlom sems
349a6(mdo sde): med pa/spros pa med pa/sogs pa med pa/bri ba med pa/sgom pa med pa/'jigs pa med pa ste/gang mtshan ma dang dmigs pa thams
349a7(mdo sde): cad la mi gnas pa/gang sems mi gnas pa de ni sems nges par rtog pa'o//sems nges par rtog pa ni gzugs rnams la mi rgyug ste/mig
349b1(mdo sde): dang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do//sems nges par rtog pa ni sgra rnams la mi rgyug ste/
349b2(mdo sde): rna ba dang sgra dang rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed ngo //sems nges par rtog pa ni dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/
349b3(mdo sde): sne dang dri dang rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do//sems nges par rtog pa ni ro rnams la mi rgyug ste/lce
349b4(mdo sde): dang rod rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do//sems nges par rtog pa ni reg pa rnams la mi rgyug smra/
349b5(mdo sde): lus drang rig pa dang rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do//sems nges par rtog pa ni chos rnams la mi rgyug
349b6(mdo sde): ste/yid dang chos dang rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par byas ma gton byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/bskal/
349b7(mdo sde): pas sreg pa ni nam mkha'i mi 'tshig cing /chus 'jigs pa na nam mkha' gsher bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpe'i bsam gtan nam
350a1(mdo sde): ma'a' dngas tshungs pa nga smon pongs dgams cad khyim 'chog bsam gan dang /rnam pa ra pa dang / 'dzud dug nga
350a2(mdo sde): bar+ya 'jug pa thams cad la'ang mchags pa yin no//mnyam par bzhug pa'ang yin la sems rnam par gsangasu pa'i sems can rnams shin
350a3(mdo sde): 'godado//mnyam par bzhag kyang dpa' ba med la langs nas kyang khong khro ba med pa yin no//'phags pa'i skye bo rnamasngal zhi ba nye bar ston kyapa zhugs
350a4(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brdzun 'grus rab tu 'bar blar yang byed do//mnyam pa d+mo bzhig cing mnyam pa'ang yon la mi
350a5(mdo sde): mnyam par spyad pa rnams la tha dngad por ston pa'ang rab tu ston te//mnyam pa nyid kyis mi munyam de'ang mi mthong ngo //me mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid nga
350a6(mdo sde): 'gal bar yang mi byed do//de ni mi 'gal zhing 'gal ba med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyi bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o//shes rab che ba'i
350a7(mdo sde): bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o//rnam par shes pa rab tu mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o//gang gis bsam gtan de ltar mngon par rtogs
350b1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bsam gtan nam mkha' rang mtshungs bya ste/mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su
350b2(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//bsam gtan rnams kyis dbang po yongs su dag/dran pa rtse gcig yid ni mnyam par bzhag/gnas rnams thams cad
350b3(mdo sde): la yang mI gnas shing //'gro ba kun la mnyam nyid snyoms par bzhag/nang dang phyi rol dag na gnas pa yi//phung po skye mched khams la m+bi gnas shing //
350b4(mdo sde): nye bar zhi ba dben pa spyod yul te//mkhas pa de dag rtag tu mnyamA par bzhag/mnyam pa nyid kyis rtag tu mnyam bzhog pa//chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam
350b5(mdo sde): zhing mtshungs pa'i yidro//shin tu dben pa'i sems can ston byed cing //mkhas pa bsam gtan kun la'ang ma chags so//'gro ba rnams kyang yongs su
350b6(mdo sde): sbyin bya'i phyir//'chi 'pho skye ba'i che ba nyer ston kyang //ting nge 'dzin las de dag mi nyams te//de ni sems rtogs dbang gis de 'dra'o//gzugs meng
350b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin kyang spyad yul lo//sems can rnams ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir//'dod pa'i khams su'ang rab tu snang byed de//de dag bdag dang
351a1(mdo sde): sems can mi gnas so//nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'i spyo yul te//sgyu ma dang yang mtshungs shing smig rgyu 'dra//rmi lam chu zla sprin gyi/
351a2(mdo sde): mtshan nyid du//chos rnams shes nas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag/'gro ba kun gyi sems kyi spyod yul du//'gro ba rnams la sems dang blo 'jug cing /
351a3(mdo sde): sems rgyud la ni sgrib pa med pa ste//rang gi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes//bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul mngon shes mkhas pa yis//zhing rnams mang po
351a4(mdo sde): bye bar dor 'gro zhing //mI shes nyon mongs thams cad sbyangs pa yid//rgyal ba bsam mi khyab la mchod par byed//dbang po rnams ni dul zhing zhi ba'i
351a5(mdo sde): yid//zhi gnas pha rol phyin cing mi rtog pa//de ni 'gro ba rnams la zhi ba'i yid//rtag tu ye shes stobs la mnyam par bzhag/mnyam pa nyid dang
351a6(mdo sde): mnyam pa'ang yong med la//mnyam pa nyid ces bya bar mtshan med de//mnyam nyid de la gang dag ra ba gnas pa//de dag rtag tu mnyam par bzhag
351a7(mdo sde): pa yin//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang ///
351b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nam mkha' rnam par dag pas sems can
351b2(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang /ye shes rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang /chos kyi dbyings rnam
351b3(mdo sde): par dag pas bdag dang sems can drang srog dang gang zag rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang /don rnam par dag pas yi ge thams cad rnam par dag par rab tu
351b4(mdo sde): rtogs pa ste/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
351b5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa ni 'di brgyad de/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub kyang rtag par lta bar
351b6(mdo sde): mi sbyor ba dang /mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bar brtson 'grus rtsom yang chad par lta bar mi lta ba dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug kyang mi
351b7(mdo sde): skye bo'i bzod pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa'i gos par snang yang nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa la mi chags pa dang /chos
352a1(mdo sde): kyi sdom bzhi'ang ston la mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /zhi ba nyid du dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang //
352a2(mdo sde): lus dang bya ba la 'jug pa rab tu ston kyang las byed cing rnam par smin pa med pa las kyang mi g.yo ba dang /spros pa med pa'i chos shes pa la gnas pa yin yang
352a3(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba nges par bstan pa rab tu ston pa dang /chos thams cad kyi snang ba la rab tu rnyed pa yin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam
352a4(mdo sde): par byang ba'ang sems can rnams la rab tu ston pa ste/rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su drag pa'o//yang
352a5(mdo sde): shes rab ces bya ba 'di ni rnam par rtog pa kun+da nas 'bar ba med pa'i phyir nye bar zhi ba'i tshig go//rlung gi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'di ni
352a6(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba'i tshig go//gnas med pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshig go yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba'i phyir 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig go//'gyur
352a7(mdo sde): ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'di ni bden pa'i tshig go/ma rung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di ni yang dag pa'i tshig go/bcings pa yang dag par bcom pa'i
352b1(mdo sde): phyir 'di ni yid rno ba'i tshig go//'phyags pa'i yon tan gyi phyir 'di ni ngoms pa'i tshig go//shin tu brtags pa'i phyir 'di ni nges par 'byed pa'i tshig go/brjod
352b2(mdo sde): du med pa'i phyir 'di ni dron gyi tshig go/khyad par med pa'i phyir 'di ni mtshungs pa'i tshig go/mi shigs pa'i phyir 'di ni snying po'i tshig go/mi gnas pa'i phyir/
352b3(mdo sde): 'di ni ma g.yos pa'i tshig gro//rab tu 'bigs pa'i phyir 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig go/byed pa byas pa'i phyir 'di ni sgrol ba'i tshig go/rang bzhin gyis kun ras nyon
352b4(mdo sde): mongs pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par dag pa'i tshig go//snang ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'di ni mun pa med pa'i tshig go/sgro btags pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni
352b5(mdo sde): gnyis su med pa'i tshig gro/shin tu zab cing byang ba'i phyir 'di ni zad pa'i tshig gro/'dus ma byas pa'i phyir 'di ni mi zad pa'i tshig go//sbyor ba med pa'i//
352b6(mdo sde): phyir 'dri ni 'dus ma byas kyi tshig go/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'di ni nam+ba mkha'i tshig go/sgrib po med pa'i phyir 'di ni nam mkha'i tshig go/gronas pa'i
352b7(mdo sde): gnas kyi phyir 'di ni kun nas gsal byed kyi tshig go/ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir 'di ni mi dmigs pa'i tshig go/rnam par shes pa dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i
353a1(mdo sde): phyir 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig go/gnyen po med pa'i phyir 'di ni mi rdzi ba'i tshig go/mngon par ma grub pa'i phyir 'di ni lus med pa'i tshig go//
353a2(mdo sde): kun tu rtog pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phyir 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i tshig go/sred pa'i bgra la nyal yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir 'di ni kun 'byung ba spangs pa'i
353a3(mdo sde): tshig go/rab tu ma byung ba'i phyir 'di ni 'gog pa'i tshig go/gnyis su med pa'i lam la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir 'di ni bsgom pa'i tshig go/rdzogs pa'i
353a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas par rab tu phye ba'i phyir 'di ni sangs rgyas pa'i tshig go//rab tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'di ni chos kyi tshig ste/gang de lta bu'i tshig la
353a5(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i ye shes snang ba gzhon gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i phyir 'di ni shes rab ces bya'o//gang nges par bstan pa thams cad la nam mkha' dang
353a6(mdo sde): mtshungs par bstan pa'i rjes su 'gro ste/rjes su 'gro bas chos chung ngu la'adra mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha
353a7(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa nam mkha'i dang mtshungs pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//shes rab lta dang
353b1(mdo sde): mun pa nyon mongs gcod//rab tu bag chags nyon mongs rab bsal cing //rgyu dang rkyen dang byed pa nges par ston//mtha' rnams thams cad yongs su
353b2(mdo sde): gcod par byed//bdag dang sems can la'ang mi gnas shing //gang zag srog la'ang rtag tu gnas pa med//dngos dang dngos med gnyis las thar byed
353b3(mdo sde): de//shes rab pha rol 'gro bar rab tu bstan//shes rab bdud las rgyal te nyon mongs med//shes rab chu bo las bsgral rab tu sgrol//shes rab ye
353b4(mdo sde): shes byed cing rnam par spyod//shes rab thar pa bde ba'i mchog kyang ston//shes rab kyis ni bsgrib pa'i rtsa ba sbyong //phung po khams ni yongs su shes
353b5(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan//mtshan dang mtshan gzhi mtshungs mtshan grol byed pa//shes rab thob pa srid pa gsum na mdzeso//yongs su dag spyod shes rab ces bya
353b6(mdo sde): ste//'jig rten thams cad kyis ni mi gros spyod//spyad pa spyod pa rab tu rtogs par spyod//shes rab dag pa'i mi ni rnam par mdzeso//mig lnga dag ni
353b7(mdo sde): yongs su dag byed cing //dbang po lnga ni yongs su snang bar byed//'gro ba lnga rnams rab tu gcod par byed//phung po lnga ni zad phyir chos ston to//pha
354a1(mdo sde): rol tshu rol rtag tu mi gnas shing //chos kyi dbyings gnas gnas la shin tu gnas//b.rar+ya sdung dang ni mtshungs mnyam 'dra ba ste//sangs
354a2(mdo sde): rgyas ye shes rjes su mthun zhing 'phags//rnyed dang mi rnyed gnyi ka'i mtha' las grol//dbus la rtog pa kun rtog mi rtog pa//grang rnams 'phags pa thams
354a3(mdo sde): cad song ba yi//'chi ba med pa'i lam du 'jug pa skyon//sdug bsngal shes shing de bzhin sred pa spangs//lam rnams ston cing 'gog pa'ang rab tu 'chad//
354a4(mdo sde): bden pa shes par shes rab 'di 'jug ste//des ni sngon gyi mtha' yang rab tu bcad//zhing rnams thams cad zhing mtshungs zhing ma yin//chos rnams thams
354a5(mdo sde): cad chos mtshungs rab tu dben//sems can thams cad bdag med sems can mtshungs//shes rab blos dpyod pas ni 'di shes so//rigs kyi bu de la
354a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/de
354a7(mdo sde): dog gi byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon de'ang nam mkha' dang mtshungs so//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams ji snyed mngon par 'du bya ba
354b1(mdo sde): mngon par 'du byed ba de'ang byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral te dge ba'i zla ba bsags shing bsngags pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skyob byed cing de dag rna
354b2(mdo sde): cad kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs par chud meng bur rab tu gnas so//de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar nam mkha' chang mang po'i phyir bdug gis bstod/
354b3(mdo sde): nams tshad med pa mngon par 'du bya'o snyam+b+ha du sems bskyed par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshad med par brtsams pas tshad med pa'i don 'phel ba yin te/
354b4(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa la brtson par bya'o//rigs kyi bu tshad med pa bcu po 'di dag ni gang byang chub sems dpas
354b5(mdo sde): bsodo nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas lus kyi rgyan chung
354b6(mdo sde): med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang //sems tsan+da thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag byas ngag gi rgyan tshad med pa yongs
354b7(mdo sde): su rdzogs par bya ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su 'jug pas sems kyi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /spyod pa
355a1(mdo sde): dang ye shes dang spyod lamachod med pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /rnam pa tshad med pa
355a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /bsod nams dang sems nges par rtog pa dang dpyod pa tshad med
355a3(mdo sde): pas sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /rgyan bkod pa thams cad dang spyod pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan tshad
355a4(mdo sde): med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang //gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin yongs su rdzogs pas mdzod spu yongs su sbyang ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par
355a5(mdo sde): bya ba dang /bla me la rim gro byed cing 'dud pa tshad med pa dang nga rgyal bcom pa tshad med pas dbu'i gtsug tor spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba tshad med pa yongs
355a6(mdo sde): su rdzogs par bya ba dang /skye dang g.yo med par 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang mthun par 'dzin pas don yod par rnam par gnon pa tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs
355a7(mdo sde): par bya ba ste/rigs kyi bu tshed med pa bcu po de dag ni gang byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o//gzhan/
355b1(mdo sde): yang rigs kyi bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa de nam mkha' tshad med pas de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang tshad med par
355b2(mdo sde): kun tu gnas te/de bas na bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu de lnga ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes nam mkha'
355b3(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/gang sems can thams cad kyi sems la ye shes des khyab par byed cing /sems can thams cad kyi sems 'dod chags dang
355b4(mdo sde): bcas pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags drang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems kyang zhe sdang
355b5(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//gAti mug dang bcas pa'i sems kyang gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag
355b6(mdo sde): pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes so//nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcasuM pa'i sems kyang des nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag parje
355b7(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//des bdag 'dod chags med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan
356a1(mdo sde): dgal 'dod chags 'dul bcu phyir chos 'chad do//nges bdag nyid zhe sdang med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can rnams
356a2(mdo sde): dang gang zag gzhan dag le zhe sdang 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do//des bdag nyid ga'i mug myed pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin lasam gsos par sems can bzhin rnams
356a3(mdo sde): dang gang zag gzhan la gti mugi 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do//des bdag nyid nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par
356a4(mdo sde): sems can gzhan rnams dang /gang zag gzhon drug la nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do//des 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang //
356a5(mdo sde): gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos 'chad do//'dod chad pa dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i snyoms
356a6(mdo sde): la dmen par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug deng nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la mchog
356a7(mdo sde): du'adi yang dge bar rjes su mi mthong ngo //de ni'i byir de ni/'di ltar byang rgya sems dpa' di gnyis su med pa'i mtha' sgonas chos kyi dbyings yong
356b1(mdo sde): su shes te/chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de 'dod chags kyi dbyings/chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dri zhe sdang gi dbyings/chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dag ti mug gi dbyings///
356b2(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i dbyings so//de bas na chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du'o zhes bya ste/chos kyi dbyings ni gar yang
356b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba med/mi 'gro ba'ang med do//chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste/gong bdag gi dbyings shes pa des chos kyi dbyings kyang shes so//
356b4(mdo sde): de ltar na chos kyi dbyings dang bdag gi dbyings de dag mi gnyis so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag rnam par dgo pas chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dag go//de bzhin
356b5(mdo sde): du chos thams cad kyang rnam par dag pa ste/gang rnam par dag pa de rab tu snang ba'o//gang rab tu snang ba de bla gab med pa'o//gang bra gab med pa de la mtshanA ma
356b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi skabs med do//gang mtshon ma med pa de la gnas pa gang yang med de/mi gnas pa ni nam mkha'o//gang de ltar ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro zhing
356b7(mdo sde): ye shes des chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i
357a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/gang tshul khrims las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims
357a2(mdo sde): las kyang mi nyams pa'o//ting nge 'dzin las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa thams cad las kyang mi 'gyur ba'o//shes rab las kyang
357a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos thams cad rgyu ba med par yang rnam par mi rtog pa'o//rnam par grol ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing sems gnyis pa
357a4(mdo sde): la'ang mo gnas pa'o//rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing shes pa thams cad la'ang mi chags pa'o//stobs las
357a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing dus gsum mtshungs pa'i ye shes las kyang mi g.yo ba'o//mi 'jigs pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing zag pa thams
357a6(mdo sde): cad dang lhan cig tu'ang mi gnas pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du'ang rnam
357a7(mdo sde): par mi rtog pa'o//gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang gzugs las sangs rgyaso yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid
357b1(mdo sde): shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes
357b2(mdo sde): su mi mthong la/rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su'ang 'gro ba'o//phung po dang /khams dang /skye mchod rnams las sanges
357b3(mdo sde): rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su'ang 'gro ba'o//gang yang chos thams
357b4(mdo sde): cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas shes rab tsha ba'i dran pa de ni yid la byed po thams cad med de/lta ba thams cad kun nas lding ba med pa'o//gang de lta bu rnyog pa med
357b5(mdo sde): pa'i dran pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes pa de ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang
357b6(mdo sde): spyod lam thams cad du sangs rgyas la mngon par chags pa mi byed do//'gro ba dang /'chag pa dang /'dug pa dang /nyal ba dang /'gro ba dang /'ong
357b7(mdo sde): bo dang /smra ba dang /mi smra bar yang sangs rgyas la mngon por chags par mi byed do//de mngon par ma chags pas dran pa'ang dran par mi byed mi dran pa 'ang
358a1(mdo sde): dran par myi byed do//de dran pa yid la mi byed pas gzugs dang /mtshan dang chos nyid du'ang sangs rgyas rjes su mi dran no//rigs kyi bu 'di //
358a2(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sto gang la mtshan ma dang dmigs pa thams cad kun tu spyod pa med pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub
358a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/chos zhes bya ba ni 'dod cha gos med pa'o//de la gang chos ci la chags
358a4(mdo sde): kyang rung de dag la chos rjes su dran pa grang yang med do//chos zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi med pa'o//de la gang chos gang la sbyor ba de dag la chos rjes su dran
358a5(mdo sde): pa gang yang med do//chos zhes bya ba ni nye bar zhi ba ste/gang sems dang yid 'bar bar byed pa de dag la chos rjes su dran po gang yang med do//chos zhes
358a6(mdo sde): bya ba ni mtshan ma med pa ste/gang mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa de dag lo chos rjes su dran pa gleng yang med do//chos zhes bya ba ni 'dus
358a7(mdo sde): mo byas pa ste/gang 'dus byas su rab tu gzhag pa la gnas pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do//yang chos rjes su dran pa ni gang gis 'du byed
358b1(mdo sde): sa cad kyis myed par mthong ba ste/yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o//byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mya skyes par rig nas myi smra
358b2(mdo sde): 'i chos lo bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo//gang de lta bu'i gnas ni yang dag pa'i chos kyi gnas so//gang gis de ltar mngon par rtogs pa ni chos thams cad mngon par
358b3(mdo sde): rtogs pa ste/'di ni slob pa dang /mi slob pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon
358b4(mdo sde): par rtogs pa'o//de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa ni 'phags pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba ste/de la chos gang yang kun tu spyod pa med do//chos gang yang
358b5(mdo sde): kun tu spyod pa med pa de ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes
358b6(mdo sde): sridran po gang zhe na/dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byis pa ste/mngon par 'du byed pas rjes su dran par mi nus so//gang na lus kyi las dang ngag na
358b7(mdo sde): las dang yid kyi las kun tu skyed pa med pa de ni mngon por 'du mi byed pa zhes bya'o//de la 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni gdags pa dang tha snyad do//'dus ma byas na/
359a1(mdo sde): gdags pa thams nadu yang drug par 'dzum mo//tha skad thams cad las yang dag par 'dus pa ste/rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas
359a2(mdo sde): gdang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpe'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su rlan pa gang zhe na/gtong ba rna
359a3(mdo sde): bya ba ni phung po thams cang 'dir zhing rab tu gtong ba'o// ci'i phyir zhe na/des chos gang yang btang ba med do//'di ltar de la maung gtong ba'i chos yung snang ba
359a4(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/'di lnga gang chos thams cad ma 'dzin pa de ni gtong ba'i mchog go/gang mi 'dzin pa de ni mi gting ngo //glang mi gtong ba de ni mi snyems so//
359a5(mdo sde): gang mi skyems pa de ni dmiklas par mi byed do//dmigs par mi byed pa de la snrums rgyu ba med do//rgyu ba med pa ni sems kyis rnam par rig pa med bya'o//
359a6(mdo sde): gang la sems kyi mi rnam par rig pa med pa de ni rnam par shes pa mo gnas pa'o//rnami par shes pa myi gnas pa de ni sangs kyis sa gnang ba'i gang
359a7(mdo sde): dran pa'o//gang yang byang chub semasad dpa'i gtong ba de ni thams cad mkhyen par bsdus pa ste/gang thams cad mkhyen na chos thams cad kyim
359b1(mdo sde): da //gdum nyam pa nyid 'aglanas pA n+ta rab tu gtong nong byung chub rlung ban+d+ha/darnas su dran yang nas gang yang rjes su dran pa med du//ci'i phyir rgyun
359b2(mdo sde): dmas cad mkhyen pa ni chos dang su ma yin pa gnyis dang ldan pa ma yin te/keng 'di gnyis su med pa yid la khyad pa ci 'di med do//rigs kyi do ltar nas
359b3(mdo sde): shes bya ba rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa yin no//rigs kyi bu de lta byang chub sems dpa' spangs
359b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/tshul khrims zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/zag pa med pa/smon lam med pa/lhun gyis grub
359b5(mdo sde): pa/brtul zhugs grub pa/brtul zhugs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no//ting nge 'dzin gyis gonas te/
359b6(mdo sde): sems kyi dmigs pa'i gnas me yin no//shes rab kyi rtsa ba ste/spros pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no//rnam par grol ba'i rgyu mthun pa ste/gnyis kyus ra
359b7(mdo sde): tu phye ba ma yin no//mkhas pas rab tu bsngags pa ste/gzugs snang ba ma yin no//nyon mongs pa zhi ba ste/so so rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma
360a1(mdo sde): yin no//bde ba thams cad kyi rjes smra 'gro zhing gnyen pos bskyed pa ma yin te gdu de lta bu'i tshul khrims rjes su dran zhing dran pA la rnyog pa na/
360a2(mdo sde): pa de ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpe'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i
360a3(mdo sde): lha rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/lha'i ris gnyis rjes su dran par bya ste/gnyis gang zhe na/gnas gtsang ma'i ros kyi lha dang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i
360a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dge' ldan gyi gnas na 'khod po rnams s+ho//de la byang chub sems dpa' gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams rjes su dran no//yang
360a5(mdo sde): skye ba ga cig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na gang dag 'khyod pa de dag ni spyi bo lta bu bcus rjes su dran te becu gang zhe na/
360a6(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyi bar gyur pa dang /mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi nang nA mi nyams pa'i mngon pad+ma shes
360a7(mdo sde): pa dang /pa thams cad kyi nang na dbang bskur ba'i sa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi nang na yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /ting nge 'dzin mi
360b1(mdo sde): nyams pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa'i nang na don dang spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /shes pa thams cad kyi nung na chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa
360b2(mdo sde): dang /dbang po thams cad kyi nang na rab 'bring tha ma la 'jug pa shes pa dang /stobs drang mi 'jigs pa la snang ba'i ye shes rjes su 'gro ba dang /stan thams
360b3(mdo sde): cad kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun tu gzigs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'di dag gi lag mthil du song ba ltar 'dug pa dang /byang chub kyi snying po la
360b4(mdo sde): 'dug nas sems kyi skad cog gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o zhes spyi bo lta bu'i chos rnam pa bcu pa de dag gis rjes su
360b5(mdo sde): dran no//de'i dran pa de ni lta bas ma 'khrugs/bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang bas mo 'khrugs/pid lo byed pas ma 'khrugs/spobs pas mA 'khrugs
360b6(mdo sde): pa ste/de lta bu'i dran pa rtog pa med pas kyi rjes su dran pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gre nang ba lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na
360b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i nga spyod pa yin zhe na/mya ngan las 'das pa zhes
361a1(mdo sde): bya ba nan mongs pa rnams rgyu shAn+d+han+tu b+h+yaH/chur ba rnams cad rten pa cang pa/dmigs pa thams cung zlog/spyang po dang //khams
361a2(mdo sde): dang /skye mched rnams kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ste/skyes bu dam pade mya ngan las 'das pa dung mnyam pa nyid thob rting /dz+nyAn gnas bcas pa'i
361a3(mdo sde): snying rje chen po dang /thab sa dang /shes rab dang /yaM shes kyis rnam pAr rol pa/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi s+yA ni shrIn+da tu byin gyis bas
361a4(mdo sde): shes rab dang /ye shes ni shin tu bsgoms/sngon gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis ni bsgom pa yongs su dag/sgyums rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ni
361a5(mdo sde): gnas te/nyon mongs pa gang gis 'khor ba rab tu spyod pa 'am/'khor bar 'ching ba de dag rab tu spangs shing ye shes gang gis mya ngan las 'das
361a6(mdo sde): par smon pa de la dbang thub pas mi skye ba'i las skye zhing mo 'byung ba las 'byung ste/mya ngan las 'das blo dang mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par zhugs
361a7(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'ang mi 'chad de//de ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs su tshang bzhis bya ba'i ye shes kyin ste/
361b1(mdo sde): nas tu sgra gang la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skang pa skyed pa'o//dgas rgyan
361b2(mdo sde): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang chog shes pa gang yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi
361b3(mdo sde): ni brgyad khra bzhi stong ste/'di ni sngom+b+ha gyi rtsa ba'i tshig go//gang yad sems nAn rnams cudaHstod pa tshad med pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa brjod du med
361b4(mdo sde): sangs rnaMs kyis nas kyis mA dz+nyAn/nyan nus dang rang sa sna rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mi rig/byed chub se mas dpa'i ye shes kyis ma rig la
361b5(mdo sde): semasu dpyi stangs rgyas kyi b+h+yon gyis parlabs da/rang gi shes pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su rab tu 'jug
361b6(mdo sde): bde'i glang ngo bo nyid dam/gling mtshan nyid kyid rlung ste/rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/rkyen gyis mtshan nyid dam/byed rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/tshogs pa
361b7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid dam/the dad pa'i mtshan nyid dam mo 'dri ba'i mtshan nyid dam/'dod chags kyi mtshan nyid dam/zhe sdang gi mtshan nyid dam/gti mug
362a1(mdo sde): gI mtshan nyid dam/skal pa mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dam//sems can dmyal ba'i mtshan nyid dam/dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi mtshan
362a2(mdo sde): nyid dam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid dam/lha'i mtshan nyid dam/mi'i mtshan nyid dam/nyan thos kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid
362a3(mdo sde): dam/rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dri ma/sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ring po'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam//
362a4(mdo sde): bar ma'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/nye ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/spyod pa de dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te
362a5(mdo sde): ye shes thams cad la kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no//rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho
362a6(mdo sde): gshes pa yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mtshig gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin/
362a7(mdo sde): zhe na/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni mi zad pa ste/sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid
362b1(mdo sde): rab tu 'jug pa ji snyed pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod la gzung ba'i ye shes la 'jug pa'ang de snyed do//ji ltar sems can
362b2(mdo sde): spyod pa mi zad cing mtha' med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod kyang mi zad cing mtha' med pa'o//chos dkon mchog
362b3(mdo sde): go mdzod ces bya ba ni gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa nas/gang gi nub mo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs
362b4(mdo sde): pas bshad pa dang 'chud pa dang /'chad par 'gyur ba de thams cad ni de bzhin no//ma ni bu de bzhin no//gzhan ma yin pa'o//ci'i phyir de bzhin
362b5(mdo sde): zhes bya zhe na/de bzhin nyid zhi ba la yang dag par zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya'o//ci'i phyir ma nor bu de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/don dam pa'i bden
362b6(mdo sde): pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de'i phyir mA nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//ci'i phyir ni gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/de bdug gi ngo bo nyid mya
362b7(mdo sde): yin par gzhan du mi btsal te/de'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa'o//yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni stong gsum
363a1(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams mang du thos pa kun dga' bo lta bur gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyis bskal
363a2(mdo sde): pa bye ba phrag stong du'ang yi ge khong du chud par mi nus so//yang don gcig tu bstun te ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa 'di lta bu'i ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
363a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod de//de byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzin te ji ltar yi ge thams cad mi mdzad cing drin thams cad mi nyams par mam
363a4(mdo sde): can thams cad mgu bar byed/sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mnyes par byed/bdud thams cad pham par byung /rmya stegs can gzhan thams cad char
363a5(mdo sde): gtsang /nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed cing de dag la chos dkon mchog rab tu sgrogs pa de ltar 'dzin to//rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems
363a6(mdo sde): dngas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin no//yang rigs kyi bu chos gang gi ngo bo nyid du ngos chos rnams
363a7(mdo sde): mngon par sangs rgyas pa de'i ngo bo nyid du byang chub sems dpas chos rnams gzung por bya'o//yang ji lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams
363b1(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhe na/yongs su ma grub pa'i tshul gyis sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang /yul las shin tu 'das pa'i tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang
363b2(mdo sde): shin tu skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang /mi 'pho ba'i tshul gyis mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid dang /rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs brnyan
363b3(mdo sde): gyi ngo bo nyid dang /rag las pa'i tshul gyis stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /sems chags pa med
363b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /'dod chags thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul gyis 'dod chags med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /grangs thams cad
363b5(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid de/de ltar rigs kyi bu tha snyad du gzhan rnam par rig pa la brten nas de 'dra ba chos de ngas mngon par
363b6(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/gang chos de'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni tshig gis brjod par mi nus so//de la chos rnams 'dzin par 'dod pa'i byang chub
363b7(mdo sde): sems dpas de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ste/yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis kyang sems can gzhan rnams
364a1(mdo sde): dang /gang zag gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas
364a2(mdo sde): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed ce na rigs kyi bu sems can gyi khams ni thog ma nas rnam par dag pa ste/de lnga sems can rnams kyi rtsa ba'i dngos po med
364a3(mdo sde): de/byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yongs su chad par rig nas sems can gang rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de la bdag tu lta bar mi
364a4(mdo sde): 'gyur sems can du lta bar ma yin/srog tu lta bur ma yin/gang zag tu lta bar yang mi 'gyur ro//yang de 'di snyam du sems te sems can zhes bya
364a5(mdo sde): ba 'di ni phyin ci log ste/rgyur lta ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang /ma rig pa dang /srid pa dang /sred pa dang /yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa laso
364a6(mdo sde): sems can zhes brjod snyam mo//de la byang chub sems dpas med pa'i phyin ci log las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rab tu spangs pa'i phyir sems can rnams
364a7(mdo sde): la chos ston te dngos po gang yang chud mi gzon to//sems rgyun med cing sems can dben pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/de ltar
364b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin
364b2(mdo sde): la rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud tsa na/tshul bzhin zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe
364b3(mdo sde): na/rgyu dang rkyen ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'bras bu mngon par 'grub bo//sbyin pa ni longs spyod chen po'i rgyu ste/de la byang chub sems dpa' gang gtong ba de'ang thams cad
364b4(mdo sde): mkhyen par bsngos nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//tshul khrims ni lha dang mir skye ba'i rgyu ste/lha dang mir skyes nas byang chub sems
364b5(mdo sde): dpas sems can rnamaso tshul khrims la rab tu 'dzud de/tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ba des de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nos tshul khrims kyi pha rol
364b6(mdo sde): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//bzod pa dang nges pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyan gyi rgyu ste/lus dang /ngag dang /sems rgyan pas byang chub
364b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin te/phan par 'dod pa bzod pa'i gnas de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas bzod pa'i///
365a1(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//brtson 'grus ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad spyad pa'i rgyu ste/byang chub sems dpas brtson
365a2(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams nas dge ba'i rna ba thams cad yang drug par sgrub cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par grub pa'i D+ya'agrus de'ang thams cad mkhyen par
365a3(mdo sde): bsngos nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//bsam gtan ni sems dga' ba dang cang shes pa'i rgyu ste/byang chub sems dpa' dga'
365a4(mdo sde): ba dang cang shes pas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun skong ste/zhi gnas kyi tshogs de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
365a5(mdo sde): par byed do//thos pa ni shes rab che ba'i rgyu ste/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po ni dmigs par lta ba myi 'dzin cing dmigs pa med pa'i thos pa de'ang thams
365a6(mdo sde): cad mkhyen par bsngos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de bzhin du dge ba'i chos thams cad de dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu gang dang gang
365a7(mdo sde): bsags pa de dang de'i 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pas mngon par skye bar 'gyur to/rgyu dang rkyen de ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa zhes bya'o///gzhan yang tshul
365b1(mdo sde): zhen zhes bya ba la chos thams cad kyi rdul bzhin ni bdag yin te/ji ltar bdag ni bdag med pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la bdag med do//ji ltar na bdag
365b2(mdo sde): stong pa de bzhin du chos thams cad stong ngo //ji ltar bdag mying du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ming du btags pa tsam du zad do//
365b3(mdo sde): ltar tshul bzhin lnga rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad mnyam par sbyor ro//gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
365b4(mdo sde): cad mnyam pa nyid de/de ltar tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub bo//rigs kyi bu de ji ltar na byang chub
365b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las mnyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin zhe na/'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'jig tshogs
365b6(mdo sde): la lta ba ma bcom pas mngon par shes pa rnams las nyams par yang 'gyur ro//yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig tshogaso la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i
365b7(mdo sde): lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par bcom nas lta ba dang len pa thams cad med par mngon par shes pa bskyed de/ye shes dang lhan/shes rab dang /
366a1(mdo sde): ldan/blo dang ldan/bzod pa dang ldan/tshul khrims dang ldan te/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing lus dben sems dben te/
366a2(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba'i ye shes kyis nang nye bar 'gro zhing phyi rol du mi rgyu ba/yul med pa'i yul can/cung shes pa'i sems drang ldan pa dga' bye'i sems dang ldan pa
366a3(mdo sde): shin tu brtags pas brtags pa/rab tu dkar ba'i blo nyon mongs pas ma 'khrugs pa snang ba thob pa/ye shes rab rib mid pa/bsod nams kyi tsho gas
366a4(mdo sde): bsngags pa/ye shes kyi tshogs bstsags pa/zhi gnas kyi tshogs bsags pa/lhag mthong gi tshogs bsags pa/sbyin pas brtan pa/tshul
366a5(mdo sde): khrims kyis brgyan pa/bzod pa'i go gyon pa/brtson 'grus kyi ya lang bgos pa/bsam gtan la gnas pa/shes rab shin tu bsgoms pa'i
366a6(mdo sde): blo dang ldan pa/byams pas rjes su mthun pa/snying rje la rab tu gnas pa/thabs kyis mngon par sgrub pa de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas mngon par shes
366a7(mdo sde): pa bskyed do/byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du mngon par shes pa de dag gis shin tu 'phags shing de mngon par shes pa de dag gis chos thams cad la/
366b1(mdo sde): dbang byed pa yin te/gzugs thams cad mthong /sku thams cad thos/sems thams cad la 'jug cing bsgral pa grangs med pa rjes su dran te/rdzu 'phrul
366b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa/zats+tsha pa zad paM'i badri ba rnyed cing /yid kyi rnam par rtog pa ji skyed pa la rnam par rton+d+ra pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa thams cad
366b3(mdo sde): la dbang byed pa yin te/des chos thams cad la de bzhin du lhun gyis grub par gnas so//rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa
366b4(mdo sde): las mi nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin no//rigs kyi bu de lo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs shing nyan
366b5(mdo sde): thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu zab mo zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o//rten cing
366b6(mdo sde): 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul ni 'di lta ste/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis
366b7(mdo sde): ming dang gzugs/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/tshor ba'i rkyen
367a1(mdo sde): kyis sring ga/smad pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/srid pa'i rgyun gyis myug/skyeba'i rkyen gyis hU~M dang /mya na nga//
367a2(mdo sde): skye sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams smra 'byung bar 'gyur te/dwe ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung ba chen po'i
367a3(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang dang /rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa' ye
367a4(mdo sde): shes rab tu 'jug ste/'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kun 'byung ba'i tshul zhes bya'o//de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa'i tshul gang zhe na/

367b1(mdo sde): dang mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'dron pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhag

367b3(mdo sde): gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/de ni chos kyi tshul zab mo la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/gang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams
367b4(mdo sde): cad kyis ma yin po'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin zhe na/sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /

367b6(mdo sde): de'i mtshams sbyor ba shes so//gzhan yang zab mo zhes bya ba ni 'jig tshegs dang /bdag rnam par dag pa dang /chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'o//
367b7(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe ni/'jig chags ni kun tu btsal kyang mi dmigs so//gang mi dmigs pa de ni zab mo'o//bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang
368a1(mdo sde): mA bArnyes so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag thog ma nas kyang rnam par dag pa ste/ji ltar bdag rnam par dag pa de bzhin du chos thams cad rnam
368a2(mdo sde): par dag go/de ci'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya zhe na/de la chos gang yang ma skyes/myi skyed/ma 'gags/mi 'gag pa ste/de bas na rnam par dag
368a3(mdo sde): pA zhes bya'o//mun pa med pa/snang ba med pa/kun gzhi med pa/rabA ri bA med pa/don dam pa zab mo gang la mig med cing mig 'gog pa med pa nas
368a4(mdo sde): yid kyi bur du med cing yid 'grog pi med pa ste/de ni yul du bgrang ba ma yin no//gang yul ma yin zhing yul med pa de ni don dam pa ste/de'i phyir zab mo
368a5(mdo sde): zhes bya'o//de la sems dang yid 'dzin pa med de rtogs par dka' ba mthong bar dka' ba khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la ye shes

368b2(mdo sde): yin zhe na rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gang rten pa de ni ci'ang ma yin pa/snang rten pa de ni dngos po med pa/gang rten pa de ni

369a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni r+N+Na dang /shing dang /rtsig pa dang /lam dang /mig yor lta bu zhes bya ste/ji ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams skye ba ni skyed
369a2(mdo sde): par byed pa med/'gag pa na'ang 'gog par byed pa med pa de bzhin du nang gi chos rnams skye ba na'ang skyed par byed pa med/'gog pa na'ang 'gog par byed pa med
369a3(mdo sde): gzhan du ni rkyen rnams yod na 'byung gi rkyen ma tshang na 'gog go snyam du sems to/de ltar na shes pa la sbyor ba ni mthar lta ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo //
369a4(mdo sde): de la mthar lta ba gang zhe na/mtha' zhes bya ba ni chad pa dang rtag pa ste/de gang mi skyed cing rnam par mi 'jigro pa ni chad pa dang rtag pa dang dral ba ste/de'i

369a7(mdo sde): btab pas/de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa shes pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa zhes bya ba la de bzhin dbyer
369b1(mdo sde): med pa de ni phyag rgya ste/phye ba med pa/'jug pa myed pa/mngon par zhen pa med pa/mi bskyod pa/bskyod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du brtsas

369b3(mdo sde): pa'i phyag rgya ni shin tu mi skye ba'i phyag rgya/shin tu stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya/shin tu mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya/shin tu smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya/shin tu

369b6(mdo sde): rgyas btab po'o//de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi tha snyad du ji snyed du the snyad 'dogs pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab po de

370a1(mdo sde): pa de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par mi byed/chos tha dad du mi byed do//de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas de dag de bzhin nyid rnyed

370a4(mdo sde): ste/dper na sems can thams cad ni nam mkha' la rnam par rgyu'ang nam mkha'i khams ni 'dres par mi byed do//de bzhin du sems can thams cad dri
370a5(mdo sde): bzhin nyid la rnam par rgyu'ang de bzhin nyid ni 'dres par mi byed do//gang 'dir de lta bu'i chos rnams shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ni de bzhin

372a7(mdo sde): dang /shes rab mi phyed pa dang /byams po chen po dang /snying rje chen po mi phyed pa dang bsdu ba'i dngos po mi phyed pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par
372b1(mdo sde): byed pa mi phyed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mi phyed pa dang /'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba mi phyed pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa bas mi ngoms pa mi phyed pa dang /
372b2(mdo sde): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i phyir gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa mi phyed pa dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir lus dang srog 'dor bar mi phyed
372b3(mdo sde): pra dang /sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba mi phyed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams snod yang dag par sgrub pa mi phyed po ste/
372b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di lta bu 'di dag lngas mi phyed pa de'i tshe/bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa yin no//'di lta ste dper na
372b5(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che rdo rje ni nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bigs kyang bdag nyid ni mo phigs so//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing
372b6(mdo sde): mi phyed pa'ang sems can thams cad kyi bag la nyal dang /nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang bu dang /lta bar gyur pa rnams spel kyang bdag nyid ni theg pa chen po 'di
372b7(mdo sde): las mi phyed do//rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sre zhing mi phyed de/theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo
373a1(mdo sde): ba sbyin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa yin zhen/
373a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bya ba ni yul ma yin pa/yul med pa yul thams cad las yongs su dag pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi yul
373a3(mdo sde): yongs su dag pas rang gi yul yongs su sbyong ste/de 'di snyam du mig gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba
373a4(mdo sde): ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/dben pa'i yul ni mig gi yul gang yang med do//rna ba'i yul ni
373a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang /sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring blo ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul
373a6(mdo sde): yin pa'i phyir te/dben pa'i yul la ni rna bo'i yul grang yang med do//sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am
373a7(mdo sde): ring ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/dben pa'i yul la ni sna'i yul gang yang med do/lce'i
373b1(mdo sde): yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin
373b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir te/dben pa'i yul la ni lce'i yul glang yang med do//lus kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang /sangs rgyas kyi yul na su dang yang nye bu'am
373b3(mdo sde): ring po ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/dben pa'i yul la ni lus kyi yul gang yang med do//yid kyi
373b4(mdo sde): yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring po ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul
373b5(mdo sde): yin pa'i phyir to/dben pa'i yul la ni yid kyi yul gang yang med do//phung po rnams dang /khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel
373b6(mdo sde): par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis la'ang de bzhin no//rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pa nyid kyi yul thams cad dben/
373b7(mdo sde): par 'jug go/rang gi zhing yongs su dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing la zhugs pa de ni chos gang dag de'i dbang po drug la snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad la
374a1(mdo sde): spangs rgyas kyi yul dben pas 'jug go/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul chags pa med cing rtogs pa med pa'i de bzhin du yul thams snad
374a2(mdo sde): lnga'ang mi chags mi thogs te/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul la rjes su zhugs shing rang gi yul yongs spyi dge pa yin no//
374a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpe'i gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs thob
374a4(mdo sde): par gyur te/de la gzungs yongs su sbyang ba byed pa gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu sum cu d+ha gi rnaMs pa 'di dag ni gzungs yongs su skyeng ba byed pa ste/sum cu
374a5(mdo sde): gnyis po gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos don du gnyer ba dang /chos 'dod pa dang /chos kyi kun dga' la dga'i myos pa dang /chos la gzhal ba dang /chos
374a6(mdo sde): la bab pa dang /mang du thos pa rnams la beN+Di ni cing bsnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams la du rgyal med cing btsun par gus
374a7(mdo sde): par byed pa dang /chos yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang /rjes su basbyin pa rnams la bka' the bde zhing mthun par 'dzin pa dang /chos smra ba'i gang
374b1(mdo sde): zag rnams la ston pa tsam du sems shing 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang /kun 'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /ston pa la le lo med pa dang /chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud
374b2(mdo sde): med cing zang zing med par chos sbyin pa dang /shes rab kyi rtsa ba'i gnas thos pa dang tshul bzhin gyi chos la sbyor ba dang /ji ltar thos pa'i chos la so sor brtog pa'i
374b3(mdo sde): phyir mang du thos pa mu med par byas pa dang /mtshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa med par byas pa dang /rtag tu dben pa la sems gzhol ba dang /rjes su dran pa
374b4(mdo sde): drug rjes su dran pa dang /yang drag par chags par 'gyur ba drug mi 'dor ba dang /gus par bya ba'i gnas drug yongs su mi gtong ba dang /sems can
374b5(mdo sde): thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la sbyor ba dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'galnga pa'i las dang /bya ba la 'jug pa dang //
374b6(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la sems nges par rtog pa la mi skrag pa dang /'phags pa'i rigs drang sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun 'dzin pas yongs su mi 'chad
374b7(mdo sde): pa dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba la sems zhum pa med pa dang /sems can la lta bas snying rje che ba dang /chos la lta bas lus dang srog 'dor ba
375a1(mdo sde): dang /ye shes la lta bas rtag tu nga rgyal med pa dang //sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba ste/'di ni gzungs yongs su
