375a3(mdo sde): dran pa rjes su dran pa dang /rtogs par khong du chud pa dang /blo gros 'dod pa dang /yi ge mi zad pa dang /nges pa'i tshig drung skad la 'jug pa shes pa dang
375a4(mdo sde): spobs pa bstan pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi chad pa dang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang /drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug
375a5(mdo sde): pa shes pa dang /kun rdzob mi zad pa bston pa shes pa dang /don dam pa dbyer med pa'i de kho na bstan pa shes pa dang /bden pa la 'jug pa nges pa shes
375a6(mdo sde): pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang /yang dgo par spong ba'i brtson 'grus mi 'gong ba shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas
375a7(mdo sde): rnam par rol pa shes pa dang /dbang po'i rig pa shes pa dang /stobs la gnas pa mi bskyed par shes pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lani rtogs pa dang /
375b1(mdo sde): mthun pa shes pa dang /lam lo 'jug pa'i gnas pa dang /zhi gnas kyi sems gnas par shes pa dang /lhag mthong gi chos sgrol bar shes pa dang rig pa dang rnam
375b2(mdo sde): par grol ba rjes su mthun pa shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang /mngon par shes pa'i ye shes skyed pa shes pa dang /pha rol tu phyin
375b3(mdo sde): pa drug la 'jug pa shes pa dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi so so ci rigs par shes pa dang /sgra skad dang ngag gi lam la 'jug pa shes pa dang /chos kyi brda ston pa shos
375b4(mdo sde): pa dang /don dbyer med par shes pa dang /tshig 'bru mi zad par shes pa dang /sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba shes pa dang /so so ci rigs par chos
375b5(mdo sde): ston pa shes pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i dran pas 'dzin pa shes pa dang /tshig dang yi ge thams cad mtshams sbyar ba'i nges pa'i tshig
375b6(mdo sde): la 'jug pa shes pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang dag pa ni lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa shes pa dang /rgyu dang bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang /
375b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad la snang ba rab rib med pa'i shes pa ste/'di ni gzungs zhes bya'o//lus dang ngag dang sems sa dang 'dra ba'i chos kun tu 'dzin pa gang yin pa
376a1(mdo sde): de ni mi zad pa ste/chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par
376a2(mdo sde): skyespyod pa 'di ni gzungs kyi tshul la 'jug pa yin te/gzungs thob pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mi brjed par spyod par shes par bya'o//rigs kyi bu de
376a3(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med
376a4(mdo sde): cing rgyun mi chad la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyiso brlabs pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
376a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi spobs pa yin te/nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/spobs pa myur ba dang spobs pa mgyogs pa dang spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang /spobs
376a6(mdo sde): pa rgyun mi chud pa dang /shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang /zab mo la spobris pa dang /sna tshogs la spobs pa dang /legs par brgyan pa'i spabs
376a7(mdo sde): pa dang zhum pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang /mdo
376b1(mdo sde): dang rtogs pa brjod pa dang /sngon byung ba la spobs pa dang /mi thul ba'i spobs pa dang /tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa mi zad pa la spobs pa dang /spobs pa shin tu
376b2(mdo sde): gsal zhing shin tu mdzes pa dang /tshig btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs pa dang /chos ston pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs pa dang /lha'i 'khor gyi rgyun gyi spobs
376b3(mdo sde): pa dang /the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho sa la spobs pa dang /'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang //
376b4(mdo sde): 'khor lnga byams pa dang snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms kyi spobs pa dang /skye ba dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi byin
376b5(mdo sde): gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa yin te rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin no//de dag kyang yongs su
376b6(mdo sde): sbyang ba byas pa nyi shu rtsa bzhis 'grub ste/nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bla ma'i ngag mo gcig pas myur ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro//chur shog ces bya
376b7(mdo sde): po dang song zhes bya ba la g.yo med pas spobs pa mgyogs par 'gyur ro//nyon mongs pa thams cad la chags pa med pas spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur
377a1(mdo sde): ro//de la ma chags par gnas pas spobs pa rgyun mi chad par 'gyur ro//phra ma'i tshig med pas shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs las

377b1(mdo sde): pa mi zad pa la spobs par 'gyur ro//tshig bden pa dang /za ba med pa dang /ngag rtsub po med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pas spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing

378a1(mdo sde): sems snyoms pa dang sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyor ba dang /k+Shamya ngan/lhas 'das pa'i lam la 'god pa dang /rnyed pa dang bkur//

379a1(mdo sde): /dang /N+DI 'byo myed par 'al zhing skye ba dang /rgyas kyi mtshan nyid m+bu ny-id kyis chos la 'jug pa dang /phyin po log ginas

379a4(mdo sde): rabs bstan pa tshad med grangs med pa'i skyes pa'i rabs de dag thams cad ni rtsa ba gnyis la gnas pa ste/'di lta ste/mngon par shes po'i ye
379a5(mdo sde): shes pa gnas pa dang /snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba la gnas pa'o//rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang /'chi 'phro dang 'byung ba
379a6(mdo sde): rnams la dbang thob pa yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing bad ngong phyir
379a7(mdo sde): rgol ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes shing rtogs
379b1(mdo sde): lngas phung po'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'//ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin so sor rtogs pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o//rten
379b2(mdo sde): cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pas 'chi bdag gi bdud las yang dag par 'da'o//byang chub kyi sems mi nyams pas lha'i bu'i bdud las yang dag par
379b3(mdo sde): 'da'o//yang des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa yin te/des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa gang zhe na/gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la bdud kyis
379b4(mdo sde): glags mi rnyed pa ste/theg pa dmun pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang /byang chub kyi sems mi srung ba bdud kyi las dang /sems can tha dad par sbyin pa bdud kyi
379b5(mdo sde): les dang /skye ba la gnas pa'i tshul khrims bdud kyi las dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/gzugs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa dang /'jig rten gyi bya ba la
379b6(mdo sde): brtson pa'i brtson 'grus dang /de la chags shing ro myang ba'i bsam gtan dang /shos rab kyi chos dran pa la smod pa dra dud kyi las dang /'khor bas yongs
379b7(mdo sde): su skyo ba bdud kyi las dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su mo bsngo ba bdud kyi las dang /nyon mongs pa la mi smod pa bdud kyi las dang /ltung ba 'chab pa bdud
380a1(mdo sde): kyi las dang /byang chub sems dpa' la sdang ba bdud kyi las dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba bdud kyi las dang /byams pa rgyun bcod pa bdud kyi
380a2(mdo sde): las dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su mi tsholta ba bdud kyi las dang /dam pa'i chos mnyan par mi 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang /chos la slob dpon
380a3(mdo sde): dpe mkhyud byed pa bdud k+ShiM lus dang /zang zing dang 'brel par chos ston pa bdud kyi las dang /thabs dang bral bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bdud
380a4(mdo sde): kyi las dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po 'dor ba bdud kyi lus dang /tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khong khro ba bdud kyi lngas dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa
380a5(mdo sde): rnams la mi gus pa bdud kyi las dang /nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i rjes su mthun pa bdud kyi las dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi rjes su 'jug pa bdud
380a6(mdo sde): k+Shi las dang /dus ma yin par bsgrub 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang /snying rje chen po bor nas rigs la rtog pa bdud k+Sho las dang /'dus ma byas 'dod pa bdud
380a7(mdo sde): kyi las dang /'dus byas la smod pa bdud kyi las dang /sems sems can gyi ci bya'o cog la g.yel ba bdud kyi las dang /nga rgyal lo gnas shing mi
380b1(mdo sde): 'dud pa dang /lce gnyis smra ba dang /g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang /bcos ma la dga' ba dang /mi drang ba dang /rtsub cing brlang bya dang /sdig pa la mi smod
380b2(mdo sde): pa dang /chos kyi drungs 'byin pa dang /thob pa cung zad kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang /chos ma yin pa don du gnyir ba dang /chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang /
380b3(mdo sde): sgrib pa dang /chod pa dang /kun nas ldang ba rnam par mi gnon pa bdud kyi las dang /sems kyi dri ma mi rtog pa bdud kyi las dang /dge sbyong gi dri ma la mi
380b4(mdo sde): brjed pa bdud kyi las te/rigs kyi bu ji tsam du mi dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa dang /druge sna'i chos 'dor ba de thams cad ni bdud kyi lus so//chos bzhis
380b5(mdo sde): na bdud kyi las 'di dag las shin tu 'da' ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub ky-i sems mA brjed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag dang /dad pa dang
380b6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus la gnas pa'i bag yod pa dang thibs la mkhas pa la gnas ti sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /chos kyi tshul zab mo la gnas te
380b7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas so//rigs kyi bu de ltar chos la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing
381a1(mdo sde): bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsags
381a2(mdo sde): shing sems can thams cad 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la byams pas gnas pa yin/'byung
381a3(mdo sde): po rnams la snying rje bar gnas pa yin/bsam gtan rnams la de la ma chags par gnas pa yin/slong ba rnams la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba
381a4(mdo sde): yin/bsod nams dag gis longs spyod mthun pa yin/bsam pa dag pas lag na rin po che yin/mtho dman gyi yid med pas sems sa dang mtshungs pa
381a5(mdo sde): yin/tshul khrims yongs su dag pas bsam pa 'byor ba yin/mchod sbyin thams cad sgrub pas sems grol zhing sgo bsgribs pa med pa yin/chos
381a6(mdo sde): rnam par 'byed pas gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par 'gro bas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas
381a7(mdo sde): mi yin no//ji ltar phyi rol gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa de bzhin du bdag gi nang gi 'byung ba chen po
381b1(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cig/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /chos shes pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa de sems can thams
381b2(mdo sde): cad kyi 'tsho ba ma yin par ma gyur cig ces de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang yongs su bsngo ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsags
381b3(mdo sde): shing sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
381b4(mdo sde): bas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i bya ba shes pas stobs bcu yongs
381b5(mdo sde): su sbyang bar bya ba cher phyin pa yin no//zag pa zad pa'i bya ba shes pas myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/dus gsum la chags
381b6(mdo sde): pa med pa'i ye shes kyi bya ba shes pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya bo tshar phyin pa yin/sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi snang ba thob
381b7(mdo sde): pas spyan lnga yongs su sbyong bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba thob pos mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyang por bya ba tsher phyin
382a1(mdo sde): pa yin/nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yang dag par bcad pas dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba tshar phyin pa yin/bsod nams
382a2(mdo sde): kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pas lus dang /ngag dang /sems dang /mtshan dang /dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin//
382a3(mdo sde): dbang bskur ba thob pas sa bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sbyang
382a4(mdo sde): bar bya ba tsher phyin pa yin te/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la
382a5(mdo sde): nye bar gnas po yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing sems can thams cad kyi
382a6(mdo sde): sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dbyer na dzam+bu'i gling na sems can rnams kyi gzugs snang ba ji snyed pa dag thams
382a7(mdo sde): cad dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rgya mtsho chen po la yod do//de'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya'o//de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems su snang ba 'am//
382b1(mdo sde): gzugs su snang ba 'am/sgrar snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi snang ba gcig la snang
382b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni ro gcig pa yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
382b3(mdo sde): yang chos la rnam par grol ba'i ror shes pas rogacig pa yin no//'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las mi yol ba yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems
382b4(mdo sde): dpa' yang dus dang dus ma yin pa la so sor rtog pas byang chub kyi snying po'i dus las mi yol lo//'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig
382b5(mdo sde): mi gnas so//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems thams
382b6(mdo sde): cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so//'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu thams cad zad pas bri ba 'am gang ba med do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
382b7(mdo sde): yang chos thams cad zad pas chos kyi dbyings bri ba 'am gang bar mi byed do//'di lta ste dper na/rgya mtsho chen po ni kha tshon tshad med do//de bzhin du
383a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis tshad med do//'di lta ste/dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no//
383a2(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang zab cing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no//'di lta ste dper na//
383a3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can tshad med pa'i gnas yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa'i
383a4(mdo sde): gnas yin no//'di ni rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa yin te/rigs kyi bu de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can
383a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi tshogs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das
383a6(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/chags pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams lnga lta ba kun nas ldang ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' ni lbu ba kun nas ldang ba thams cadadro dang bral
383a7(mdo sde): bas chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no//'di lta ste dper na/rlung mar ni nam mkha'i dkyil ni mi chags so//de bzhin du byang
383b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa'ang sems can thams cad la mi chags so//yang skyes bu dam pa de dag ni spyod pa dang /cho ga'i tshul
383b2(mdo sde): shes pa yin te/de la cho ga ni dran pa'o//skyid pa ni rnam par myi g.yeng ba'o//de dag ni mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa'ang yin te de la mun pa zhes bya ba
383b3(mdo sde): ni gang chos rnams la mi shes pa'o//snang po zhes bya ba ni glang chos rnams l-I ye shes thogs pa med pa ste/de'i phyir de dag mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa//
383b4(mdo sde): zhes bya'o//skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ye shes gzhon gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi ye shes thob pa yin te/do tsa'i phyir zhe na/de dag rang byung gi ye shes
383b5(mdo sde): la mngon par gnas shing sems can gzhan ye shes 'dod par byed pa yin no//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la 'bebs pa'i ye shes
383b6(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi ye shes thob par gyur pa de'i tshe myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro//de nas
383b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//gang zhig lta ba kun las sems dpon zhing //mkhas pa bsod nams tshogs ni
384a1(mdo sde): rab byed la//mtshan ma ldan pa yongs su spangs nas su//byang chub phyir bsngos de ni zad mi 'gyur//nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal kun
384a2(mdo sde): spangs nas//de ni ye shes tshogs rnams tshal bar byed//mtha' yas blo ldan nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid//kun mkhyen ye shos yongs su rdzogs par byed///
384a3(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras de sangs rgyas rjes dran pa//gzugs drong mtshan gyi chos su ma yin te//gang na sems dang yid ni mi rgyu ba//de ni mthun par sangs rgyas
384a4(mdo sde): rjes su dran//chos ni 'dod chags bral zhing rang bzhin dben//zhi zhing rab zhi rtag tu mtshan ma med//gang zhig dmigs pa thams cad bral gyur
384a5(mdo sde): pa//de 'dir chos ni rjes su dran pa yin//'phags pa'i dge 'dun shin tu 'dus ma byas//stong pa mtshan med smon las rnam par grol//de la sems
384a6(mdo sde): med dran dang 'jug pa med//dA ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yin//phung po yongs su btang ba thams cad gtong //nyon mongs dngos po thams cad legs
384a7(mdo sde): par 'dor//snyoms pa med cing rtog dang rnam rtog dag/'di ni gtong ba legs par rjes su dran//tshul khrims zag pa med cing 'dus ma byas//
384b1(mdo sde): lus dang ngag dang yid kyis 'jug pa med//'byung ba med cing srid gsum mi gnas pa//de ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yin//lha gang dag cing dri med nyon
384b2(mdo sde): mongs med//dga' ldan gnas pA dbang skur thob gyur pa//sems can drag pa de dag 'di dran zhing //bdug kyang myur du de 'drar 'gyur snyam sems//de bzhin
384b3(mdo sde): gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa ni//nyon mongs dngos po thams cad 'dzin mi byed//chos dang chos minA gnyis las rnam par grol//de 'dra de ni rgyal ba'i
384b4(mdo sde): chos 'dzin yin//rgyul bas byang chub mtshan nyid grang brnyes pa//chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni yongs 'dzin cing //gang gis rdul ming mtha' 'dir rab shes pa//
384b5(mdo sde): de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi chos 'dzin yin//bdag ni rab tu dag pas sems can dag/chos kun dag par mkhas pa sus rtogs pa//de ni sems dag rang
384b6(mdo sde): bzhin 'od gsal te//sems can btang phyir rtag tu yongs smin byed//sems can mkhas rnams ma rung mi byed rnying //de ni bri zhing gang bar mthong ba med//
384b7(mdo sde): lta ba nor pa rab tu spang bar ston//de 'dra de ni sems can mang po spyod//'jig rten yul kun rab tu gang ston po//dus ni sangs rgyas yul yang rab tu ston//
385a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yul ni nam mkha' mtshungs pa ste//de bzhin 'jig rten yul yang rab tu shes//sgra skad dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad ni//brag
385a2(mdo sde): ca 'dra bar de yis rab mthong zhing //de la nyan pa'ang shin tu yod min par//de ltar rab tu shes pa gzungs thob bo//kun tu 'dzin dang 'dzin cing klog pa
385a3(mdo sde): dang /chos rnams bstan pa'i rnam pa rab bshad kyis//bdag dang sems can chos su rlom sems med//de ni gzungs la rab tu gnas pa yin//rgyal ba
385a4(mdo sde): kun gyis gsungs pa 'dzin byed cing //legs par gsungs pas sems can tshim byed pa//dran dang ting nge 'dzin dang bral mi 'gyur//gzungs la nges
385a5(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan 'di dag go/chos ni rnam pa kun tu bstsags med pas//chos la myi 'phro 'phros pa med pa'ang min//dper na klu ni cher rgyun 'bebs pa
385a6(mdo sde): lhar//de ltar de yang chos kyi char pa 'bebs//yon tan 'byung gnas rnams kyi spobs pa ni//thogs med rgyun chags rgyun ched mi 'gyur par//mdo
385a7(mdo sde): sde stong phrag bye ba rab tu 'chad//sems can dbang po sems can 'du shes med//sangs rgyas mthu yis bskal pa bye stong du//rgyun mi chad par
385b1(mdo sde): chos ni rab ston cing //bsam pa ji bzhin sems can tshim par byed//spobs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas yon tan gnas//chos 'di thams cad nam mkha'
385b2(mdo sde): 'dra ba zhes//glang gis chos rnams kun gyi tshul shes la//sems can srog dang gang zag mi 'dzin pa//de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi dam chos 'dzin//sems
385b3(mdo sde): can thams cad shin tu mya ngan 'das//de dag de ltar kun tu skye ba med//su yi bzod pa 'di 'dra'i 'od gsal ba//de ni bstan pa 'di la brag yang yin//
385b4(mdo sde): phung po yang dag sgyu ma lta bur mthong //chos dbyings ji 'dra de bzhin khams rnams shes//dbang po drug ni grong stong 'dra mthong ba//de ni phung po'i bdud las yang
385b5(mdo sde): dag 'da'//sprin brtsegs phung po lta bur nyon mongs rnams//bag yod tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed cing //chos la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa//de ni nyon
385b6(mdo sde): mongs bdud lngas yang dag 'da'//gang zag skye ba rtag tu skye med shes//'di la gang yang 'pho med 'gro ba med//chos rnams 'ong med song ba med shes
385b7(mdo sde): pa//de ni 'chi bdag bdud kyi dbang mi 'gro//gang zhig g.yo dang rlom sems mi byed rnying //byang chub gnas kyang byang chub 'du shes med//bdag dang
386a1(mdo sde): sems can med kyang snying rje 'jug/de ni dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul lo//rnam shaMs+t+ra ye shes gnyis ni mnyam par mthong //'dus
386a2(mdo sde): byas mi gnas 'dus ma byas la min//'gro ba'i sems ni sgyu ma 'drar mthong ba//de ni sems dpa'i rdzi ba med pa yin//pha rol tshu rol gang la'ang mi chags
386a3(mdo sde): la/chos ldan gru ni yang dag su sbyor zhing //sems can sgrol yang sems can 'du shes med//mnyam pa zhes bya byang chub sems dpa' de//srid pa
386a4(mdo sde): gsum po 'brog dgon 'dra ba dang //stong pa 'gyur ba med par rab shes shing //lam gyi rim gyis rtag tu sems can sgrol//de ni ded dpon bdud rtsi lam
386a5(mdo sde): ston pa//mdzangs pa de ni tshul dang tshul min mkhas//chos rnams gdod nas stong par rab tu shes//tshul dang rigs pa mya ngan 'das la 'dzud//byang
386a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de ni 'dren ces bya//sems kyi rgyud ni gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur//sems ni sems la nams kyang mtshams mi sbyor//'gro ba'i
386a7(mdo sde): sems rgyud de dag rab shes pa//byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dren ces bya//nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang chu zla ltar//chos rnams thams cad dag
386b1(mdo sde): cing rnam dag ces//nyon mongs kun dang 'dre bar mi byed pa//sems can dag pa de ni ma spyad pa//gang zhig chos gcig gis ni chos rnams kun//sgyum smig rgyu
386b2(mdo sde): 'dra bar gzung med dang //gsog dang brdzun dang rtag pa med par shes//de ni byang chub snying por myur du 'gro//chos gtan la 'babs pa bstan pa 'di
386b3(mdo sde): pAT+Te/lha dang /mi dang /l+h+wa ma yin dang /mi'am ci dang /rgyu'abye chen pa'i srog chags khrag khrig phrag bdun rgyu cha gnyis bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs
386b4(mdo sde): pA'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de//byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stod ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//stong gsum gyi spyod chen po'i 'jig rten
386b5(mdo sde): gyi khams 'ad 'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so//snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to//lta brgya stong dag kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bas
386b6(mdo sde): shing sil snyan drag kya dkrol nas/di skad ces gang dag bsten pa 'dre thos nas mos pa dang 'dzin pA dang nun tA ni byed pa'i sems can de drug ni sangs rgyas
386b7(mdo sde): yul du rjes su deng ba yin no//gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cod mkhas pa rnams kyis rkyen gyis leras
387a1(mdo sde): par brgyan pa byas te phyag bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na chos 'di lta bu 'di rab tu ston par 'gyur ro//skyes bu dam pa
387a2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan
387a3(mdo sde): pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod mngon du rangs par mdzad pas/mu tig gi dra ba 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa stong gsum
387a4(mdo sde): yongs su gang ba ri bra bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye
387a5(mdo sde): shes ni chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/bstan pa 'di ni rgyun mi chad pa de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la gzigs
387a6(mdo sde): shing dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'o bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa bstan pa des/'bor
387a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems tshim par gyur to//thog pa chen po 'di'ang rgyas par brjod pa mdzad par gyur to//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus
387b1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la'ang chos kyi snang ba chen pos rgyas par mdzad par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la'ang
387b2(mdo sde): chos 'byung ba'i sgo bstan pas des chos 'byung ba'i sgo tshad ma mchis pa bstan par bgyi'o//'phags pa nam mkha' mdzad kyis zhus pa///
387b3(mdo sde): bam po bzhi pa//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur ba spobs pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/'dug pa des byang
387b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyi ming namo mkha' mdzod ces bya ba de/ci nam mkha' khyod kyi mdzod
387b5(mdo sde): dngam/smras pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/nam mkha'i ni kho bo'i mdzod do//myur por spobs pas smras pa/rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i mdzod kyi bye brag bdag
387b6(mdo sde): cag gis kyang blta'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' mdzad
387b7(mdo sde): kyi khyad par ston cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs
388a1(mdo sde): kyi bu khyod kyi yid la gang 'dod pa de kho bos nam mkha' las char dbab bo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa 'di snyam du sems te/
388a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che ut+pa la'i dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba ni/'od thams cad rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma N+ye ni rgyang glags
388a3(mdo sde): kyi tshad/'dab ma bye ba stong phrag mang po 'jam zhing gzhon pa/gos ka tsi lin+di ka ltar rog na bde ba/dris ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyab po/kha dog mang po brgya
388a4(mdo sde): stong dang ldan pa/mthong na yid du 'ong zhing chog mi shes pa/pad+ma de mthong ba dang dri ma snams pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur
388a5(mdo sde): bde bdag gis mthong ste/'khor 'dir de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i char phib cig snyam pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pas bsams ma thag tu/
388a6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' num mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis na mi mkha'i ngos las de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i char mngon par phab ste/de nas 'khor
388a7(mdo sde): dag thams cad pad+ma de dag gi dri mthong zhing tshor bas dga' ba'i zas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//'khor de thams cad ting nge 'dzin las
388b1(mdo sde): langs te/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to//skyes bu dam pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ye shes kyi stobs legs so legs
388b2(mdo sde): so//sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlobs thob par gyur cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te/'dug
388b3(mdo sde): pa des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' las gser phye'i char phob cig/byang chub sems
388b4(mdo sde): dpa' rin chen bkod pas tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/de'i mod la nam mkha' las glo ser phye'i char mngon par phab bo//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
388b5(mdo sde): rin chen bkod pas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' las rin po che thams cad kyi char
388b6(mdo sde): phob cig/tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu dri'i mod la phyogs ba zhes ri rab kyi tshad tsam gyi rin po che grangs med dpag tu med pa ming tha dad pa kha dog tha dad yod
388b7(mdo sde): pa de dag gi char chen po mngon par phab pa 'di lta ste/go ser dang /dngul dang /shes dang /bai DUr+ya dang /rdo'i snying po dang /mu tig dmar po dang /spyag
389a1(mdo sde): dang /dpal gyi snying po'i rde ba can dang /dri med dang /rin chen b+hu raru dang /zla ba'i 'od dang /me shel dang /snang byed dang /'od mchog dang /
389a2(mdo sde): 'dzudzam gling me 'od dang /dung dang /mnu shel dang /byu ru dang /an+da rnyil dang /yon tan 'byung gnas dang /rab tu zhi ba'i 'od dang /chu 'od dang /chu
389a3(mdo sde): mdog dang /chu dang bar byed dang /sa'i 'od dang /mi phyed pa'i gnas dang /mig mi bzod pa dang /brgya byin thogs pa dang /rgyal ba dang /cher rgyal
389a4(mdo sde): ba dang /gzi brjid 'bar ba dang /dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po dang /rdo rje'i ze ba can dang /'jig rten snang ba dang /skar ma dga' dang /'od 'dzin dang //
389a5(mdo sde): zla ga ma dang /dzam+be'i chu 'od dang /dzam+bu'i gling gi 'od dang /'od stong ldan dang /skar mda'i sgo dang /me'i 'od dang /rgyal bas brgyan pa dang /tsha bzhi
389a6(mdo sde): byed dang /gdung ba med dang /nad sel dang /mig spyong dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid skyong dang /yan lag rnam par snang ba
389a7(mdo sde): dang /rnam par snang ba'i 'od dang /'od sngon po dang /'od ser pa dang /dkar po dang /shel gyi kha dog dang /rin po che'i dra ba dang /rin po che
389b1(mdo sde): thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa dang /ming de lta bu dang /ming de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i char rab tu phab ste/nor bu rin po che de dag gi ming bskul par yang zad par
389b2(mdo sde): sla ba ma yin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i dus kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu mi
389b3(mdo sde): mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can sdug bsngal zhing dbu pa ga zos dang skom med pa/gcer bu gos med pa/gos ral po gyon pa dang /yi dgas
389b4(mdo sde): rnams bkres shing sgom pas yongs su zin pa/gcer bu rang gi sras yog pa/mchil ma dang ngar snabs dang khrag dang /rnag za 'dod pa de lta bu'i sems can
389b5(mdo sde): de dag bskyab pa'i phyir zas dang /skam dang /gos kyi char khyod kyis phob cig/de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzad kyi byin gyi brlabs
389b6(mdo sde): k+Shis parda' ba dang /bcu' ba dang /myang bya dang /bldag pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab ste/ro bad+mo dang ldan pa'i khu ba dang /brdung ba thams cad kyi tsher
389b7(mdo sde): gyi rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char mngon par bab bo//gis kha dog du ma dang /kha dog tha dad pa dang /kha dog brgya stong du ma dang /phra zhing 'jam pa/
390a1(mdo sde): tsa lin+di ka ltar reg na bde ba'i char rab tu phab ste/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bkren pa dang /dbul po thams
390a2(mdo sde): cad dang /yi dgras thams cad kun tshim par byas so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
390a3(mdo sde): mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu sems can na ba g.yog med pa nad du mes reg pa yod pa de dgra g+h+ri don du spyan chen po'i char gang gis na ba de dag
390a4(mdo sde): thams cad nad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba phob cig/de nus de ma thug tu bar snang las bdud rtsi'i sprin gyi cher mngon par rab tu phab ste/des nang
390a5(mdo sde): thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di
390a6(mdo sde): skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ngan song gsum zhi bur gyis shig/de nas de ma thag tu bar stong las 'od rab tu btang ste/sems can
390a7(mdo sde): dmyal ba po dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang rab tu ldan par
390b1(mdo sde): gyur te/ngan song gsum po thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur te/'di ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la rab tu sbyor ba'i bar du me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /

391a1(mdo sde): bar bgyis te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi rgyan ces bya ba nges
391a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzad la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i char ni phab na/da yang tshul khrims

391b1(mdo sde): can theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas par gyur to//de nas byang chub snyoms dpa' kun tu sdang ba zhes bya ba de 'di snyam du sems so//byang chub sems dpa'/

391b4(mdo sde): ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu dri ma med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lha'i mig rnyed na/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams

391b6(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs mod dpag tu med pa dag ni ji lta ri 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu bab pa dang /chos kyi sku thams
391b7(mdo sde): cad grag pa dang /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na'ang mched ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par 'di lta bu'i bya ba rnams rab tu 'byung ba mthong ngo //de nas byang
392a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba ngo mtshor du gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam gyi byin brlabs grub pa de ni bsam gyis
392a2(mdo sde): mi khyab ste/ga lar yang cig car sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skyes bu dam pas 'di 'dra ba'i char mngon par rab tu phab bA zhes tshad du brjod pa 'di tshad du

392a5(mdo sde): kyi char gyi cho 'phrul 'di bstan pas bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skyes so//de nas rgyal po'i khrab nas bud med yugs mo

392b1(mdo sde): midzod kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/bud med de dag gi sngon khyo'i kha dag dang mtshan ma dang dbyibs ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i skyes bu lnga brgya nam mkha' las babs nas/

393b1(mdo sde): ma'i mi de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//khyed cag gis mi dbul po 'di dag bas da ci rung /nged cag gi gos dang rgyan rnams khyer la nged cag gi srog chod de mi

394a6(mdo sde): khyod kyis gang mi skam mi zad mi dbus pa'i nam mkha' mdzod bzhag nas ji srid lon nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/

394b1(mdo sde): byang chub de ni nam mkha' ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de la bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams der bsngos pas de bas na nam mkha' la mdzod mi skam mi zad mi dengs so//rlung

394b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'khor 'di ni sems can gang rnams rtog pa mang zhing dad par 'gyur pa drug mchis kyi bshad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i
394b7(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste dper na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis yongs su gang bar
395a1(mdo sde): b+hu te/rdul pa rngub kyi rdul de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa brgya stong zhing rdul phra ma cig bzhag la de lta bur bgrang bya dang mtshan ma bzhag
395a2(mdo sde): pa de skad kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ni zad par 'gyur gyi ji srid nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

395a4(mdo sde): zad nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkhru'u mdzod kyis dang po byang chub tu sems skyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci zhes bgyi/bcom ldan
395a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yang shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la sem rgyas kyi ning thams cad ston pa'i 'jig
395a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig
395a7(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam thams cad las shin
395b1(mdo sde): rtar+N+Nang ba na po rgyu'-i gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du blang ste/yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin d+hu shAg+h+ra sa pA s+yAngs rgyas kyi gi smon tan ngarkang
395b2(mdo sde): b+h+r-i dag gi tshe'i tshad bskul par gnas kyang bshad par slo ba ma yin no//shA ran+ti Tu de bzhin gsheg sna pa de'i 'khor srid kyis smrab pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams
395b3(mdo sde): gi rnyed du gyur te/byang chub sems dpe'i drug 'dun ni bgrang ba mas 'das pa zhig byung du//shA rI'i bu de'i dus rba rdo rje rten b+h+rUM kha sudun spyod gsum
395b4(mdo sde): 'kho li sa swA ba'i rlom pa lta rnams cad kyis dbyung bris ba zhes byu bu klog rgyung /rin pa tshe mdza zas ma gyis khyab go/de'i bu ra
395b5(mdo sde): gaN+DI brjid kyis mngon par rgyun po du drug stod ya //de ci'i phyir na ni/sangs rgyas kyi nyid dri na bung med mong yang mang du//shA de'i blang ni
395b6(mdo sde): shegs pa de'i tshe'i cheng dgrol pA s+t+rai br-i bahU~M thu gi//de nas rgya m-i bya m+b+ha rnams cad ky-is d-i ba skyer bris par gyi bsal pa bzhi bdur/btsa
395b7(mdo sde): 'das de la bsnyen bkur dang rim grar byas te nyin gcig la 'god pa'ong re ra'i bya ba stong srid kyi rin po che phung po bang par 'gyur ba de lta bus bsnyen bku
396a1(mdo sde): rim gro byas so//de nas rgyal po de bsod nams kyis brtan+da pas bu'i tshogs dang /grong gi mi rnams dang /'khor rnams dang bcas te tha
396a2(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang
396a3(mdo sde): bskur ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi lta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod de'i tshe//
396a4(mdo sde): de'i dus na stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
396a5(mdo sde): ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsolo to//kye ma byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bag ma te/bcom
396a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das de srid nas theg pa la rab tu zhugs pa ngo ma tshor to//bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba'i spyod pas 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi mthu chen po rnyed par nus
396a7(mdo sde): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom
396b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang bsti sbyang byas te byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyangs so//gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub kyi sems yongs su dag pas bsam pa yongs
396b2(mdo sde): su sbyangs te/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyor ba yongs su sbyangs/gang+gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed kyi sbyor ba yongs su dag pas lhag pa'i bsam
396b3(mdo sde): pa yongs su sbyangs/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyin pa'i pho rol tu phyin po yongs su sbyongs/gung+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyin
396b4(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
396b5(mdo sde): pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin po yongs su dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
396b6(mdo sde): yongs su sbyangs/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu yin pa yongs su sbyangs/gang+gA'i
396b7(mdo sde): klung gi bye mo snyed kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi shes rab kyi
397a1(mdo sde): /pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas thubs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang ste/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bu/
397a2(mdo sde): pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su sbyangs/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed kyi sems can thams
397a3(mdo sde): cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su dag pas byams pa chen po yongs su sbyangs pa nas/snying rje chen po dang /dga'
397a4(mdo sde): ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dang /mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes kyi bar du yongs su sbyangs so//de bzhin du lus yongs su dag pa dang //
397a5(mdo sde): ngag yongs su dag pa dang /sems yongs su dag pa ste/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems yongs su dag pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongs su
397a6(mdo sde): sbyangs so//de bzhin du sbyar te/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thams cad nas/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan thams cad yongs su dag pas dge
397a7(mdo sde): bo'i rtsa ba'i bar du des gong+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su dog pas nam mkha'i mdzod nga di yongs su dag par byang chub
397b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis yongs su sbyangs so//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis nam mkha' las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
397b2(mdo sde): thams cad ston te/shA ri'i bu ji ltar nam mkha' la zad pa med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad yongs su dag pas gang la'ang zad pa med
397b3(mdo sde): do//des ni 'di nam mkha' mdzod ces bya'o//bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa'i khri longs spyod mi zad pa dang /lag na rin po che dang /nam mkha'
397b4(mdo sde): mdzod kyi smon lam yongs su bskang ba'i bzod pa skyes so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la
397b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu bdag cag gis nam mkha' las chos bsgrags pa'i mdzod mnyan to//namo mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/de'i phyir rigs
397b6(mdo sde): kyi bu gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par 'dug la/nam mkha' 'di la ston par 'du shes skyed cig dang /chos mnyan pa'i mdzod thos so//de nas
397b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang 'khor de dag thams cad thal mo sbyar nas nam mkha' la phyog btsal te 'khod do//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
398a1(mdo sde): nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis bar snang las tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo //nam mkha' 'dra ba'i yid rnams kyi//thams cang
398a2(mdo sde): chos kyi tshul gang yin//de la 'jug pa'i rab bstan gyis//khyed cag mthar gyis mnyan par gyis//nam mkha' la ni mtho ba med//dma' ba'ang yod
398a3(mdo sde): pa ma yin te//gang gi chos nyid mtho dma' med//de la 'dud po ga la yod//nam mkha' la ni skye ba med//'gog pa dag kyang mi dmigs so//ma skyes
398a4(mdo sde): pa yi chos rnams la//de la rnam par rtog pa med//nam mkha' la ni bri ba med//gang ba dag kyang mi dmigs so//chos rnams gang med bri med do//
398a5(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam mo//nam mkha' la ni mun pa med//de ni de yis nyon mi mongs//sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bas//de bas
398a6(mdo sde): nams kyang nyon mongs med//nyi zla yi ni 'od zer gyis//nam mkha' dga' bar mi 'gyur te//nam mkha' 'dra ba'i sems rnams kyang //gang la'ang
398a7(mdo sde): dga' bar 'gyur ba med//mdung thung rtse gnyis 'bab pas kyang //nam mkha' la ni nyon mongs med//de bzhin sdug bsngal sgo kun gyis//rgyal ba'i
398b1(mdo sde): sras ni nyid mi mongs//bdud rtsi dus kyi char pa yis//nam mkha' la ni dga' 'gyur med//rnyed dang bsti stang thams cad kyis//byang chub sems dpa' dga' mi byed//
398b2(mdo sde): bstod pa dang ni smad pa la//nam mkha' yongs su mi rtog ste//de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal la//byang chub sems dpa' brtan yi g.yo//ma dag g.yos
398b3(mdo sde): par gyur kyang ni//nam mkha' nam yang g.yo ba min//'jig rten 'di dag g.yo 'khrug kyang //byang chub sems dpa' khrug pa med//bsdig pa'i bskal pa
398b4(mdo sde): 'byung ba na//ji ltar nam mkha' mi 'tshig pa//de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad kyis//byang chub sems dpa' brtan mi gdung //skye ba med cing 'dul ba'ang
398b5(mdo sde): med//ji ltar nam mkha' gnas pa bzhin//chos rnams 'gro med 'ong ba'ang med//chos kyi dbyings la de dag gnas//gzugaso su snang ba ji snyed pa//
398b6(mdo sde): nam mkha' las ni thams cad 'byung //chos su snang ba ji snyed pa//de dag chos kyi dbyings las byung //mtshan ma med cing gzugs med pa//nan mkha'
398b7(mdo sde): bltar yod ma yin te//de ltar sems rnams rab shes na//nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs mnyam mo//ming tsam pa ni nam mkha' ste//de la kha dog
399a1(mdo sde): dbyibs kyang med//sems dang yid dang rnam shes kyang //ming gis yongs su bstan pa'o//ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' med cing //thams cad du/
399a2(mdo sde): yang gzung du med//de bzhin ye shes mthu chen yang //nam mkha' dang ni mnyam zhing mtshungs//sems can nam mkhar 'gro mod kyi//de la 'gro ba'i rjes
399a3(mdo sde): kyang med//sems can byang chub phyir spyod kyang //de ni spyod pa'i mtshan ma min//ji ltar sngon gyi mtha' yi lus//nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba/
399a4(mdo sde): de bzhin phung po'i ngo bo nyid//na mo mkho'i dang ni mnyam zhing mtshungs//khams bzhi dag kyang nam mkha' dang //mtshungs zhing 'dra bar rab tu gsungs///
399a5(mdo sde): 'di ltar sreg pa'i bskal ba la'ang //nam mkha' dang ni khams 'di mtshungs//ji ltar sems can thams cad kyis//nams kyang yongs su gang mi
399a6(mdo sde): nus/de bzhin yul rnams kun gyis kyang //sems kyi rgyud ni mI gang //tshi ga tshan seng ge'i sgra dag gis//'jig rten mgon zhes gsungs pa
399a7(mdo sde): /'jig rten 'das pa'i shes rab gang //de dag bstan pa 'di la ngoms//ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che bas//tha ma dmigs par mi 'gyur te//
399b1(mdo sde): de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kyang //mtha' ma dmigs par mi 'gyur ro//chos rnams thams cad sangs rgyas so//gang gis yang dag nyid shes na//de dag
399b2(mdo sde): dngos po mi 'jig cing //dngos po dag la'ang mi gnas so//dngos dang dngos med rnam shes shing //yang drag mtha' la gang gnas pa//dngos po dang ni da
399b3(mdo sde): med pa//lta ba mkhas pas mi 'dzin to//stong pa nyid ni sgra yis bsgrags//sgra la stong pa nyid med de//de ni sgra med brjod pa med//de phyir stong pa nyid ces bya//
399b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad kyang ni//stong pa nyid ni brjod du med//gang de stong zhes bya ba yang //de yi don ni brjod du med//sgyu ma smig rgyu rmi lam dang //mig/
399b5(mdo sde): yor dang ni brag ca rnams//de la sogs pa bshad pa yis//'dren pa rnams ni chos ston to//sems can rnams ni drang ba'i phyir//dpe rnams shin tu kun
399b6(mdo sde): bstan te//rab tu zhi ba'i chos rnams la//gnyen po rnams ni mi dmigs so//mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kun kyang //mtshon nyid du ni rab tu bstan//mtshan
399b7(mdo sde): gzhi mtshan gzhi med pa dag/chos kyi dbyings la mi dmigs so//mtshan gzhi nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de//nam mkha' mtshan nyid med pa yin//gang
400a1(mdo sde): gis tshul 'dir ba rtogs pa//de dag byang chub sems dpa' yin//chags pa med cing bcings pa med//shin tu cung zad med pa ste//spros
400a2(mdo sde): med spros dang bral ba de//byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//sems can las ni ma grol ba//sems can la yang mi gnas shing //sems can rang bzhin
400a3(mdo sde): ye shes kyis//byang chub sems dpa' zhes de bya//sems can rab tu mya ngan 'das//thos nas dngang bar mi byed de//gang de byang chub rab zhugs pa/
400a4(mdo sde): da' bo dag gi go tshe 'dri//sgyu ma byed pa'i sems can dag/mang du sprul nas der bsad kyang //de la bsad po gang yang med//sems can mtshan nyid
400a5(mdo sde): de bzhin no//sgyu ma dang ni sems can dang //mya ngan 'das dang sangs rgyas kun//rnam pa kun tu rang bzhin gcig/rang bzhin rang bzhin med par rtogs///
400a6(mdo sde): nam mkha' las ni nam mkha'i mdzod//mi zad pa yi mdzod grub ste//sems can thams cad mgu byed cing //mdzad de zad par mi 'gyur ro//tshad
400a7(mdo sde): med bsod nams chu bos ni//mdzod 'di rnam par sbyangs pa ste//chos rnams la yang 'pho med pararo//chos rnams chos nyid lta bar bya//rgyu la
400b1(mdo sde): brten te 'byung ba yi//chos rnams thams cad rab shes na//de yi mdzod ni mi zad de//chos kyi mdzod ni bsam mi khyab//chos bzhi 'di dag mi zad par//'jig
400b2(mdo sde): rten mgon pos rab gsungs te//sems can nam mkha' byang chub sems//de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams so//de ste de dag rdzas yin na//de dag yongs
400b3(mdo sde): su zad 'gyur gyi//de dag med pas mi zad ces//de bas de ni mi zad gsungs//chos ni rab tu skad cig pa//zad pa chos ni mi zad de//mi zad de la zad pa
400b4(mdo sde): med//de phyir mi zad pa zhes bya//byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis//chos bstan 'di ni rab shes na//des ni byang chub rnyed mi dka'//byang chub phyir
400b5(mdo sde): la yang dag zhugs//tshigos su bcad pa bstan pa 'di byung ba na byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo//lha'i bu nam mkha'o
400b6(mdo sde): dkyil na 'khod pa khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do//de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can
400b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sgra 'od gau las byung snyam du bdag ngo mtshar
401a1(mdo sde): du gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la dris shig dang /'di khyod la lan
401a2(mdo sde): ljon no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu sgra 'di ga las byung
401a3(mdo sde): snyam du bdag ltad mor 'dzin par gyur to//nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/brag ca'i sgra ga las byung /smras pa//
401a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu pha rol gyi skra'i rnam par rig byed las brag ca'i sgra 'byung ngo //smras pa/rigs kyi bu brag ca la lus sam/sems sam/gzugs sam/
401a5(mdo sde): kha dog gam/dbyibs gang yang yod dam/smras pa/rigs kyi bu de ni med do//smras pa/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no//ji ltar brag ca yongs su ma grub
401a6(mdo sde): kyang sgra skad go bar byed pa de bzhin du/nam mkha' yongs su ma grub ste/skra skad go bar byed par 'gyur ro//smras pa/rigs kyi bu skra 'di go bar byed
401a7(mdo sde): pa su//gang nas dbyangs 'di 'byung /smras pa/rigs kyi bu ye shes kyi so sor rnam par rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/kho bos yid kyi sems
401b1(mdo sde): pas gang bsams bde bar snang 'di las 'byung yang sems de der 'gro ba'ang med/de 'dir 'ong ba'ang med mod kyi/sgra'i sgra brnyan kyang 'byung ngo //rigs kyi bu rten
401b2(mdo sde): cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji tsam du zab pa la ltos/gang rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung yang rgyu las 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'phel/rgyu med pa las kyang 'bras bu 'byung
401b3(mdo sde): ba ma yin no//'dri ltar rgyu dang rkyen las 'bras bu mngon par grub pa'i chos 'di gnyi ga la'ang g.yo ba med cing byed pa med do//gang de lta bu'i 'du shes pa de
401b4(mdo sde): ngag ni bral ba ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa de nyid de'i rnam par byang ba zhes gsungs so//kun rus//
401b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa bsal bas rnam par byang ba ma yin te/gang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni rnam par byung ba'o//'di lta te kun nas nyon
401b6(mdo sde): mongs pa dang /rnam par byeng ba zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ka'ang brda'i tshig go/don dam pa'i mtha' la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byeng ba'ang dmigs su
401b7(mdo sde): med do//don dam pa'i mtha' ni mtho' yin te/gang 'di mtha' ma yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o//gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de stong pa nyid
402a1(mdo sde): kyi mtha//gang stong pa nyid kyi mthu' de bdag gi mtha'o//gang bdag gi mtha' dri ni chos thams cad kyi mtha'o//ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams
402a2(mdo sde): cad ni de'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi mtha'/nye bar zhi ba'i mtha' ste gang mtha' de gsum gyi sgo la mi chags pa de ni chos thams cad la mi chags pa'i ye shes rnyed do//
402a3(mdo sde): de nas gnas bar+d+han shU ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod ltang mo can zhes ming sras btags/smras pa/
402a4(mdo sde): btsun pA shU ri'i bya khyod gang dang gang du chos la 'dun pa dang brtson pa de dang der lcid mor mi 'gyur ram skyes pa rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no//smras pa/btsun
402a5(mdo sde): pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kho bo chos thams cad la 'dun cing brtson pa de dang der kho bos nam spangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
402a6(mdo sde): snyam du ltad mo dang ldan te/de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod po thams cad la kho bo ltad mor gyur to//sems can
402a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa lo 'jug pa shis pa la kho bo ltad mor gyur te/de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o//gang li kho bo ltad mor mi 'gyur
402b1(mdo sde): ba'i ye shes de gang yang med/'jug pa de gang yang med pas de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o//gang du kho bo ltad mor gyur pa der nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bdud
402b2(mdo sde): kyi las thams cad kyi skabs med de de'i phyir na kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
402b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa'i ming 'di nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su brjod de/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ston kyang gang la'ang mi chags te//
402b4(mdo sde): chags pa ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang ston pa ni ngo mtshar to//de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal zhes bya ba 'dus
402b5(mdo sde): par gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rab tu bstan pa las bcoms te//
402b6(mdo sde): gang ci 'dra bar ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyang ba bya ba la spobs par gyis shig/de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub
402b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi snying por thogs pa med par 'gro ba
403a1(mdo sde): bsam pa dag pa zhes bya ba yod do//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i
403a2(mdo sde): 'od zer ces bya ba yod de/de bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i phyir gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro//dri ma med ces bya ba'i ting
403a3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin ni sems yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro//
403a4(mdo sde): dge ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnyog po med par 'gyur ro//mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong bar 'gyur
403a5(mdo sde): ro//rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur ro//'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni g.yas phyogs
403a6(mdo sde): kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rgyu drung lta ba las rnam par zlog par 'gyur ro//dga' byed ces bya ba'i
403a7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur ro//skar ma'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sbyin gnas yongs su dag
403b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//mthu drag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems mi 'jam par 'gyur ro//mtshungs par mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni skyems
403b2(mdo sde): can thams cad la sems mnyam par 'gyur ro//byed pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni las rnam par smin pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro//seng ge'i tog
403b3(mdo sde): ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jigs pa dang spu zing zhes byed pa med par 'gyur ro//sems pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud thams cad skrag par
403b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos par 'gyur ro//pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems kyi rgyan du
403b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing snang bar 'gyur ro//bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rjes su chags
403b6(mdo sde): pa dang khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro//rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la snang b.ra'i gyur ro//
403b7(mdo sde): skar mda' ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bag chags thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro//nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mun pa mun nag
404a1(mdo sde): med par 'gyur ro//nyi ma 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro//yon tan
404a2(mdo sde): rdzi 'byung gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni yon tan gyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro//sred med kyi bu lci bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
404a3(mdo sde): ni pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro//snying po'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje'i lus mi phyed par 'gyur ro//snying po
404a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dam bcas pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mngon
404a5(mdo sde): par shes pa lus mi nyams par 'gyur ro//rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ro//rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i
404a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro//spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa
404a7(mdo sde): la 'jug pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro//sa 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chags pa dong zhe sdang med par 'gyur ro//bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms pa
404b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud bzhi las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro//sus rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gzugs thams cad rnam
404b2(mdo sde): par 'jig par 'gyur ro//mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sem rtsi gcig tu 'gyur ro//rnam pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni
404b3(mdo sde): dmigs pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa thams cad las yang drag par 'da'
404b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//'khor lo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//glog 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni
404b5(mdo sde): sems kyi skad cig 'jig pa la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro//legs par byas pas rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dge ba'i chos thams cad
404b6(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rnam par sbyong bya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cod spong bar 'gyur ro//lus kyi rgyan ces
404b7(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzong po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//ngag gi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags
405a1(mdo sde): pas sems can thams cad kyi sems mgu bar 'gyur ro//sems kyi rgyun ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin las ma nyams par 'gyur
405a2(mdo sde): ro//brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro//mtshungs par gtong po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can+da tha dad pa med par
405a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//tshul khrims bsags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//bzod pa'i go bgos pa zhes
405a4(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lus dang srog la mi lta bor 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mngon par shes pa myur bar 'gyur ro///
405a5(mdo sde): tshad med pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshangs pa la dbang byed par 'gyur ro//ci'ang med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gzugs med pa'i
405a6(mdo sde): khams yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro//lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro//
405a7(mdo sde): lhun po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phyogs bcur rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi sgrar mda' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sgrib pa dang /
405b1(mdo sde): chod pa dang /kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro//rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni las drang bya ba sna tshogs la 'jug par
405b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//mtha' yas 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lta ba thams cad yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro//stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni
405b3(mdo sde): dmigs pa dang lta ba thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro//mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtog pa dang /rnam par rtog pa dang /yongs su rtog
405b4(mdo sde): pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro//smon pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//mi g.yo ba zhes bya
405b5(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni g.yo ba dang sems pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro//sgra dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur
405b6(mdo sde): ro//kun 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro//dran pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshad med
405b7(mdo sde): pa'i snod kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad tshol bar 'gyur ro//mi zad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro//
406a1(mdo sde): rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lag nA rin po che rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro//rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can rnams//
406a2(mdo sde): cad kyi sems shes par 'gyur ro//'gro ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'gro ba thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro//blo gros la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i
406a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin ni sems dang yid rnam par dge bar 'gyur ro//sprin dang ldan pa zhes bye ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi charwa rab tu 'bebs
406a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud rtsi'i chos rnyed par 'gyur ro//chos rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni
406a5(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro//dge 'dun rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las mi ldog par
406a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//gtod pa rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phung po thams cad rab tu 'dor bar 'gyur ro//tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting
406a7(mdo sde): nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rtsa ba la rab tu 'god par 'gyur ro//lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnam par dag pa'i chos la
406b1(mdo sde): kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro//chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro//nam mkha'i ngo
406b2(mdo sde): bo nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'gyur ro//rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
406b3(mdo sde): pa thob par 'gyur ro//rgyud chags pa dang rgyud ma yin pa'i rjes su rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni yi ge thams cad dang tshig rab tu dbye ba lo mkhas pa 'dzin
406b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//shin tu sbyangs pa dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dri sems skad cigs kyi
406b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//rigs kyi bu de dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad
406b6(mdo sde): cu ste/ting nge 'dzin de re re la'ang 'khor ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do//de dag thams cad bsdoms na ting nge 'dzin bzhi khrir 'gyur te/de dag kun
406b7(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang bas ting nge 'dzin brgyad khrir 'gyur ro//de dag sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /da ltar byung ba mi zad pa
407a1(mdo sde): nas nga nga dzin drung zhingan stong du / na sa du nga /sa nga spya //
407a2(mdo sde): sems can gyi srung bu brgyad khrib na skyong la rab tu 'jig pa'i phyir chus kyi byung po brgyad Sh+Ti bani stong de bzhin ga shegs pa sna na shud rjes t+yai/
407a3(mdo sde): ts+tshoT 'di ni sna s+ya rgyas kyi ye shes dang spyad pa lnga 'jug pa sems can rnams shrI ba par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi mnga' gang sangs rgyas kyi sa shes sab
407a4(mdo sde): sems chen hU~M spyong ba mtha' dag la 'jug pa den chud med byasam skyes mi khyab ste/bskol pa brgyad skyong gi mthar 'dug du ba shud bar sgrub pa yi na
407a5(mdo sde): ngas rgyas kyi ye shes 'du yongs su bstan cing / 'dzin gyi sgo 'di dag ba shad pa na/byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong ni ting nge 'dzin dang /
407a6(mdo sde): ma pad+ma sgrubs pa'i mi smye ba'i chos la brjod pa tha 'dir 'gyur ro// d+h+ri hrI med pa snod dag par rdzogs pa'i byu
407a7(mdo sde): rje sems skyes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' tshe la logs so zhes bya ba byin te/skyes bu dam pa
407b1(mdo sde): su dag na rnags / dzin sa sgrag 'a kyi da ma 'dug ma la //ba smo pa ga gas pa dzin
407b2(mdo sde): yongs su rjod pa 'dzin tu yongs su basbyin pa na lags pa legs sa/phyogs pa mdza sa /ma po ldag//des
407b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dngul gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi thad du byang chub sems dpa'
407b4(mdo sde): nam mkha' mdzad kyis thog mar nam mkha' 'di las rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu phab/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
407b5(mdo sde): semyos dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i drus na bskal pa babrang ba las 'das pa'i pha rol gyi'ang ches
407b6(mdo sde): pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs
407b7(mdo sde): pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri mi med pa'i 'od ma
408a1(mdo sde): las 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba ska rags zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su yon tan gyi 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten du byung ste/yang rigs
408a2(mdo sde): kyi bu ska rags zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang 'byor pa/bde ba/lo legs pa/rgyas pa/skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan
408a3(mdo sde): pa/'jam zhing mnyan pa/gos ka tsu lan+di ka ltar reg na bde ba/dzam+bu'i chu bo gser gyi pad+ma bkram pa/rin po che bsal ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par smras pa/
408a4(mdo sde): mig myangs ris su bres pa/lhag mthil ltar mnyam ste/'jig rten gyi khams de 'di lta ste dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
408a5(mdo sde): kun spyod pa ltar 'dug go/mi de dag thams cad kyang gzhal myed khang dang /khang pa brtsegs pa na gnas par gyur cing bsam pas zas dang skom rab tu 'byor//
408a6(mdo sde): to//de'ang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag drug cu'i byang chub
408a7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po byung ngo //yang rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'o rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba ron po che
408b1(mdo sde): sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan po de'i khang pa dzam+bu'i gling gi dbus su bamyigs par gyur to//shar phyogs su'ang/
408b2(mdo sde): dpag tshad bzhi/nub phyogs dang /lho phyogs dang /byang phyogs su'ang dpag chud bzhi bzhi bkru gi/blta na sdug pa/rin po che sna bdun las byas po/sbyang
408b3(mdo sde): mos tshal lnga brgyas rab tu brgyan pa'o//yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/thams cad kyang yul gyi
408b4(mdo sde): bzang mo sha stag go//khye'u brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/thams cad kyang chen po che chen po'i stobs dang drag shul 'chung ba shwa stag go/yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod
408b5(mdo sde): nams kyis brgyan pa la btsun mo rin po che gnyis yod de/gcig gi ming ni dpal gyi gzi brjod/gcig gi ming ni dpal gyi 'od ngo //rgyal po bsod nams kyis
408b6(mdo sde): brgyan pa de dga' ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal du zhugs te/btsun mo'i nang na 'dug po'i tshe lha mo de gnyis kyi pang pa nas khye'u gnyis byung ste/brdzus te skyes
408b7(mdo sde): pa sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/smon lam rdzogs pa/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs pa ste/gcig gi ming ni
409a1(mdo sde): seng ge zhes bya/gcig gi ming ni seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes bya ste/de gnyis byung ma thag tu sgra skad dang dbyangs gcig tu pha bsod nams kyis
409a2(mdo sde): brgyan pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//sngon byas druge dang mi dge chud mi za//de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas chud mi za//bsam pa byang
409a3(mdo sde): chub sems kyang chud mi za//bsgrub pa gtsor byed thos pa chud mi za//sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa chud mi za//bzod dang nges pa rnams kyang chud mi za//byas par
409a4(mdo sde): gzo zhing dge ba'i las byas phyir//brtson 'grus brtsams pa de yang chu do mi za//rtse gcig bsam gtan dang ni rnam thar sems//nges par rtogs dang shes
409a5(mdo sde): rAbA sems mi nyams//ye shes las byas rtag tu mi 'khrugs te//mi 'khrugs chos lngas byang chub rnyed mi dka'//de ni nyon mongs pa yis mi gos te//
409a6(mdo sde): de ni slar yang mngal du mi gnas shing //de ni pad+ma'i snying por brdzus te skye//mi gos pa ni pad+mo chu las ltar//shar phyogs logs kyi rgyal ba sman pa'i rgyal///
409a7(mdo sde): dus gsum mi chags ye shes dam pa yi//bde gshegs dri med 'od kyi gan nas su//chos 'dod phyir ni de nas bdag cag 'ongs//u dum+bi ra'i me tog
409b1(mdo sde): ji lta bar//de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'byung ba rnyed par dkas//de la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang blta slad du//bde gshegs thad du yab kyang bzhud par bgyi//rgyal pos
409b2(mdo sde): rjes su bstan pa 'di thos nas//bu dang btsun mo 'khor dang lhan cig tu//srog chags bye ba stong gis yongs bskor te//rgyal po de yi gan du nye bar dong //me tog dri
409b3(mdo sde): zhim byug par bcas pa yis//de la tshul dang 'dra ba'i mchod byas nas//zhabs la phyag btsal rab tu bskor byas te//thal mo sbyar ba btud nas spyan sngar 'dug/
409b4(mdo sde): seng gi dang ni seng ge'i rtsal 'gro yang //de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la bzung nas su//gtugs nas chos dang don ldan mkhas pa yi//'phags pa des ni
409b5(mdo sde): tshigs bcad 'di dag smras//khyod ni skyabs dang mgon dang dpung gnyen te//'jig rten long ba rnams kyi sgron mar gyur//sems can rnams kyi bsam spyod gyur la
409b6(mdo sde): mkhas//ji ltar mos pa de bzhin gnos par mdzad//rgyal po 'di ni phyug cing skyid pas mos//gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang bcas pas bcings//nom yang ston
409b7(mdo sde): pa la ni mchod phyir yang //nye bar mi mchi chos lta ga la nyan//mgon po thugaso rje rab tu skyed mdzod la//ji ltar de kun lhan cig thos nas su//theg pa ma tshig/
410a1(mdo sde): las ldag par mi 'gyur ba//byang chub lam mchog de ni log par ston//bcom ldan mgon po tA lA brgyud cu snad//nam mkhar 'phags
410a2(mdo sde): bzhugs mi dbang de la gsungs//nga la chos mchog rgyal po khyod nyon la//thos nas de la tshul bzhin nan tan gyis//'dod pa mi rtag de bzhin tu ma srid skyog/sa
410a3(mdo sde): nirta yi zil pa'i thigs pa 'dra//brtse ba de bzhin 'dod pa de rmi lam 'dra//mkhas pa su zhig 'di la dga' bskyed//sems can gang yang 'dod pas ngoms
410a4(mdo sde): da de//phyir yang de bzhin 'dod pa sgom zhing rgyu//byis pa ngoms mi shes shing yul la gnas//shes rab gang ngoms de dag shin tu ngoms//snums
410a5(mdo sde): zhing snang ba med paltar//de bzhin phung po lnga yi grA mo 'dra//khams rnams 'di dag sbrul gadrug bzhin du bstan//dbang po drug ni stong pa'i gling dang 'dra/
410a6(mdo sde): budang rgyung ma rgyal snod yul 'khor yang //'chi bar gnas pa'i grogs su gyur pa med//sbyin dul kun sdom tshul khrims phyung ba ni//de dag pha rol 'gro
410a7(mdo sde): ba'i grogs yin no//de yi gzugs dang yon tan spobs pa rdzogs//rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ji 'drir ba s+ho se la//gal te 'di 'dra bar yang 'gyur 'dod na/
410b1(mdo sde): byang chub dam pa 'di phyir sems skyed cig/rgyal po glang po des ni chos thos nas//srog chags bye ba stod phrag bdun cu dang //sras dang brnyan mo stobs bcas klong mi
410b2(mdo sde): rnams//byang chub dam pa 'di phyir sems skyed de//bdag cag mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi//sems can thams cad 'gron du gnyer bar bgyi/
410b3(mdo sde): byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi//'gro ba bla med sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi//rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa des bcom
410b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas po la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du rung ba yid du 'ong ba kha na ma tho ba med pa'i bde ba'i yo byad dang yongs su longs spyod pa thams cad kyis
410b5(mdo sde): rim gro byas so//khye'u seng ge dang /song ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba de gnyis bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pA la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de dag
410b6(mdo sde): rab tu byung bas rgyal bu phyi ma nyi khri'ang khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de nas sing ge dang /seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba'i dge slong byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
410b7(mdo sde): chos dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /nyin par spyod pa la sbyor zhing brtson pas ring po ma lon par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do//de dag mngon par shes pa
411a1(mdo sde): rnyed pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang /smon lam gyi stobs kyis chos bshad nas de gnyis kyis sems can tshad
411a2(mdo sde): mimed grangs med pa yongs su smin par byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod par gyur to//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar lo brgyad khri
411a3(mdo sde): bzhi stong 'das nas rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po ga la
411a4(mdo sde): ba der song ba dang des khye'u de gnyis rab tu byung bar mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang ngas ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la bde ba'i yo
411a5(mdo sde): byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas na 'di gnyis rab tu byung nas/ngas ma byas pa ci zhig byas snyam du brnyas pa'i sems skyes so//rigs kyi bu de nas yang
411a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa d+hi ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal pos rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de lta bur sems pa mkhyen nas/byang chub sems
411a7(mdo sde): dpa' seng ge rtsal gyis 'gro ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab dang /mngon par shes pa dang /bsod nams dang /ye shes
411b1(mdo sde): kyi stobs ston la 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyis shig/bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyis shig/byang chub kyi lam 'bar bar gyis shig/sems
411b2(mdo sde): can thams cad tshim par gyis shig/phas kyi rgol ba rnams cher chod cig/chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar gyis shig/nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig/
411b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa'ang ston cig/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro bas de'i dus na nam mkha' la lag pas byugs
411b4(mdo sde): nonas des nam mkha' la lag pas byugs pa dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so//nges yang nam mkha' la log
411b5(mdo sde): pas byugs pa dang /de nas de'i tshe bar snang las sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo //des yang nam mkha' la lag pas byugs pa dang /
411b6(mdo sde): de nas bar snang las sngon ma thos ma mthong ba'i dri zhim zhing 'jam pa ka tsa lIn+da ka ltar reg na bde ba'i me tog rnams kyi char bab bo//des yang nam mkha' la lag pas
411b7(mdo sde): byugs pa dang /de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las rin po che thams cad kyi cher rab tu mngon par bab bo//longs spyod dang kun spyod pa thams cad kyi char rab tu bab bo///
412a1(mdo sde): ji lta bur stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der yo byad thams cad kyi char mngon par rab tu 'bab pa de de lta bu'i zas dang sgrom dang /
412a2(mdo sde): blo char mngon par rab tu bab bo//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal pos rgyal po bsad nams kyis brgyan pa la
412a3(mdo sde): 'du snyed ces bka' stsal to//rgyal po chen po khyod kyis smin pa yongs su btung ba dang rin po che'i char bab pa 'di gang myang /gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
412a4(mdo sde): rin po che'i char 'di ni dper bgyi pa 'dra skabs lags te/de tsam du tshad ma mchis so//bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal
412a5(mdo sde): gyis 'gro ba 'di mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'dod na/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'di 'dra ba'i rin po che'i chur mngon
412a6(mdo sde): par 'bebs so//gang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sums can de dag la ji lta bur 'dod pa bzhin du ngoms shing tshim par byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di
412a7(mdo sde): ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na gang sa bla'i lha rnams kyis me la 'di sems bskyed ma thag tu nam mkha' las rin po che thams cad kyi char mngon par rab tu 'bab pa las
412b1(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nam mkha'i mdzod du 'gyur ba snyam zhes sgra phyung ngo //ji ltar sa pra'i lha rnams kyis skra phyung ba de bzhin du bar snang dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
412b2(mdo sde): dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis kyang ma la 'di sems bskyed ma thag
412b3(mdo sde): tu 'di 'dra ba'i rin po che'i cher rab tu bab pa las na/kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nam mkha'i mdzod du 'gyur ba snyam zhes sgra byung bas ming de la bcom ldan 'das
412b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyalnga po de rjes su yi rung ngo //glang la des rjes su yi rang ba de la gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas
412b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo //rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa des byang chub sems dpa' seng gro'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba'i/
412b6(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa dang /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs de mthong nas khye'u rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba rgyal por bcug ste/drad pas khyim nas khyim med par
412b7(mdo sde): rab tu byung nas sbyin pa 'di ni sems kun tu chags pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni sems yongs su dag pa'o//sbyin pa 'di ni lus dang ngag gi bgegs so//rab tu byung
413a1(mdo sde): ba ni lus dang ngag yongs su sbyong ba'o//sbyin pa 'di bgegs chen po'o//rab tu byung ba ni bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi ba'o//sbyin pa 'di ni rtswa
413a2(mdo sde): dang lo ma'o//rab tu byung ba ni snying po dang 'bras bur 'grub pa'o//sbyin pa 'di ni nga yi ba dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni
413a3(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor ba'o//sbyin pa 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las mi bskyod pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni lta ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'o//
413a4(mdo sde): sbyin pa 'di ni byis pa'i rtsed mo sbyor ba'o//rab tu byung ba 'di ni dul ba dang cang shes pa'i sa'o snyam du de de ltar tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor zhing /sems de lta bu dang
413a5(mdo sde): bsam pa de lta bus de ltar rab tu byung ste gcig pu mi 'dre ba bag yod pa/brtson pa rab tu dben par gnas pas ring po ma thogs par mngon par shes pa lnga
413a6(mdo sde): bskyed do//rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o//
413a7(mdo sde): do ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig de de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan ces bya bar gyur to//byang
413b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes bya bar gyur te/des thog mar nam mkha'i mdzod las
413b2(mdo sde): rin po che'i char phab bo//de tshun chad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med par nam yang nam mabya'i mdzod las rin po che'i char 'bebs pa mngon par
413b3(mdo sde): shes pa las ma nyams so//rigs kyi bu nga ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge zhes bya bar gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni de'i tshe de'i
413b4(mdo sde): dus na rgyal bu rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur te/gang rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pas rgyal por bcug pa'o//rigs kyi bu de'i gsung rab kyang 'di ltar dga'
413b5(mdo sde): zhing yongs su dag par gyur te/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyi gnas su gyur to//sems can gang ji snyed kyis bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs
413b6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag kyang byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//sngon byung ba dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di bstan pa na srog chags khri nyis stong bla na
413b7(mdo sde): med po yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to///
414a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gang lags/de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom
414a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa
