446b7(mdo sde): song ba'ang med/nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang ma yin te/yul la mi gnas shing phyogs ni mi gnas par shes pa de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi
447a1(mdo sde): gnas te/de rnam par mi rtog pas nyon mongs pa mi spong ngo //rnam par mi rtog pas nyon mongs pa mi 'gog go/de ltar rnam par ma rtog cang kun tu rto/
447a2(mdo sde): ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da'o//byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis smras pa/gang dga' ba de ni
447a3(mdo sde): bag la nyal lo//gang mi dga' ba de ni khong khro ba'o//gang dga' ba'ang med mi dga' ba'ang med pa de ni rjes su chags par mi 'gyur ste 'gras par mi 'gyur
447a4(mdo sde): ro//rjes su chags pa med cing zhe 'gras pa med pa ni mnyam pa nyid gnas pa zhes bya'o//grang mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa de ni chos gang yang tha dad du mi byed do//
447a5(mdo sde): tha dad pa med pa la gnas pa ni mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par mi sne mastu te/bsam du med pa'i chos thob pa la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed do//byang chub sems dpa
447a6(mdo sde): rin chen 'od kyis smras pa/bdag kun nas ldang ba las bdud kyi las rnams snang ste/bdag rnam par dag par gnas pa la bdud kyis ci zhig byar yod/de ci'i
447a7(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/bdag rnam par dag pas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag go//nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pas chos thams cad rnam par dag go/gang chos thams
447b1(mdo sde): cad rnam par dag pa de ni nam mkha' rnam par dag pa ste/nam mkha' rnam par dag pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da'o//byang chub
447b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal pos smras pa/ji ltar rgyal po'i dbang bskur ba thob pa'i stobs dang 'khor mang po dang ldan pa su la'ang mi 'jigs pa de bzhin du/byang chub sems
447b3(mdo sde): dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa chos rin po che'i 'khor dang ldan pa'ang bdud thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so//de la dbang bskur ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos mthar phyin pa rnams
447b4(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs pa'o//chos rin po che'i 'khor ni gang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i chos rnams 'dzin pa'o//de lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
447b5(mdo sde): dpa' ni bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa zhes bya ste/'di ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'o//byang chub sems
447b6(mdo sde): dpa' ri rdob rgyal pos smras pa/de 'di lta ste dper na/bu gar rlung 'jug pa de bzhin du gang nas gang du sems kyi bu ga yod pa de dang der bdud kyis glags rnyed do//de lta
447b7(mdo sde): bas na byang chub sems dpas rtag tu sems bu ga med par bya'o//de la bu ga med pa'i sems 'di lta ste/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid yongs
448a1(mdo sde): su rdzogs pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo'o//byang chub sems dpa' mthong
448a2(mdo sde): na dga' bas smras pa/gang ji snyed cung zad mthong ba'i nang na sangs rgyas dang chos mthong na de dag gi mchog ces bya'o//de la sangs rgyas mthong ba de ni gang gzugs
448a3(mdo sde): su mi mthong ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes par mi mthong ba ste/gang chos thams cad mi mthong ba de ni yang dag
448a4(mdo sde): pa'i mthong ba'o//yang dag pa'i mthong ba ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o//de la chos mthong ba ni gang yid la byed pa thams cad mi spyod pa'o//gang mi 'gyur bar mthong ba
448a5(mdo sde): de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'o//gang 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni chos mthong ba zhes bya ste/gang byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /chos mthong
448a6(mdo sde): ba dang ldan par gyur pa de ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'o//byang chub sems dpa' mig 'phrul can gyis smras pa/bdud kyi las ni/
448a7(mdo sde): g.yo ba dang snyems pa dang bskyod pa las langs te/de la gang zhag las g.yo ba dang snyems pa dang bskyod pa'i gzhi de byang chub sems dpas mi bya'o//de ni tshul bzhin
448b1(mdo sde): ma yin pa yid la byed pa'o//nga tshul bzhin rab tu sbyar bas mi g.yo mi snyems mi bskyod do//de mi g.yo mi snyems mi bskyod pas bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'dra'o//byang chub
448b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' yon tan rgyal po snang gis smras pa/gnyen po ji snyed par bdud kyi las kyang de snyed do//gnyen po med pa ni chos kyi dbyings so//chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings
448b3(mdo sde): su yang dag par 'dus te/de bas na gang gis chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa des chos thams cad rtogs so//chos kyi dbyings las gud na'adra bdud kyi las mi dmigs so//
448b4(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings ji lta bur bdud kyi las kyang de bzhin te/chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid las tha mi dad do//de ltar tshul gcig la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems
448b5(mdo sde): dpa' ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da'o//byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po'i bal glang gis smras pa/nyam chung ba la ni bdud kyis glags rnyed de/stobs
448b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa la ni bdud kyis glags mi rnyed do//de la nyam chung ba de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis skrag pa'o//de la stobs dang ldan pa doni rnam par thar pa'i bsgo
448b7(mdo sde): gsum gyis mi skrag pa ste/mngon sum pas mi skrag go/shin tu rtogs pas na mi skrag go/rab tu sgoms pas na mi skrag ste/skrag pa med pas bdud kyi yul
449a1(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'da'o//de ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo'o//byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/
449a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ro gcig pa bzhin du chos kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho 'dir chos thams cad kyang ro gcig go/gang bdud kyi las rnams dang gang sangs
449a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi phrin las de dag thams cad ni stong pa nyid du mtshungs/mtshan ma med par mtshungs/smon pa med par mtshungs/skye ba med par mtshungs 'byung ba med par
449a4(mdo sde): mtshungs te/ro gcig pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da'o//byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/
449a5(mdo sde): kye grogs po dag nam mkha' ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das te/nam mkha' ni mig gi yul ma yin/rna ba dang /sku dang /lce dang /lus dang /
449a6(mdo sde): yid kyi yul ma yin no//chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi yul te/lus dang ngag ni nam mkha' drang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba'i ye shes snang
449a7(mdo sde): ba'o//ye shes snang ba mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'das te/de ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya
449b1(mdo sde): ba'i chos kyi sgo'o//byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams kyis ji snyed bshad pa de thams cad kyang bdud kyi las dang bdud kyi yul
449b2(mdo sde): lo//den+ti'i phyir zhe na/yi gor byas pa rnam par rig pa ste/sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni yi ge med pa'o//tshig ji snyed par bdud kyilas kyang de/da de/tshig mang ba
449b3(mdo sde): la bdud kyis ci zhig byar yod/gang tshig med pa ni rnam par rig pa med pa ste/bdag dang pha rol yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //bdag med cing pha rol med pas
449b4(mdo sde): chos grang la'ang phan 'dogs pa 'am/gnod pa byed par gnas pa ma yin no//de ltar rjes su rtogs pa ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/rigs kyi
449b5(mdo sde): bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bdud sdig can
449b6(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so//sdig can khyod kyis bdud kyi yul las yang dag por 'da' ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di thos sam/smras pa/thos so//smras pa/sdig can khyed kyis
449b7(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i chos kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdud kyi las byed nus sam/smras pa/rigs kyi bu gang gis bdud kyi yul las yang
450a1(mdo sde): dag par 'da' ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di thos sam/nyan pa de dag la'ang bdag gis bdud kyi las byed mi rus na/ye shes kyis mngon sum du rtogs
450a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lA wA ci smos/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog byed pa tsho gas bral ldan dang /dga' tshogs ldan dang /smras
450a3(mdo sde): dang /khang bzangs can dang lha bzhi po de dag gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so//sdig can gyi mngon sum du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi snying por sngon
450a4(mdo sde): stobs dang /drag shul dang /bkod pa dang /g.yog ji lta bu dang lhags pa den bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa dang /snying rje dang /sbyin pa dang /dul ba dang //
450a5(mdo sde): yang dag par sdom pa dang /nges pa dang /tshul khrims dang /thos pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /brtson 'grus brten cing 'o bar ba dang bsod nams
450a6(mdo sde): dang /ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyag rin po che sa la brdabs pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par rab tu g.yos te/khyod stobs dang
450a7(mdo sde): g.yog dang bcas par shin tu pham par byas pa de de ltar khyod la mngon sum du gyur bzhin du'ang bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdud
450b1(mdo sde): las byed du 'ong ngam/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la mchod pa'i las byos shig/de nas bdud sdig can gyis rin po che'i
450b2(mdo sde): gdugs bye ba phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul te 'khor dang bcas pa la phul lo//lha'i me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa rnam pa tha dad pa mang
450b3(mdo sde): po thogs te/bcom ldan 'das gA la ba de logs su gtor nus g.yog dang bcas pas tshig 'di skad cesna smras so//gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
450b4(mdo sde): gyis nam mkha'i mdzod 'di bdag cag la stsal na bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do//byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
450b5(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/sdig can khyod kyis nam mkha'i mdzod 'di mthong ngam/smras pa/rigs kyi bu mthong ngo //'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyang bkod pa ji snyed pa dang /
450b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi bkod pa ji snyed pa dang /bdag gi gnas kyi bkod pa ji snyed pa de dag pas ches lhag pa 'dir mthong ste/de la ni lha'i 'om mi'i rin po
450b7(mdo sde): che'i longs spyod de gang yang med pa ma yin no//smras pa/sdig can khyod nam mkha'i mdzad 'di dag thams cad sbyin gyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
452a1(mdo sde): rje thogs shing 'dug pa mthong nas de dag 'jigs shing skrag te byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i dus na 'dzum pa mdzad pa
452a2(mdo sde): dang /'dzum pa de'i don tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la zhus nas/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bas bdud kyi bu lnga brgya
452a3(mdo sde): po 'di dag 'jigs shing skrag ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //bcom
452a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo nam bdud sdig can de byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/de dag thams cad kyang ming tha dad pa'i
452a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji srid na bdud sdig can
452a6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/dri byang chub thob nas ming ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur/de'i 'jig rten gyi
452a7(mdo sde): khams kyang ming ni mas bgyi bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ts+tshakun dga' bo bdud sdig can 'di dadung yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
452b1(mdo sde): rnams su bdud kyi bya ba byed de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag lus ding snying po nyon mongs pa rab tu 'joms pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos par 'gyur zhing /sangs rgyas rnams
452b2(mdo sde): dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshog gsang ba dang /spyod la ma /yon tan dang /tshul khrims kyi glanas dang /spyad pa dang /tshig dung /sbyor ba ma
452b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ci tsam gyis byang chub kyi sems de brtan par gyur pa de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas dri ma med pa'i tog ces bya ba 'byung ste/de'i gsung rab
452b4(mdo sde): la bdud sdig can 'di 'dra tha mar bdud kyi las byed de/de dge ba'i rgyu bya yongs su smin nas sems med pa'i sems kyis spangs rgyas dngong /chos kyi spyad pa thams cad
452b5(mdo sde): rnam par dge ba'i rjes su song zhing byang chub kyi snyoms bskyed do//de'i 'og tu grangs med pa bgrang ba las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par byed de/bsti
452b6(mdo sde): stang byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed cing mchod par byed par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab tu
452b7(mdo sde): byung nos kyang dam pa'i chos dus gsum du yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/sems can tshad med pa'ang byang chub la yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro//de de'i 'og tu
453a1(mdo sde): /la pa zla sa med ba ba basbyin bla na myed pa yang da/par rdzogs pa'i byang chu na par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar 'gyur/rnam pa stong/
453a2(mdo sde): pa'i bskal pa la sangs su dag par gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su shin tu gnas pa'i chog snang ba thob ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsamapa
453a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i ltung sa skyes su 'jig rten du 'byung ni/rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas sangs d+d+his bcom ldan 'das kyi bar drug/yang kun dga' ba
453a4(mdo sde): ba shenas pa'i 'ag rten gyi kham de 'ab+h+ri pa dang /rgyas bya dang /bde ba dang /la logs smra dang /dadamis gang byar 'gyuraro//
453a5(mdo sde): na/kun dga' ba dga' ldan gyi lta'i longs spyod dang/kun spyod pa rgyu 'dra bar sems can de dag gi 'dus spyod dang /kun spyod pa 'di de 'dra bar la
453a6(mdo sde): nang pa'i ba de bzhin gshegs pa shrIn d+ha gnas phyi'i sa s+yA ba zlab ces bya bar rje'i che na ba ba ng+gel b+ha blu'i ba buM par 'gyur ro/
453a7(mdo sde): ga rgyag kyi rgyan sa kyi myi chen par gyu //byo kyi mas pe rgya nga ga 'dun tshu /na
453b1(mdo sde): dang/ / / skyong/du da yang dag tu rdzogs pa nags zugs da/mas pa/yongs su dag par
453b2(mdo sde): gnas pa'i 'jig rten khams skye rabats+tsha m+be m+b+hi sna bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gnas nga bathob pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi dang dung
453b3(mdo sde): dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro//bdud sdig cen lung bstan pa 'di rab tu bstan pa ni
453b4(mdo sde): gang 'khor der 'dus bya'i brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong po de dag thams cad mtshar du gyur nas/'di ltar bdud kyi las de snyed brgyad kyang de bzhin
453b5(mdo sde): shegs pa nga ba don yod pas na nu me pa yang dag par rdzog N+Di hU~M rlu rgyun sa sa ngas par 'i gyur ban sna sa ng+yas com ldan 'dis ma lcags pa
453b6(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i chos 'dral ba ji mA tshur te//bcom ldan 'das rigs so bru ma/rigs kyi bums zhig gang zag lo gang zug gis tshang gzung /bcom ldan 'das
453b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma lags so zhes tshod dri brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal
454a1(mdo sde): stsal pa/de de bzhin no//grogs po dag ji skad smras pa bzhin te/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lo//'on kyang grogs po dag sems ni rten cing 'brel
454a2(mdo sde): par 'byung ba ste/ngas sems can 'di dag chags pas gom pa 'dag cing chags pa dang bral bas 'jog pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pas chos gos 'dzin pa
454a3(mdo sde): dang /nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyon pa dang /len pa dang bcas pas zan khyam gyis gcod pa dang /len pa med par mthong ste/kye grogs po dag sems can gyi
454a4(mdo sde): spyod pa ni sna tshogs so//mgo smos pas go ba dang /spros pa ba shad pas glo ba dang /tshig lhur len pa'i sems can dag yod de/de dag la dri bzhin gshegs
454a5(mdo sde): pa so so tsA rigs par chos la gzod par bsten pa'i gtam rnams gsung ngo //kye grogs po dag nyon mongs pa ni yul la mi gnas shing phyogs la'ang mi gnas te/nyon
454a6(mdo sde): mongs pa ni bsags pa'ang med/phung po'i dngos po'ang med do//tshul bzhin ma yin ma byung bas nyon mongs pa byung ngo //tshul bzhin byung bas rnam par dag pa byung
454a7(mdo sde): ngo //de la de ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba de tshul bzhin brtags na rnam par dag pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro//ngas 'di las dgongs te log par lta ba yang dag
454b1(mdo sde): paji lta ba bzhin du shes na de'i yang dag par lta ba yin no zhes tshig 'di smras so//nam yang log par lta ba ni yang //pa'i lbu bar ma gyur/mi 'gyur/'gyur ba med do///
454b2(mdo sde): 'on kyang ji ltar log par lta ba la log par rig nas de la mi gnas/rab tu mi gnas/spyod pa med/rab tu spyod po med pa de ni yang dag par lta ba'i lam la 'jug pa
454b3(mdo sde): ste/'di ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o//kye grogs po dag nyon mongs pa ni sgrib par byed pa'o//rnam par dag pa ni snang ba'o//nyon mongs pa ni nyi mu chung ba'o//lhag
454b4(mdo sde): mthong ni stobs dang ldan pa'o//nyon mongs pa ni glo bur ro//rang bzhin ni rtsa ba rnam par dag pa'o//nyon mongs pa ni kun tu rtog pa'o//rang bzhin ni kun tu rtog pa
454b5(mdo sde): med pa'o//kye grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po 'di ni chu la brten to//chu ni rlung la brtan to//rlung ni nam mkha' la brten to//nam mkha' ni rten pa med
454b6(mdo sde): do//de bzhin du sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /khams bzhi po 'di dag pas nam mkha'i khams ni thams cad kyi
454b7(mdo sde): nang na stobs che zhing sra ste sogs pa med pa'o//sogs pa med pa ni ma skyes ma 'gegs pa ste/rang gi ngang gi tshul gyis gnas pa'o//de la gang khams gsum
455a1(mdo sde): po de dag ni skye ba dang 'jigs par ldan pa mi gnas pa ring du mi gnas pa ste/'di dag ni 'gyur/bar snang gi nam mkha'i khams la ni 'gyur ba gang
455a2(mdo sde): yang med do//de bzhin du phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched ni las dang nyon mongs pa la gnas pa'o//las dang nyon mongs pa ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa
455a3(mdo sde): yid la byed pa la gnas so//tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la ni rang bzhin yongs su drag pa la gnas te/de'i phyir sems rang bzhin 'od gsal ba
455a4(mdo sde): de glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs zhes bya'o//de la gang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang /gang las dang nyon mongs pa dang /gang phung
455a5(mdo sde): po dang /khams dang /skye mched thams cad kyang rgyu dang rkyen gyis yang dag par zin na ni skye/rgyu dang rkyen ma tshogs na ni 'gag ste/gang de'i rang bzhin des ni
455a6(mdo sde): rgyu'ang med/rkyen yang med/tshogs pa'ang med/skye ba'ang med/'gag pa'ang med do//de la nam mkha'i khams ji lta bar rang bzhin yang de bzhin
455a7(mdo sde): no//tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ji lta bar rlung yong de bzhin no//las dang nyon mongs pa ji lta bar chu'ang de bzhin no//phung po dang /khams
455b1(mdo sde): dang /skye mched rnams ji lta bar sa'i khams kyang de bzhin te/de'i phyir chos thams cad ni rtsa ba yongs su chud pa zhes bya ste/snying po med pa'i rtsa ba/mi gnas pa'i rtsa ba/dag
455b2(mdo sde): pa'i zla ba/rtsa ba med pa'i rtsa ba'o//kye grogs po dag de ni rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste sgo gang la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams
455b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sgo la mi gnas shing /rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad kyang mi snyems pa'o//de dag thams cad snyoms pa yang dag par bcom pas tshul dang
455b4(mdo sde): 'dra bar 'gro ba'i lam khong du chud de bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro//de dag bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pas sangs rgyas kyi yul la
455b5(mdo sde): rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro//de dag sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas pas sems can thams cad kyi yul la 'jug par 'gyur ro//sems can thams cad kyi
455b6(mdo sde): yul la zhugs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi yul 'khrug par mi byed par 'gyur ro//de chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste/mnyam pa bye phrag med pa thob pas thams
455b7(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su thob par 'gyur ro//bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' mang po zhig las dang nyon mongs pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa
456a1(mdo sde): sa nga ba dang //'argyad pa kun nas snang ba rnams dang rnam tu mi smra ba'i chos la bzod 'a thob pa gas
456a2(mdo sde): rnam mkha' mdzod kyis smraste pa/bum pa brgya bya ste tham//de nas dge bsnyen dpal smras zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das kyi na bas gnyis
456a3(mdo sde): phyag btsal nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par grol ba'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi
456a4(mdo sde): slong du bshad do//de ci'i slang du ni ne/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das bya med pa'i slad du brtul zhugs kyis gtam phyir bgyis te bshos kyang drug
456a5(mdo sde): deng ba sres pa skyer ba des/bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis chos mang du thos kyang 'gyod pa rab tu bskul bar ma nus kyi/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rgyas
456a6(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'gyod pa de thams cad ma mchis par gyur te/chos thams cad la snang ba'ang stes so//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'gyod pa ma mchis the chom
456a7(mdo sde): mchetshes snang ba thob pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ba byi ste/bcom ldan 'das dper na bdud sde can sna bdag kyang khya
456b1(mdo sde): par du mchi bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag lags so legs so//ngas bshad pa'i don khyod kyis khong du chud de/ngas khyim bdag
456b2(mdo sde): khyod la lung bstan gyis sems dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'dis bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la bsti steng du byas/bla mar byas//ri mo
456b3(mdo sde): b+h+yos te mchod nas/de dag gi zad nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas
456b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba las 'das pa ji skad cig mnyes par byas te/bskul ba grangs med pa bdun brgya na shin tu dri ma med pa'i bskal pa la/de bzhin gshegs
456b5(mdo sde): pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel bya zhes bya bar+ya 'jig rten du 'byung ste/rig pa dang zhabs su ldan po zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du
456b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de nas dge bsnyeni dpal sras kyis/ ldan 'das las bdug bla na med pa yang dge phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lhung bstan pa thos nos tshim
456b7(mdo sde): zhing mgul yi rings te/rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang ming bde ba skyes te/rgyun ji srid thogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sku le gso la nas tshig 'di snyed rgyas
457a1(mdo sde): sa //bcom ldan 'das bdag gi khyim na ga tu chen pa bzhim ni b+h+ya//rin pa na mang pa dang /gser sa sangs su ga bas+ho//dadadu
457a2(mdo sde): las gter chen po gcig ni khyim gyi bu skad deng /bran po dang /bran mo dang /lus bgyid pa rnams la stsal to//gter chen po gcig ni dbul ba slong ba thams
457a3(mdo sde): cad la stsal to//gter chen po gcig ni dge slong phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la 'bul lo//gter chen po gcig
457a4(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la 'bul lo//bcom ldan 'das bdagu ni yang byar gyur teng yi bla ma mchis/yongs su 'dzin pa'ang
457a5(mdo sde): ma mchis na bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ste basbyin par rdzogs shing dge slong gi tshul thob par bgyi ri gsol/dge
457a6(mdo sde): bsnyen dpal sgras legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul bya la rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong gi tshul thob bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
457a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das ni bskal pa grangs mi
457b1(mdo sde): mchis pa bye bar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di su 'dzin par 'gyur/de nas 'khor de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu langs nas de dag thams
457b2(mdo sde): cad thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas sgra skad dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//bcom ldan rkang gnyis dam pa ni/
457b3(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das slad bdag cag rnams//lus dang srog tu bcas btang ste//dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar spro//rnyed dang bkur sti spangs nas su//bsten pa kun kyang
457b4(mdo sde): rab spangs te//sangs rgyas ye shes bstan pa yi//chos 'di rjes su mi btang ngo //dam pa'i chos ni gzung slad du//gashrI dang mi snyan mchi ba dang //ngan du smra
457b5(mdo sde): ba'i tshig rnams kyang //bzod pa de dag dang du blang //tshul 'di rab tu bzung nas su//co 'dri ba dang sdigs pa dang //mi bsngags pa dang mi snyan pa//de dag
457b6(mdo sde): thams cad bzod par bgyid//dmigs pa dag la rab gnas pa//bdud kyi pho nye bdud kyi phyogs//dam pa'i chos la skur 'debs pa'i//dge sbyong dag ni
457b7(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur//tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig chos can//khyim pa dang ni bsten cing gnas//bkur sti dag dang rnyed la brkam//chos 'di tshol ba mi
458a1(mdo sde): bgyid do//'jig rten rgyang pan rnams dang 'dre//bdag la rab tu bstod bgyid cing //rab tu nges pa rnams la smod//mi mkhas nga rgyal can dag
458a2(mdo sde): 'byung //dgon pa'i gnas ni spangs nas su//rtag tu 'du 'dzi rnams la dga'//'jig rten gsang tshig rnams la brtson//'jig tshogs la ni rab tu
458a3(mdo sde): gnas//mi mkhas pa dag dge 'dun lngas//zhal te byed la rtag tu brtson//bsam gtan bsam gtan byed sbyangs te//dkon mchog gsum dang 'dri mi
458a4(mdo sde): byed//thos dang khrims kyis ma lags kyis//tshogs kyi nang na rnyed pa tshol//sbyin pa dag la phyi phyir brtson//rtog pa bcas shing mya ngan bcas//nga yir
458a5(mdo sde): 'du shes gzung nas su//mdza' dang srong ster khyim la dga'//de dag der ni rabo 'jug cing //'jig rten pa yi gtam rnams bgyid//zhing gi don dang khyim gyi
458a6(mdo sde): doni//de dag nyo tshong bgyid la gnas//thong gau shol shal ba rnams ldan yang //bdag cag dge sbyong yin zhes 'dzir//dmigs pa yis ni rab tu bgyid//
458a7(mdo sde): ltab tha dad kun tu gnas//stong pa nyid kyi chos thos nas//de dag giyang sa bzhin du 'gyur//'jig rten pa rol mi spyod cing //las kyi rnam par smin
458b1(mdo sde): pa 'dod//brdzun du smra dang rab tu ldan//chos ma lags la chos su 'dzin//dge sbyong rgyal po rab 'khrug cing //de ltar rab tu ma rungs pa//rnam par 'jig tshe sems
458b2(mdo sde): tsucan phyir//bdagacig dam chos gzung bar bgyi//mdo sde rnams kyang phan tshun du//mthun par spyad par mi byed de//rang rang gi ni sgra rnams la//de dag rtag tu
458b3(mdo sde): mos par bgyid//mdo sde gang dag rab zab cing //rnam grol 'bras bur ldan pa rnams//rab tu 'dzin par mi bgyid de//de dag sna tshogs gtam rnams bgyid//
458b4(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba yi dus 'di na//don bcas tshig 'brur ldan pa yi//legs pa re gsung ba'i chos rnams ni//rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur//de yi tshe na sems
458b5(mdo sde): n+dan yang //rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur//rgyal po'i las kyis bsdigs pa na//'jigs shing skrag nas 'bros par 'gyur//'jig dus rab tu
458b6(mdo sde): mi zad pa//sdig pa'i dus ni 'di 'dra tshe//sangs rgyas kyis ni gang bshad pa//chos 'di bdag cag gzung bar bgyi//tshul 'di rab tu bzung nas su//gang
458b7(mdo sde): dag chos la mi gnas pa'o//sems can rnams la byams par bgyi//de dag la ni snying rje'ang bgyi//sems can rnyed dang 'dod gnas pa//tshul khrims
459a1(mdo sde): 'chal pa mthong nas slu//de yi 'gro ba cir 'gyur zhes//mchi ma'ang rab tu dbyung bar bgyi//dam pa'i chos la skur 'debs pa//de dag 'phral
459a2(mdo sde): du mthong na yang //de dgra gshe bar mi 'gyur bar//ring nas byams pa btsal bar bgyi//rab tu bsdams nas ngag gi las//nyams kyis ci nus bsrung
459a3(mdo sde): bar bgyi//sdig pa la ni rab gnas pa//de la glo bur gtam mi bgyi//nor sbyin de bzhin bsti stang gis//mi rnams yongs su smin bgyis nas//yang
459a4(mdo sde): dgra sdig med spyod yul gyis//slad kyis de dag bskul bar bgyi//khyim dang bstan pa kun spangs te//don nyung ba dung bgyid nyung ba//bas mtha' dgon
459a5(mdo sde): pa'i spyod yul po//ri dgas bzhin du 'gyur bar bgyi//'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba dang //sbyangs pa'i tshul khrims gnas pa dang //mnyam gzhag
459a6(mdo sde): shes rab ldan pa dang //g.yel ba ma mchis 'gyur bar bgyi//dul ba dang ni zhi ba drang //grol bas grong du zhugs nas kyang //sems can gang dag chos
459a7(mdo sde): tshol ba//de la bdag cag chos bstan to//chos 'dod par ni rtags nas su//shin tu ring du'ang mchi bar bgyi//chos la dga' zhing mos rnyed nas/
459b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi don yang bgyi//sems can rnams kyi 'khrul mang po//de dag mngon par mthong nas kyang //chos dang nges par rab gnas nas//bdag la rab
459b2(mdo sde): tu brtag par bgyi//bsti stang bgyis dang mi bgyis la//ri rab lta bur gyur nas su//'jig rten gyis ni mi gos pa//'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur bar
459b3(mdo sde): bgyid//dge slong tshul las nyams rnams kyi//mi snyan pa dgra rtogs nas kyang //las ni bdag gir bya bar bgyi//de dag las ni smin ma 'gyur//chos
459b4(mdo sde): rnams la ni gnas pa la//nged la de 'dra'i chos rnams ni//ji lta bur yang yod med ces//gra shud ma dag kyang 'gyod par 'gyur//bdag cag mying
459b5(mdo sde): gi dge sbyong skye//dge sbyong yon tan med do zhes//yang dag bskul ba thos pa dang //mdo sde 'di ni spong bar 'gyur//sna dang rno chad de dag ni//mi long
459b6(mdo sde): dga' bor mi 'gyur ltar//yang drag bskul ba thos pa dag/de dag dam chos spong bar 'gyur//dge slong gang dag dam pa'i chos//rab tu 'dzin
459b7(mdo sde): par 'byung 'gyur te//de dag bzhin du tshul 'chos kyang //gang yang chos 'di mi nyan to//rgyal po rnams kyang slu baMr bgyid//skye bo chen po 'byed/
460a1(mdo sde): 'gyur yang //sangs rgyas kyi ni byin brlabs kyis//sems can de rtag chos nyan 'gyur//dus ngan de tshe bdag cag rnams//sems can dag
460a2(mdo sde): la sman skad du//lus dang srog kyang rab btang ste//dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar byagyi//'jig pa chen po'i dus de na//tshig tsam du ni ma lags kyi//sgrub
460a3(mdo sde): pa snying por bgyid par yang //mgon pos bdag cag bsam pa mkhyen//dam chos 'di ni yongs bzung na//bsod nams tshogs ni ji tsam mchis//chos kyi
460a4(mdo sde): rgyal po 'od mdzad pa//'jig rten snang bar mdzad la zhu//dri'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzad la bka' stsal pa/
460a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/shir phyogs kyi stong sum cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'ang rdul phra rab kyi chur rdul phra rab kyi rdul du bshig la/de bzhin
460a6(mdo sde): dulho dang /nub dang /byang dang /stong dang /'og dang /phyogs bcu kun tu stong sum cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'ang rdul phru rab kyi rdul du bshig
460a7(mdo sde): ste/de nas rdul phra rab de dag thams cad ji snyed par shar phyogas+t+ya su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed 'das shing rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig bzhag la/tshul de
460b1(mdo sde): lta byang shar phyogs su rdul phra rab de thams cad zad zad du bzhag kyang /shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mthar thug pa gang yang med do//shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin/
460b2(mdo sde): du phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de spyod do//rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi rdul phra rab rnam
460b3(mdo sde): tshul de lta bus phyogs bcur bzhag pa las tshad dam mtha' rtogs par nus sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi nus so//gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs
460b4(mdo sde): pos sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen pa ni ma gtogs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji
460b5(mdo sde): skyed pa de dag las gang du rdul phra rab de dag bzhag par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur te brtsig pas bskor nas 'og gi chu'i phung
460b6(mdo sde): bai nas bzung ste srid pa'i rna ma'i bar gyi grong khyer de dag yungs 'bru mi rngub pa 'ba' zhig gi yongs su gang bar gyur na rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/yangs 'bru
460b7(mdo sde): de dag mang ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar dpe 'di btsal ba ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das gang dpe 'di thos nas
461a1(mdo sde): pA 'gyur ba'i sems can+da de dag kyang ngo mtshur rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro//macom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi dran
461a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni yungs 'bru de dag brgya phrag 'di snyed ce'am/stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/dkrigs pa dang /gtams
461a3(mdo sde): pa dang /khyad phyin dang /mi 'khrugs pa phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di skyed cig ce 'am/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am//
461a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do//zhes rab tu mkhyen to//rigs kyi bu byang chub
461a5(mdo sde): 'dod po la la zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de skyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/sbyin pa byin pas ji ltar skyes bu dom pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin
461a6(mdo sde): pa gang yon tan gyi chos 'di lta bu la gnas pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis dom pa'i chos yongs su bzung na 'di de bas bsod nams ches
461a7(mdo sde): mang du skyed do//yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la gang la la zhig gis bsti stang du byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas
461b1(mdo sde): te mchod pa baspu gang zab mo'i chos la bzod pa de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do//yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de snyed kyi gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byin pa bas/gang
461b2(mdo sde): gzhan zhig sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la rab tu dga' zhing bzod pas gom pa bdun bor na de bas de bsod namaso mang du skyed do///
461b3(mdo sde): yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de snyed du brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /byang chub sems dpa' snyed pas gzhan dag gis
461b4(mdo sde): 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal bar rig cing chos thams cad la bdag med par rig la/mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bar rig nas sems can
461b5(mdo sde): rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed de/dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi chad pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na de ni de bas
461b6(mdo sde): chos bsod nams mang du spyod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
461b7(mdo sde): slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus ni ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dzam+bu'i gling du spyod cing rgyas par yang 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin
462a1(mdo sde): kyis brlabs tu gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rgyal po bzhi dgug pa'i tshig bshad par bya ste/dgug pa'i
462a2(mdo sde): tshig de dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi 'ongs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /rgya cher rnam par dbye zhing rab tu bstan pa'i phyir brtson par
462a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de la 'di dag ni dgug pa'i tshig go/'di lta ste/d+hu d+hu raM/d+hi d+hi raM/d+hA dza ba ti/d+hA dza a laM ka ra/a ba dA ni/sha me sha ma pa ti/shwa na ti mu
462a4(mdo sde): khe/ni gra ha pa ra bak+Sha/a no d+hA ra/ut+tA ri bi ga ma/sa ma pA tha/pA tha shud+d+ho/pA tha a nu ga maM/pA thA san+ti/pradz+nyA mu khe/Ar+ya ku le/b+hu ta rak+She/a
462a5(mdo sde): me sa tsa/me ne sa tsa/ta mra sa tsaM/ta ta ma sa tsa/bud+d+ha bA dA/d+harma a nu san+d+hi/Ar+ya ga na mu kha ma?/Ur+ya nir+g+ha tri ni/rush+tsA pra sA da ni/I shwa ra pa da lo ka tsIt+ti
462a6(mdo sde): k+Sha ta/a nu rA ga yan+ta/i man+t+rarma swan+ti/bi b+ha tsan+tu/nr-i ruk+Shi/nirje shaM pra ti rik+Shan+tu/d+har+m+ma d+ha ra Ni/rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug pa'i
462a7(mdo sde): tshig go//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jigs shing skrag ste spu zing zhes byed nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
462b1(mdo sde): bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /
462b2(mdo sde): smra ba dang /yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /rjes su gzung ba'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o//gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der lha dang /gru dang /gnod
462b3(mdo sde): sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci gang dag chos ma lags pa 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag shin tu tshar bcad par bgyi'o//
462b4(mdo sde): gang dag chos 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi sems rab tu dga' bar bgyi'o//chos smra ba de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang yongs su legs par bzhag par bgyi'o//
462b5(mdo sde): tshig gi mtshams su tshig gi mtshams sbyor bar bgyi'o//spobs pa'ang sprul par bgyi'o//dran pa dang /blo gros dang /rtogs pa dang /dga' ba'ang 'phel bar
462b6(mdo sde): bgyi'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po de bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//grogs po dag 'di lta ste/khyed ni dra'i bu
462b7(mdo sde): chos las skyes pa chos kyis byung ba ste/khyed rnams pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir spro ba ston pa ni logs so legs so//khyed rnams chos kyi rgyu
463a1(mdo sde): mthun pa 'dis 'jig rten du 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur te/'jig rten thams cad las yang dag par 'das nas 'phags pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings
463a2(mdo sde): su yongs su mya ngan las 'di'i bar 'gyur ro//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
463a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig bshad par bya ste/rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin chos kyi rnam grangs
463a4(mdo sde): 'di bsrung ba dang /yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro//de la tshig ni 'di rnams so//'di lta ste/shu b+he/shu b+ha ma ti/shu b+ha
463a5(mdo sde): byA he/du da re/da ri da du ra ni/da me sha mau/u ba sha ma/khu be/u ga sha me/kha be/u ga kha ra/a so mu khe/d+ha ra Ni/a ra tri/shu shru Sha/
463a6(mdo sde): sa hi haM/a b+hA ba ba san+ne/sau me sa ma ba te sa ma ra smi/a she/hu hu/he hai/khu ru khu re/a na ti kra me/dwe ba ru k+Sha sa hi te ma hA b+ha ba b+ha sa pra me/A gats+tsha du
463a7(mdo sde): sha kro daM pa nA man+t+ri/da shi sha ta na ya na/ba ra ma ku ta d+ha ra/i shwa ra u ma ru tA sta na ni ba si/rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshi ga ste/
463b1(mdo sde): dgug pa'i tshig gang gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin bkug nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gnas par bya'o//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin chos
463b2(mdo sde): kyi shugs kyis dga' ba skyes nas/sumo cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi khang pa thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas te/g.yog lha brgya stong mang po dang /bcom ldan
463b3(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der drong nas lhags te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
463b4(mdo sde): 'das bdag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin te/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha la dbang bgyid de/g.yog lha'i tshogs dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dzam+bu'i gling du rgyas
463b5(mdo sde): par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan du bgyi'o//chos smra ba de dag dang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de dag la ji ltar mi gnod pa dang /dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /mos
463b6(mdo sde): pa rnyed cing chos kyi rkyen gyis brgyan te/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs nas rab tu
463b7(mdo sde): 'chad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos kyi bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang /sba bor bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag chos mnyan pa'i skad du ches smra ba de dag gi
464a1(mdo sde): gan dus ba brgya'o//khro nang ga shA' dang du blang bar ba//'dung par chung bting pa'i gnod pa thams cad las kyang ba snang ba dag/
464a2(mdo sde): bsgrub pa dang /sra ba bzhi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka stsal pa/klu shrI//ji lta bur khyod lha'i dbang po theb par chos kyi dbang po zhugs na
464a3(mdo sde): ngadod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa legs si legs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau sho ka de bzhin
464a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa gcig gi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung na 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam
464a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba yin no//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpe'i nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsalce pa/de la rigs kyi
464a6(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i tshig bshad kyis/dgrag pan+de chog gang dag gis mi mdzod kyi 'drug pa chengs du rgyun pachas kyi rnam grangs 'di
464a7(mdo sde): bsrung ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ba nyon cig/de la dgug pa'i tshig ni 'di rnams so//'di lta ste/mi d+de/shu b+h+ra me tre/d+harma me trAM/mit+ma/
464b1(mdo sde): hrIs me t+te/san+ni mr-it+te/a n+yAg ma mr-i te/a nu gak+ShA med+d+he/a nut+tA ra met+te/sUt+kA mai tre/d+hArma me t+te/a nu gra ha me te/a pra tI stA ri mai tre/u la lo kA nA me r+tha/
464b2(mdo sde): bi lo kA na matre/b+hi lA~M krA na maiH/b+heb+h+yaHA nr-i ga mr-i nA mr-id+he/br-id+d+ha a d+hISh+TA nA me traM/an+d+ra rA gak+She mai tre/a n+ya r+yA g+hu kha sham+b+hat+ti/d+harmapra ti stA ra NA mait+taM/
464b3(mdo sde): khAkha sha mai traM/o no o no nu ro d+h+ye/bi ro d+ha mai tre/o to mo mai traM/brAh+ma ba tha mr-i traM/d+hu na a lang+ga ra mo tre/ta s+ya a nu swan+d+hi kA r+ya NA mai tre/tas+ya/a nu san+ti mu tI ta maM
464b4(mdo sde): tre/ta s+ya se nu san+ti/u pik+Sha mi traM/brah+ma ba tha A nu ga ma na mai tAM/tsit+ta U ts+tshi la l+ya mau traM/a nu sA ra Na mai tAM/ni sti r-i Na me traM/sarba ta a nu ga na ma ni mo tAM/
464b5(mdo sde): A gats+tsha t+ya brah+mA/ud pr-i dz+nyA/dA na su khe na/b+hat+tiSh+Tha swa ma d+haM/nI tA ma maM hU~M bau ma dang /bya ba lo k+ShA ya/dzam+bA dI pa na ku ru ShA d+har+m+ma rak+Sha na/mA ti kra ma bud+d+ha d+hiSh+Tha nA~M/
464b6(mdo sde): num mkha' mdzod 'di dag ni mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i tshig go/de nas mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa sangs rgyas
464b7(mdo sde): kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig pa'i gsang sngags byams pa'i tshig 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis thos te/thos nas tshangs pa brgya stong
465a1(mdo sde): phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal
465a2(mdo sde): te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
465a3(mdo sde): bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis rlabs pas bdag byams pa drang snying rjer ldan te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba'i slad du nan tan
465a4(mdo sde): du bgyi'o//gang chos smra ba de dag 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos sdud cing mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /'chad pa dang /
465a5(mdo sde): kha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba de dag dgon par mchis sam/lam gol bar mchis sam/grong dang /grong khyer ram/grong rdal du mchis
465a6(mdo sde): sam/yul 'khor ram/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du mchis kyang rung /chos kyi gtam bgyid kyang rung ste/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher 'chad na bsam
465a7(mdo sde): par bgyi'o//bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba bar bgyi'o//de dag la spro ba stsal bar bgyi'o//stobs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o//dran pa sgrub
465b1(mdo sde): par bgyi'o//blo gros yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o//rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug par bgyi'o//spobs pa stsal bar bgyi'o//ma dad pa rnams dang par bgyi'o//dad
465b2(mdo sde): pa rnams bsgral par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul bdag gis yongs su gzung ste rgya cher 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o//de skad ces
465b3(mdo sde): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//legs so legs so//tshangs pa dam pa'i chos yongs
465b4(mdo sde): su gzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la rjes su yi rang ngo //ji ltar ngas de ltar bskor ba bzhin du tshangs pa khyod kyang ring por mi thogs par chos kyi 'khor lo rab
465b5(mdo sde): tu bskor bar 'gyur ro//ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar nga'i dam pa'i tshes yongs su gzung ba de bzhin du tshangs pa gzhan dag kyang khyod kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur
465b6(mdo sde): ro//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa ji tsam du gzung ba dang /bcang ba dang /
465b7(mdo sde): bklag pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang rgyo cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes pa bskyed pa dang //
466a1(mdo sde): bdag gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'
466a2(mdo sde): rnams chos snang ba thob par bya ba dang /bdud thams cad tshor bcad pa dang /mu stegs thams cad gzhom pa dang /don dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /
466a3(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi chad par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa bye ba phrag grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub
466a4(mdo sde): 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
466a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad ni bla na med pa'i chos dkon mchog gi mdzad 'di bsrung bar bgyi'o//
466a6(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag dang /'ongs pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
466a7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag dga' ldan gyi gnas na mchis te/'di lta bu'i mdo sde dag kun tu bsrung ba dang /yongs su gzung
466b1(mdo sde): ba dang /yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na 'di lta bu'i mdo sde dam pa su'i rna ba ra grag par 'gyur
466b2(mdo sde): ba dang /thos nas 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cing bdag nyid kyang sbyor bar bgyid pa de ni bcom ldan 'das
466b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyis brlabs su rig par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdud kyi phyogs kyang g.yos par 'gyur te/'on kyang
466b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtse ba gang gis bdag gi spu'i khung bu re re grub pa de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dgra thams cad bdud sdig can
466b5(mdo sde): du gyur kyang /de dag bdag gi spyi'i bu ga gcig gis yongs su gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi mchi ba nas dpe'i bar du'ang nye bar mi mchi'o///
466b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bstod nims kyi stobs dang /ye shes kyi stobs kyis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu pham par bgyis la/de bzhin gshegs
466b7(mdo sde): pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di bsrung bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa
467a1(mdo sde): legs so legs so//byams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad /
467a2(mdo sde): char bcad pa dang /phas kyi rgyal ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas zol gyis mnan pa da/sems can spyod snga sa sbyin par bye ba dang /dam bu'i chos songs su
467a3(mdo sde): gzung ba ste/byams pa bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems dpa' las so//lus bzhi pa de dag las gcig gis yongs su bsdus so//gcig po gang na na/
467a4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
467a5(mdo sde): pa/'di srung dang kun dga' bo ji tsam du gzung ba dang /bcang bye dang /klag pa dang /gzhan dag la 'ang rgya cher yang dge bar rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir
467a6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su gtad do//'od srung chen pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthu dang /stobs dang
467a7(mdo sde): nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o//kun dga' bos gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das chos kyirna
467b1(mdo sde): grangs 'di bdag cag gis gzung lags te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis bdag gis yangs shing rgyas par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
467b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyis brdzun pas 'di skad ces gsolato//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mi gling 'du
467b3(mdo sde): bu'i mdo sde de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa zab mo snang bas rgyun chud pa/nges pa'i don mthong bar dka' ba/rtogs par dka' gdon dam pa stong pa nyid
467b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/drin pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /nges par rtogs pa dang /yid rab tu dga' bar byed pa/shes rab
467b5(mdo sde): kyi 'od snang byar byed pa/rnam par grol ba nges par ston pa/zhi ba/ma gos pa/mkhas shing rtogs pa rnams kyis rig par bya ba/sangs rgyas thams
467b6(mdo sde): cocad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa/gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas btab pa/thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 'dzin pa dang /dran pa dang blo gros dang /
467b7(mdo sde): rtogs pa dang /mos pa rnam par 'phel ba/bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi non pa/tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams spa 'gong pa/skyengs pa'i
468a1(mdo sde): son tan dang /yo byad pa sgrung ba dang /sdom pa rman sbyin pa dang /gtong ba'i yon tan gyi chos par rab tu gnas pa/yon tan gyi chos mtha'
468a2(mdo sde): pa las nges par byung ba/sangs rgyas thams cad /chos dang ye shes 'dzin tama?/len tam/'chang ngam+b+ha/klog gam/kun chub par byed dam/gzhan
468a3(mdo sde): dag la 'ang rgya tshor yang dag par rab tu ston tam//yi ger 'dra 'bru/yi ba 'drir 'jug gam/tshig tu 'don tu/sems sam/rtag gam/
468a4(mdo sde): tshul bzhin nges par sems sam/non tan la gnas pa de dag bsod nams ji tsam zhig spyod par 'gyur/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
468a5(mdo sde): dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di drug gsungs so//phyogs bcu rgya che dpag tu med pa yi//zhing rnams sangs rgyas spya
468a6(mdo sde): gyi sna gang gzigs pa//de dag thams cad rin chen rab bkang ste//byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin pa bas//gang gis sang+yas rgyas myang pos bu shing
468a7(mdo sde): pa yi//mdo 'di 'dra ba rab bzeng ma gos pa//'chang ngam klog gam gzhon la ston byed pa//de yi bsod nams de ni ches mchog go/me tog dri zhim
468b1(mdo sde): byug pa gdugs rnams dang //ba dan rgyal mtshan lnga ldi gros rnams kyis//zhing de thams cad yongs su gang byas nas//byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas mchod
468b2(mdo sde): pa byas//bde gshegs bstan pa dam chos rab 'jig cing //'gag pa'i tshe na gang zhig bag yod pas//dam pa'i chos ni yongs su 'dzin byed pa//de yi
468b3(mdo sde): bsod nams de ni ches mchog go/phyogs bcu dag na rgya mtsho gang yod pa//de dag 'bru mar dI zhim rab bkang ste//snying po ri rab chad tsam byas nas su//
468b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i mchod rten me mar bus pa bas//gang gis chos sgron 'di ni rab 'jig che//'jig rten 'di dag mun pas bsgribs shes nas//rgyal bas gsungs
468b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'di 'dzin byed na//de yi bsod nams de ni ches mchog go/sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub mchog tshol zhing //zhing rnams bye bar 'dren pa gang mthong
468b6(mdo sde): ga/de dag la ni bskul pa bya mang du//lha rjes 'du byed yid 'ong mchod pa bas//gadra zhig sangs rgyas byas pa gzo ba dang //dkon mchog gsum ni rjes su
468b7(mdo sde): gzung ba dang //chos 'di la ni sems can gzung ba'i phyir//dam chos 'dzin pa de ni ches mchog go//ji ltar mgon po rnams kyi chos 'dzin ltar//sems
469a1(mdo sde): can gung ngas sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs//de dag gang gis brgya byin tshangs par bkod//de yi bsod nams de snyed mi 'phel lo//sems
469a2(mdo sde): can de kun dgra bcom bkod pa dang //rang rgya la theg par rab tu bkod pa pas//gang zhig byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/dam chos 'dzin pa de ni khyad par
469a3(mdo sde): 'phags//gal te bsod nams de la gzugs yod na//phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad gang bar 'gyur//skyes bu khyu mchog ye sho sde ma
469a4(mdo sde): gtogs par//bsod nums de yi snod ni yod ma yin//ji ltar bskal pa bye ba stong brjod kyang //sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yod ma yin ltar//de bzhin
469a5(mdo sde): gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa yi//bsod nams de yang tshad yod ma yin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pas bcom ldan
469a6(mdo sde): 'das las dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsod nams bshad pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/dga' ba dang yid bde ba
469a7(mdo sde): skyes te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson
469b1(mdo sde): par mi bgyid pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das gang dag dpa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i dge ba'i zla ba gzhan thams
469b2(mdo sde): cad ni bdag la yungs 'bru tsam du gda'o//dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du bdag 'du
469b3(mdo sde): shes gnas par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sems can thams cad la bde bar 'tshal ba'i slad du lus dang srog kyang bor te/bde ba thams cad mi
469b4(mdo sde): 'tshal bar dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du go cha bgro bar bgyi'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi
469b5(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mthun pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod dang blo mnyam pa'i byang
469b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog gi char mngon par rab tu phab bo//bar snang las kyang
469b7(mdo sde): sgra 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'dus pa chen po'i le'u 'di brgyan te yongs su gzung ba'i bar du sangs
470a1(mdo sde): sa b+ha smrasas//d+ha chub kyis su ma la spyo sa gang / na sa 'di ldan pa 'gyur ba gakyang de bzhin sa
470a2(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos brgyan par byed par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sgra las 'di lta bu'i 'od rab tu btang bas 'dadi des phyogs bcu'i sangs
470a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nus par gang bar gyur to//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i thog ma dang /tha ma bshad pa na sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa ni byang chub
470a4(mdo sde): tu sems skyes so//sems can dpag tu mod dgrangs med pa dag ni bzod pa thob par gyur to//sems can la la dgu ni sems rnam par grol lo//la
470a5(mdo sde): dag ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag go//lnga lo dge ni 'dod chags dang bral bye rnyed do//lo la dag ni lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa yongs su bzung bar gyur to//
470a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gzhan dag la'ang blta ba'i phyir rgyu bsags par yang gyur to//de dag thams cad la'ang bcom ldan 'das rjes su thugs rang ngo //bcom
470a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal naso/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
470b1(mdo sde): chen po byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can dang /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che dang /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal dang /byung
470b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yon tan rgyal po 'od dang /byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong dang /byang chub sems
470b3(mdo sde): dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang //
470b4(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /dge slong de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha
470b5(mdo sde): dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'dus pa chen po'i/
470b6(mdo sde): le'u las 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po pi tsa ya shI la dang /shI
470b7(mdo sde): len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur te skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o////rgya gar skad du/
471a1(mdo sde): An+ta me ba ri pra n+danA ma ma hA An swAH/bod skad du/'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i ma'o//sangs rgyas dang /
471a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos po dus gcig ni/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri
471a3(mdo sde): la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yid rdzabs cig go//de nas byang chub sems
471a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pastan las langs te/blo gos phrag phra gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/bcom ldan
471a5(mdo sde): 'das gal ba de logs su thol mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di la chos sbyin pa'i rnam par smin rtse
471a6(mdo sde): gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
471a7(mdo sde): byams pa sum stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang /de bzhin gshegs
471b1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas/gang gis snying rje bas tshigs su bcad pa gcig gzhan gyi rgyud la bzhag na byams
471b2(mdo sde): pa bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro//stong gi chu dang /brgya stong gi cha dang /bye ba'i cha dang /bya ba khrag
471b3(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong gi cha dang /grangs dang /cha dang /bgrang ba dang //dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do//bcom ldan 'das kyis dwa skad ces bka' stsal te/bde bar
471b4(mdo sde): gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//glang gis gang+gA'i bye snyed 'jig rten khams//de dag rin chen byung bur
471b5(mdo sde): bkang byas te//dga' rab sems kyis rgyal la phul ba bas//gang gis tshigs bcad gcig cig sems cani byin//rin chen sbyin pa shin tu rgya chen de//
471b6(mdo sde): snying rje bskyed nas tshigs bcad sbyin pa la//gang+gA'i cha dang grangs su'ang mi phod na//lan gnyis lan gsum sems la ga la zhig/bcom ldan 'das kyis
471b7(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /dge slong de dag dang /lha dang /
472a1(mdo sde): mi dang /lham yin dang /dri zlar bcus pa'i 'jig rten yi ngas te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pal mngon par bstod du/
472a2(mdo sde): 'phags pa byams pas nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///rgyu gar skad du/Ar+yA ba lo ke te shU ra pA ri pr-its+tsha sap+te d+harmA ka nAm
472a3(mdo sde): ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa chos bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bco ma ldan
472a4(mdo sde): 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i rol
472a5(mdo sde): dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu zhugs te/
472a6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phyags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzor nas pus
472a7(mdo sde): mo g.yos pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i lte ba la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thab mo sbyar ba btud te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
472b1(mdo sde): mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
472b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa byams pas nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///rgyu gar skad du/Ar+yA ba lo ke te shwA ra pA ri pr-its+tsha sap+te d+har+m+ma ka nAm
472b3(mdo sde): ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa chos bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bcom ldan
472b4(mdo sde): 'das 'dzemi dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i rol
472b5(mdo sde): dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu zhugs te/
472b6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phyags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzir nas pus
472b7(mdo sde): mo g.yos pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i lte ba la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'odas ga la ba der thab mo sbyar ba btud te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
473a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /dge slong de dag dang byang
473a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa chos
473a3(mdo sde): bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI baM ka ra shI dz+nyA na dang /lo ts+tsha ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o//
473a4(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya pra ti b+ha na ma ti pa ri pri ts+tsha nA ma ma hA yAn sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
473a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na
473a6(mdo sde): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas byin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs
473a7(mdo sde): cig tu bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to//de'i tshe tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros zhes
473b1(mdo sde): byubyab zhig tshang dpon gyi bu lnga brgya rnams so'i g.yog lnga brgya lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar ba dang lhan cig tu/mnyan du yong pa'i grong khyer nas byung ste/
473b2(mdo sde): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas byin gyi kun dga' ri bgol ba dang /bcom ldan 'dis gal ba de logs su spong ste phyin nis/bcom ldan 'das kyi nas
473b3(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
473b4(mdo sde): tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros stan las langs te/thogs phrag pa gcig tu gzur nas pus mo g.yas pa'i ljongs la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la bde
473b5(mdo sde): lcogs su thal ma sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ni bla ma'i mchog/khams gsum pa'i dam pa/byung chub
473b6(mdo sde): bskyod rnams kyi lhag pa na ni/sems can thams cad rjes par sgrol bar mdzad pa/kun tu khyab pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i sgyogs thug pa ma mchis pangs
473b7(mdo sde): par thob par mdzad pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das ma mtshos pa'i dus snyigs ma'i rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa la dug gsum 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/gcig
474a1(mdo sde): la gcig gdung bar bgyid pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang na gang nyes par bsam pa sems pa'i dus na gtso bo ma mchis shing de gang gi'ang ma lags
474a2(mdo sde): pa dang /rgyal po dang /blon po chen po rnams yul la sred pas zil gyis non te phan tshun mi mthun zhing gcig la gcig g.yul 'gyed pa dang /de dag gcig
474a3(mdo sde): la gcig g.yul 'gyed pa nA gzhan dag gi dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang /de las gzhan pa yul gyi m+bi lus chab 'tshal ba rnams kyi ming yang mi gda' bang
474a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi slob ma gang zag bzhi po mang po de dag kyang bstan pa 'di la 'jug cing rab tu byung ba'i tshul thob pa dang /de
474a5(mdo sde): dag kyang phyi rol gyi gros ngur smrig tsam dang /khong pa'i nang gi 'dun pa dang /zhe sdang dang /shin tu ma gus shing phan tshun mi mthun la gcig la gcig skur
474a6(mdo sde): bya 'debaso par bgyid pa dang /skyon stsogs par bgyid pa dang /yon+da tan nges par sbed par bgyid pa dang /nga rgyal dang /rgyags pa dang /dregs pas
474a7(mdo sde): non cing ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin par bgyid pa dang /de dag shi 'phos na'ang ngan song gsum du skye zhing yud tsam zhig rnyed pa'i dpal yang ma 'tshal
474b1(mdo sde): dang /tshe rabs gzhan drug tu bskul pa mang por sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi zad pa/rtsub pa/chu ba/yid du mi mchi ba drug 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang mthong lags
474b2(mdo sde): so//bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du sems can 'di dag yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /ngan 'gro'i lam las rnam par bzlog nas bsod nams kyis gzhal med khang
474b3(mdo sde): thob par bgyi ba'i chos rnams gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//spobs
474b4(mdo sde): pa'i blo gros de ltar khyod seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pas de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu zhing /de ltar sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa la chos zhu bar spro ba skyed pa legs
474b5(mdo sde): so legs so//spobs pa'i blo gros sems can rnams gang thob nas legs par rab tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /nag po'i phyogs sgrub pa spangs nas dkar
474b6(mdo sde): po'i phyogs la zhugs shing don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag khyod zhus shig zhus nas kyang the tshom med par nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o//de
474b7(mdo sde): nas bocom ldan 'das la spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa/bcom ldan 'dis las gang dag gis ni lha rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur/gang dag gis ni mi
475a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur/gang dag gis ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur/gang dag gis ni dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur/
475a2(mdo sde): gang dag gis ni yi dgas rnams su skye bar 'gyur/gang dag gis ni rigs mthon po rnams su skyo bar 'gyur/gang dag gis ni bran dang bran mo rnams su skye
475a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur bcom ldan 'das las gang dag gis ni mi rnams kyi nang du sems can skyes pa rnams skal ba bzang por 'gyur zhing khyim khol dang ldan pa dang /kha
475a4(mdo sde): d+hidri bda' ba dang /kha dog dang ldan pa dang /mthong na dga' ba dang /gnod pa ma mchis pa dang /lus dang sems shin tu tha mal du gnas pa dang //skye bo mang
475a5(mdo sde): pos bsngags pa rnams su 'gyur/las gang dag gis ni sems can rnams mi'i dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing skye bo mngo bo mi
475a6(mdo sde): dga' ba dang /mdog mi sdig pa dang /kha dri mi bda' ba dang /gnod pa mang ba dang /sems mi dga' ba dang /lus shin tu sbyangs pa mo logs pa dang //
475a7(mdo sde): nyes byas kyi las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das las gang dag gis ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung ba dge
475b1(mdo sde): sbyong dang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa rnams gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du rgyun du sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun
475b2(mdo sde): dkon mchog rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang de dag las chos thos nas yid dga' zhing ci bsams pa bzhin
475b3(mdo sde): du don yang grub par 'gyur/bdag gis zhu ba bcu po de dag zhus pa lags na 'byung po grangs ma mchis pa thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das gsol
475b4(mdo sde): ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad pa/thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/dbang dang ldan pa/chos thams cad la lkog tu ma gyur pa'i spyan dang ldan pas rnam
475b5(mdo sde): par phye ste rgyas par lan stsal du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/spobs pa'i blo gros khyod kyis ji lta bu zhu ba zhus pa

476a1(mdo sde): 'gyur/lcu gang zhe na/drang po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnod pa med pa ro sems can rnams mangs su sbyong bar byed cing bzod pa dang
476a2(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams yin/gzhan gyi nor 'phrog par mi byed cing bkren pa'i sems dang ldan pa ma yin pas yongs su gtong bar byed pa yin/gzhan gyi chung ma la spyod pa

476a4(mdo sde): rang gi skyon tshad med pa spong bur byed la myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs pa yin te/las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams lha'i lhas thob par 'gyur ro//de nas

476a6(mdo sde): rten du ni mi thub lus can tshe ring nad med 'gyur ba yin//'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i lus can shes ljon dri med rdzogs pa'i lus//lha nang rab mchog
476a7(mdo sde): de yi longs spyod sna tshogs dpal can rtag tu 'byung //bor ma thag tu lhar+m+mad rtag tu lha yi dbang phyug rnams su 'gyur//bsam meng+ga bsal ba 'phrog pa rnam
476b1(mdo sde): log rin chen longs spyod rnams dang ldan//rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu yid dga' dpal ldan gzhal med khang gnas shing //rje zhing dga' ba'i dpag bsam shing gri yul nam/

477a1(mdo sde): nyi shu 'gro na lha yi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur//bsod nams lnga mngon gyur pas de ni dam pa dpal ldan lus 'od can//lha rnams la ma sel byed

477b3(mdo sde): rab tu dga' bar 'gyur//nges pa'i me ni pha rol sems 'khrugs ma byas shing //gzhan dag rnams kyis gnod byas phyir ni gnod mi byed//de bzhin tshig ngan brjod kyang
