481a4(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//bkren pa'i nyes pas bcom pa nor gtong mi phod pa//de dag gzhon dag las ni blang bar 'dod par byed//mdzod rnams kyi ni
481a5(mdo sde): sgo 'phar dam du bsdams pa rnams//'dir ni bskyang 'os rtsa lag mchog rnams gos mi byed//gzhan nor chud gzon pa yis rtag tu sgrog pa rnams//bla mya la
481a6(mdo sde): yang de dag rab rtsub byems can min//de dag bdag gi chung ma la sogs g.yog tshogs la//dbyig sbyin mi byed shin tu snying brtsi shes med cing //dkar po dag
481a7(mdo sde): las log pa de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas//yun ring mchog tu lus 'bar sdug bsngal yi dgos 'gyur///de dag lo brgya rnams su rmi lam rmis par yang //
481b1(mdo sde): gos dang zas dang btung ba'ang nam yang rmi mi 'gyur//khab 'dra'i khwa dang rin chen lta bu'i lto can rnams//nyam thag shar dang nub kyi rgya mtshor rgyug par byed//kha nas me 'bar
481b2(mdo sde): lus ngan phyogs dang lho phyogs gzhan//skams par mthong nas rin chen ma nang lhung bar 'gyur//gshin rje'i pho nya dpung mgo las grub rab stug cing //sra ldan rnams
481b3(mdo sde): kyis mnan nas zangs zhun bzod dka' rab//mi 'dra ro bro med pa de dag rnams la ldud//rmongs rnams yan lag brgyad ldan chu bzhin 'thud par byed//nang grol lces kyi
481b4(mdo sde): khog pa bsregs pa bsal ba'i rlung gis su//skyes pa'i bdag nyid rnams la stobs chen yang ldung byed//de nas shi 'phos mi yi 'jig rten 'dir skyes rnams//rigs
481b5(mdo sde): dang longs spyod lus g.yog rnams kyis dman par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/spobs pa'i blo gros sems can
481b6(mdo sde): las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni rigs mthon po rnams su 'gyur te/lnga gang zhe na//'di lta ste/zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa dag gis 'jig rten thams cad la gnod
481b7(mdo sde): sems med par gyur pa dang /dkon mchog gsum dang pha ma la gus pa dang /lhan cig skyes pa'i bzod pa dang dos pa dang /shin tu gya nom pa dang sangs rgyas kyi
482a1(mdo sde): gsung rnam pa sna tshogs klog pa dang kha ton bya ba la brtson pa ste/spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams na/tshigs mtshan
482a2(mdo sde): po rnams su 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//bsnam byas gang dag bsod nams tshogs pa skal bang
482a3(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i cho ga bzhin//kun tu sems can mngal kun bged de dag rtag tu nad med 'gyur//tshe dang kha dog stobs ldan lus can 'jig rten mchog tu 'gyur//
482a4(mdo sde): mtshungs dang rgya chen khyad par can gyis mdzes mdzod rin chen ri dbang bzhin//'dul ba nyams dga'i dkon mcho ga mtshungs med pa mi rnams la bsnyen bku
482a5(mdo sde): pas//shin+da tu rgyu chen kau n+do mrachog khyim du skyes pa grangs med skye bos mched//shin tu nus kyang yid 'a khrug rnam sangs kun tu gzugs kyis 'phags pa
482a6(mdo sde): rnams//'jig rten rnams kyi mig tu ldog pa sgrol bzang rigs ni mthon par 'gyur//gang zag brtan zhing kun bzod shin tu yod bzang dkar dang mthun rnams
482a7(mdo sde): dang /mi rnams gang dag shes rab dag mchog sangs rgyas gsung la kha ton brtson//de dag 'byor pa thob nas rigs mchog skyes pa kun tu kun mchog
482b1(mdo sde): mdzes//de dag dge bas rgyas pas lus chen rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du sba//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/spobs pa'i blo gros
482b2(mdo sde): sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni bran dang bran mo nyid thob par 'gyur te/lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/pha ma rnams la mi gus pa dang /gya nom pa'i sems ma yin
482b3(mdo sde): pa dang /zlog pa med cing ci dger sdig pa spyod pa dang /gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang /bu lon phrogs nas bdag sbed pa ste/spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga
482b4(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni bran dang /bran mo nyid thob par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//bsod
482b5(mdo sde): nams rgya chen 'byor pa gangs 'odi lta bu'i khyim du skye thob nas//blun po gang dag rgyags khengs dregs pas dkrugs shing gus par mi byed la//pha ma rnams la rmad
482b6(mdo sde): byung sbyin gnas 'dra bar 'du shes mi byed po//de dag nyes pas gzhan du 'jig rten dbang gyur dman zhing g.yon can 'gyur//dkon mchog mtshungs med rnams
482b7(mdo sde): l-i ma gus lhur byed ma rungs brlang tshig 'gyur//gang dag byams dang de bzhin snying rje ma lus dge ba chud gzan pa//de dag grangs med skye bar 'dzin med gzhan
483a1(mdo sde): 'as ngan nas shid//mi'i yul du za nyu bangs nas skad cig gis ni dma' bar 'gyur//gzugs dang bu 'i gsum tshug gas
483a2(mdo sde): dben la mo pa'i sbyin par 'gyur//dkon mchug rnams mang mtshad pas du rgyal myed kyi 'tshul myed sa dA nA DU//dal na med kying ting 'dzin bral ba lca
483a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni bsdigs par 'gyur//de dag 'jig rten kun dga' dga' spyan tshe sogs med cing tshogs kyi sa'i cha//dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang sangs
483a4(mdo sde): pa'i blo gros la bke' stsal pa/spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni sprul ba bzang por 'gyur zhing khyim khol dang /kha dri zhim pa dang /
483a5(mdo sde): gnod pa med pa dang /lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa dang /bAny+dza na sdug pa dang /skye ba mang pos bsngags pa rnams su 'gyur te/lnga gang zhe na/
483a6(mdo sde): si dzI k+Sha ba bzhin du yang dag pa dang /mAn+ting ba med pa dang /sku braM ta gas pa med pa'i tshig dang /nyan zas dang /rang sangs kyis dang /theg pa chen
483a7(mdo sde): dang /theg pa rnam pa gsum po thams cad kyi tshig gi rang bzhin la mi bzod pa med cing mi smod la/mi spong zhing de thams cad du gzung ba dang /bshad ba
483b1(mdo sde): bklag pa dang /kha ton la sogs pa byed pa dang /ngag gi skyon bzhi po tshad med pa rnam par spong zhing 'phags pa'i lam la skur pa myi 'debs pa dang sems can log par
483b2(mdo sde): sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams la snying brtse zhing yongs su bskyang ba dang /skyon de las bzlog cing dge ba la dgod pa dang /gzhan gyi skyon mthong ba'i brjod pa yal bar 'jog
483b3(mdo sde): pa ste/spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni mi rnams kyi nang du skyes nas skal ba bzang por 'gyur zhing khyim khol dang ldan pa dang /kha dri
483b4(mdo sde): zhim pa dang /yid gzhungs pa dang /mthun pa dang /skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /mya ngan med pa dang /sems thu mal du gnas pa dang /khro ba med pa dang /gnod pa
483b5(mdo sde): med pa dang /kha dog dang ldan pa dang /grags pa dang ljon pa rnams su 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//
483b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sogs la shin tu shas cher gus 'bad pha ma rnams mchod pas//rtag tu ngag skyon kun bral 'jig rten dag tu rmad du byung bar 'gyur//tshig gi yon tan gzung
483b7(mdo sde): 'os rnga sgrar bcas shing tshe rabs kun tu pan//ut+pal dri dang mdzes pa'i rlung ldan kha yis phyogs su snyan pa grags//gang dag bdag byams gzhan mtshungs ma ni
484a1(mdo sde): skyon brjod sdig pa dran pa las//phral nas dge ba kun la sems can rnams ni sbyor du 'jug byed pa//de dag 'jig rten thob nas skal ba bzang po kun tu/
484a2(mdo sde): thams cad dga'//shin tu yid 'ong rin chen yul can bde gnas sdig las log par 'gyuraro//dam pa'i chos ni gzung dang bstan brtson de sems med cing nges par
484a3(mdo sde): 'gyur//'dir ni sems can kun la pha ma 'dra bar byams pa'i sems ldan 'gyur//'das pa'i dus su lus can kun ni nged kyi rtswa lag tshogs gyur ces//de
484a4(mdo sde): zla ba lta bu'i sems sbyangs de dag la ni phan par byed//'gran dregs khyad gsod la sogs rnam pa sna tshogs phan tshun sun 'byin pa'i//sdig pa yongs su spangs nas
484a5(mdo sde): dag pa'i yid can skyon rnams kun sbas nas//sems can lhag pa'i bsam pa dge bas snyan tshogs phan tshun brjod par byed//myur du lha yi dbang phyug mtshungs
484a6(mdo sde): med thob nas sangs rgyas dge bar 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga
484a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams ni mi'i dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang /kha dri ma zhim pa dang /sems mi dga'
484b1(mdo sde): ba dang /gnod pa mang ba dang /lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin par 'gyur te/lnga gang zhe na/brdzun du smra ba dang /brdzun du smra bas rtag tu gzhan slu ba'i sems lhur len pa dang //
484b2(mdo sde): chos kyi 'bel pa'i grwatA ma chen po la 'dus po na chos kyi gtam de la rnam par spyod pa dang /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams mthong na de dag la brnyas shing khyed du gsod
484b3(mdo sde): pa dang /dma' ba'i sems su byed pa ste/spobs pa'i blo gros sems can lngas lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni me'i dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par
484b4(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang /mdog mi sdug pa dang /kha dri mi zhim pa dang /sems mi dga' ba dang /gnod pa mang ba dang /lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma
484b5(mdo sde): yin par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//sems yid rnams kyis gzhan sems drag tu 'khrug dang sdig
484b6(mdo sde): pa rnams byas pas//log pa'i ngag dang gzhan la gnod par dga' ba tha ma rnams sems dang //lus kyis sdug bsngal gzhal med rdzogs pa bar med nyams su
484b7(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur//lcags kyi lcags kyu chen po rnon po rnams kyis nyam thag lce 'byin 'gyur//gshin rje'i dbang phyug gnas su'ang me rnams shin tu zangs bskol
485a1(mdo sde): b+h+yaH/ldud par 'gyur//dmyal bar mi bdon tshig can skyes pa de dag dga' bar yong mi 'gyur//gang tshe 'dir ni tshig bzang bral ba ro ltar kha dri mi zhom
485a2(mdo sde): zhing //'jig rten mig tu yid 'ong blta na sdug pa ma yin rnams su 'gyur//rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du mi snyan skur 'debs rjod pa'i skyon mang zhing //de dag rtag
485a3(mdo sde): tu skyon gnas mi ni sa ya mang pos gleng bar 'gyur//sems can brdzun smra rnams kyis tha mal sems dang lus bde ma yin phyir//sngar bshad nyes 'gro de yi
485a4(mdo sde): 'bros bu sdug bsngal mang po spyod par 'gyur//mi nyid spangs nas dbang med mi rnams bde ba kun la slu byed pa'i//sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten 'gro
485a5(mdo sde): 'gyur de nas shi 'phos gyur nos ni//'gro ba lnga po'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rtsub par dud 'gro rnams su skye//de ltar lus can 'khyam pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal
485a6(mdo sde): zad par 'gyur ba med//de nus bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/spobs pa'i blo gros dge sbyong dong /rigs kyi bu dang /
485a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du rtog par sangs rgyas dang /chos
485b1(mdo sde): dang /dge 'dun dang phrad pa thob par 'gyur zhing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang de dag las chos kyang thos nas yid dga' zhing ci bsams pa bzhin//
485b2(mdo sde): du byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la/ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur te/lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdag nyid dkon mchog gsu
485b3(mdo sde): la skyabs su srung nas gzhan dag kyang gsum la skyabs su 'gro bsgrub pa la rnam par 'jog par byed pa dang /rnam pa thams cad kun tu rdzogs shing rgyus la rgya chen po legs
485b4(mdo sde): par byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang /mkhan po dang slob dpon shes shing gus pa dang bcas pa dang /bka' blo bde ba dang mthun
485b5(mdo sde): par 'dzin par sgrub pa dang /kun tu thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis sems can thams cad bdag dang 'dra zhing bu gcig pa'i byis pa dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang /
485b6(mdo sde): ji ltar brtsams pa'i mdo sgrub pa dang /bklag pa dang /kha ton dang /lung mnod pa dang /bshad pa rnams yid la byed pa yangs shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis
485b7(mdo sde): bar chad med par bsgom pa la mngon par zhen cing sgrub par byed pa ste/spobs pa'i blo gros dge sbyong dang /rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin
486a1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du bar chad med par sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun
486a2(mdo sde): dkon mchog rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas kyang de dag las chos kyang thos nas yid dga' zhing ci bsams pa bzhin du
486a3(mdo sde): byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la/ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
486a4(mdo sde): 'di dag bka' stsal to//gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan mchog gi chos la gnas//de dag nyid kyis sems can thams cad 'dul bar byed//sangs rgyas sku gzugs/
486a5(mdo sde): gzugs legs rnams ni byed par 'gyur//mkhas pa rnams ni slob dpon tshig la mchod par byed//gang dag phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jog rten ma lus la//
486a6(mdo sde): bdag dang bu gcig byis po rnams dang 'drar mthong ba//de dag sred pa kun tu mya ngan med nges 'gyur//shin tu rnam dag thugs mnga' sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong //
486a7(mdo sde): gang dag shes rab rin chen chen po 'byor mdzad rnams//nyin dang mtshon du dge ba kun tu spyod par byed//'dir ni rmad du byung ba'i 'od dang ldan pa rnams//
486b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten mun pa che la snang ba mchog byed 'gyur//kun tu chos rnams thams cad rab tu rnam phye nas//sangs rgyas lam las mchog ni gzhan med par//nges par byas///
486b2(mdo sde): nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi//mthar thug 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni shes par 'gyur//de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
486b3(mdo sde): nas tshim zhing mgu ste/yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgya tsam po dang //

486b5(mdo sde): dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang /mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'dus
486b6(mdo sde): par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis ni ci bsams pa bzhin gyi theg pa rnams la sems bskyed do//ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa'ang thob cing /me tog dang /
486b7(mdo sde): spos dang /phreng ba dang /gos dang /rgyan la sogs pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to//de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros stan las
487a1(mdo sde): langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la bya de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
487a2(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa'i bla mas chos lnga po 'di dag legs par gsungs pa legs so legs so//choso lnga po de
487a3(mdo sde): dag thos nas 'khor 'di yid bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par don grub par gyur lags so//ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'di nyid thob nas nag po'i phyogs
487a4(mdo sde): spangs te/dkar po'i phyogs la zhugs zhing brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag
487a5(mdo sde): gi sdum par spyan 'dren na bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du khyod kyis de ltar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros
487a6(mdo sde): la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnang bar mdzad do//de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas tshim zhing mgu ste yi rangs nas
487a7(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ste/dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhangs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
487b1(mdo sde): nas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo //de rang gi khyim du song nas pha ma gnyis kyi rkang pa la phyag byas te thal mo sdug stug por sbyar nas 'di skad
487b2(mdo sde): ces smras so//yab yum 'di ltar gang 'jig rten na shin tu dkon mchog gshegs pa bla na med pa chos kyi rgyal po khams gsum pa thams cad las 'das po bcom ldan
487b3(mdo sde): 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gis gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na/des kyang bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnang lags kyis mkhyen
487b4(mdo sde): par mdzod cig/de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dag yid dga' ste/'di skad ces smras so//bu legs so//khyod kyis legs par byas so zhes mngon par bstod
487b5(mdo sde): de/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i las la spro bar gyur te/de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyis rang gi chung ma pad+ma g.yog 'khor dang bcos pa la bsgo ba/bzang mo
487b6(mdo sde): khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i don du bza' ba dang btung ba ro brgya dang ldan
487b7(mdo sde): po mang ba dang bsod par sbyor cig/sbyar nas kyang khyim thams cad chag chag gdab pa dang /phyag dar bya ba dang /bra bre bre ba dang /dar gyi lnga ldi gdags pa dang /
488a1(mdo sde): me tog chal par dgram pa dang /gdug spos dri zhim pos bdug par byed du bcug la/de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig
488a2(mdo sde): pa'i gdan ci 'os su thing ste/mchod yon dang zhabs la dbul ba spyan sngar bzhag pas bcom ldan 'das dam pa de la sdod cig ces bsgo ste/spobs pa'i blo gros
488a3(mdo sde): mdzu' bshes dang /blon po dang /nye du dang /rgan rabs la sogs po dang lhan cig 'grogs shing ji skad smras pa thams cad byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das
488a4(mdo sde): de'i mtshan mo 'das nas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal skyed mos tshal chen po nas byung nas sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas
488a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dpal rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i rol pas cho 'phrul dang bcas pas mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen por
488a6(mdo sde): gshegs so//gshegs nas kyang rim gyis spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim ga la ba de logs su bzhud do//de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog 'khor dang bcas/
488a7(mdo sde): pas bcom ldan 'das bsu nas mchod yon dang zhabs la 'bul bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la ma bas phyag btsal nas/bcom ldan 'das
488b1(mdo sde): zhabs 'bring ba dang bcas par khyim gyi nang du gshegs te/bcom ldan 'das ni ci 'os pa'i gdan mchog la bzhugs so//dge slong gi dge 'dun ci 'os pa la 'khod do///
488b2(mdo sde): de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi phyi ma dang /sras dang /mdza' bshes dang /blon po dang /nye du dang /rgan rabs rnams ni yid dga' zhing 'dud la bla ma la gus pa dang
488b3(mdo sde): gcis pa'i byed pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig pa la 'drim par rtsom mo//spobs pa'i blo gros ni me tog dang /spos chur bcas pas
488b4(mdo sde): bkang ba'i ril ba thogs nas ston pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te//yang de'i tshe sdug bsngal ba'i grogs po gnyis shig spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim du phyin par gyur nas//
488b5(mdo sde): de gnyis las gcig ni dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs so//de'i tshe dge slong thams cad la bza' ba dang btung ba 'byor tshogs shes ma smras la/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
488b6(mdo sde): rjes su thugs rang ba ma gsungs pas/de gang gis kyang ci'ang ma byin nas/de khros te phyir byung nas 'di snyam du kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la gang gis ci'ang ma byin pa
488b7(mdo sde): ni dge sbyong bdag nyid ngan pa rnams te/sems nye bar zhi ba ma yin zhing snying rje med la byams pa'i sems ldan pa ma yin pa dag go/gang de dag la byin yang 'bras bu
489a1(mdo sde): med pa de lta bu dag la sbyin par byed pa ni sbyin bdag blun po ste/gal te bdag rgyal por gyur na thams cad kyi mgo lcags kyi 'khor los bcad do//
489a2(mdo sde): snyam du sems par gyur to//de nas de'i 'og tu dge slong thams cad la bza' ba dang /bca' ba dog 'byor tshogs shes byas shing /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
489a3(mdo sde): rjes su thugs rang bar mdzad pa dang /gcig shos 'ongs par gyur to//des ni bza' ba dang /btung ba mang ba dang /bsod pa thob nas de yi rangs
489a4(mdo sde): te/phyir byung nas 'di snyam du kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la gang drag gis bza' ba dang /btung ba mang ba dang /gsod pa byin pa ni dge sbyong bdag nyid
489a5(mdo sde): chen po rnams te/snying brtse bar byed la sems nye bar zhi ba yin zhing byams pa'i bdag nyid can dag go/'dis ni bdag zhag bdun du tshim par 'gyur
489a6(mdo sde): bar byas so//gang 'di dag la byin no 'bras bu che ba sbyin gnas chen po 'di lta bu dag la sbyin par byed pa ni sbyin bdag chen po mkhas pa ste/legs so gal te
489a7(mdo sde): bdag rgyal por gyur na sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhag bdun du bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis rim gro byed par gyur cig snyam du
489b1(mdo sde): sems par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol nas/gsung sngar gyu ste phyag bcabs nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
489b2(mdo sde): kun dga' bo dang phyin chad bza' ba dang /btung ba ma blangs pa nyid du rjes su yi rang ba brjod cig/de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/bcom
489b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go//bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang dag par dga' ba dang /yang dag par gzang bstod pa dang /yang dag par 'dzin
489b4(mdo sde): du gzhug pa sngon du mdzad pa'i chos kyi gtam sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed pa mdzad de/gdan las bzhengs nas bzhud de/
489b5(mdo sde): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs nas de na bzhugs so//de nas sdug bsngal ba de gnyis 'khor 'khor 'khyam 'khyam ste/yul gzhan zhig tu
489b6(mdo sde): song nas pha zad chu zad tsam gyi phyogs su nyal bar gyur to//der bsod nams kyi lus can de la skyeng gri nam mkha' la grib ma'i don du sprin gyi bla bre glog
489b7(mdo sde): dang rlung 'byung ba dang bcas pa rab tu gnas par gyur to//de'i tshe yul de na rgyal po gang yin pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas so//de na gang rgyal srid la dbang
490a1(mdo sde): bskur bar bya ba'i rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa'ang gzhan med do//de na tshong dpon dang /grong mi dang /yul mi dang /blon po chen
490a2(mdo sde): po dang /blon po dang /skyo ba dang /'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams ni mtshan mkhan dang /ltas mkhan dang /skar ma dang /gza' spyod pa la mkhas
490a3(mdo sde): pa la rgyal por 'gyur ba su yod ces brtson par gyur cing 'dri'o//des smras pa/skyes bu dbul po mtshan dang ldan pa zhig yod do//de ni rgyal por
490a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de nas de dag rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa rgyal po la 'os pa rin thang che ba'i khri stan bzang po gser gyi rkang rten dang bcas pa dang /yu ba nor
490a5(mdo sde): bu las byas pa'i gdugs dkar po dang /yu ba gser los byas shing nor bu dang ldan pa'i rnga ma'i bsil yab dang /spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa du ma dang /
490a6(mdo sde): me tog dang /rgyan phreng dang /gos dang /dbu rgyan dang /thod dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang /spos kyi phur ma dang /slo ma dag thogs te/
490a7(mdo sde): sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dang /glu dbyangs dang bcas pa dag dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor nas byung ste/kun nas de kun tu btsal to//lhas
490b1(mdo sde): mkhan des sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bkab pa'i phyogs de mthong ste/mthong nas kyang de dag la smras pa/grogs po dag khyed cag gis sbyin sngon po'i dkyil 'khor gyis khengs
490b2(mdo sde): pa dga' zhing gsal bya'i phyogs de mthong ngam/de dag gis smras pa/grogs po mthong ngo //des smras pa/de na rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i skyes bu
490b3(mdo sde): 'dug ste/de'i bsod nams kyi las kyis grib ma'i don du sprin de dag 'dus so//de nas de dag der dong nas/sil snyan dang /glu dbyangs kyi smras
490b4(mdo sde): sbran te btud nas de la 'di skad ces smras so//dbang bskur ba bzhes la rgyal por gyur cig/des smras pa/kho bo lta bu rgyal po'i 'os ga la yin/de dag
490b5(mdo sde): gros smras pa/bsod nams kyi las can khyod de skad ma zer bar gdon mi za bar rgyal po bya dgos so//smras pa de bzhin du gyur cig de nas de dag gis myal
490b6(mdo sde): gyi rkang rten la rkang pa bzhag pa de stan bzang po la 'dug tu gtsug nas bkra shis thams cad kyis rgyas par byed cing dbang bskur te/dbu rgyan dar thod can la sogs
490b7(mdo sde): pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan nas/shing rta'i mgo logs su gdugs chen po bsgreng ste/btsugs shing yu ba gser las byas pa nor bu can gyi rnga ma'i bsi
491a1(mdo sde): yab dag gis g.yob cing /lha rgyal bar gyur cig/rgyal bar gyur cig ces kun nas mngon par bstod de rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du khrid do//
491a2(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po'i shing rta de bsgyur ba'i 'khor los bkren pa gcig shos gnyid log pa'i mgo chad do//de nas bsod nams kyi las can de'ing rgyal
491a3(mdo sde): srid la gnas par gyur to//de'i rgyal srid de'i nga yams kyi nad med pa dang /gnod pa med pa dang /'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba
491a4(mdo sde): dang /lo legs pa dang /skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang bar gyur to//rgyal po'i ming gis yon tan thams cad 'byor cing ldan par gyur la/dga'
491a5(mdo sde): dgur spyod pa de 'di snyam du 'di gong gi mthu yin/bdag gi rgyal srid skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa'i gang gis byung bar gyur snyam pa dang /de sangs rgyas
491a6(mdo sde): kyi mthu so sngon gyi las mngon par 'du byas pa de thams cad rjes su dran no//yang dag par dran nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du bcom ldan 'odas
491a7(mdo sde): bdag cag sems can mang po gzhan rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du tshur gshegs su gsol zhes pho nya zhig btang ngo //pho nya btang nas kyang rgyal bu
491b1(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar dang /rang gi khyim gyi bar du bar der bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i lam chag chag btub cing phyag dar byas te/me tog chal
491b2(mdo sde): par bkram nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /bdun dang /rta babs btsugs shing pog por dag gis bdugs nas mngon par brgyan te/bcom ldan 'das
491b3(mdo sde): kyang de la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gshegs so//de nas rgyal po de grong khyer gyi mi dang /yul mi dang bcas shing blon po chen po dang /blon po dang /sgo ba dang /
491b4(mdo sde): 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pas bsu'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la me tog dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye mas bsgos
491b5(mdo sde): pa'i slom dpag tu med pas mchod de/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i zhabs la lus thams cad kyis phyag btsal nas/'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan
491b6(mdo sde): 'das la bla ma la gus pa dang gces par byed pa chen po mchog gi bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun dang thubs cig tu rang gi khyim gyi nang rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan
491b7(mdo sde): pa skyed mos tshal chen pos yongs su bskor bar gshegs su gsol nas/zhwag bdun du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas so//de nas rgyal po des
492a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol nas/gsang sder gyu ste/phyag bcabs par rig nas/chos mnyan pa'i phyir g.yog 'khor dang
492a2(mdo sde): bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dma' ba dang /dbul ba lags na/bdag gi rgyal
492a3(mdo sde): srid phun sum tshogs pa 'di ga las mchis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po na sbyin
492a4(mdo sde): bdag chen po spobs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig yod de/des dus gzhan zhig na rang gi khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gri dge 'dun gdugs tshod
492a5(mdo sde): gsol to//de nas der sdug bsngal ba gnyis shig lhags zhes bya ba nas rgyas par snga ma bzhin te/gcig gi mgo khyod kyis shing rta'i 'khor los chod
492a6(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de'ang shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal bar skyes te/der skyes pa de'i mgo skad cig skad cig la skyes so cog na lcags kyi 'khor lo
492a7(mdo sde): 'bar bas bcad do//de'ang de nas bskal pa bye bas thar por 'gyur ro//khyod kyis ni rgyal po'i dpal thob ste/bodag de lta bur gyur nas sangs
492b1(mdo sde): rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhag bdun du gdugs tshod gsol bar gyur cig ces khyod kyis smod lam btab ste/khyod kyi bsam pa de'ang rdzogs so//de
492b2(mdo sde): phyin chad ni tshe rabs dpag tu med pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa dgra thob par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
492b3(mdo sde): tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//'jig rten nag po 'byung ba'i phyir//yid ni dug gi rtsa ba yin//nyes par smra rnams 'byung ba'i phyir//kha
492b4(mdo sde): ni sdig pa'i sgo nyid do//sems kyi sna tshogs sems par byed//de nas tshig tu smra bar 'gyur//ngag yid dag gis sdig byas pa//lus skyes sdug
492b5(mdo sde): bsngal sbyin par byed//phan dang mi phyin ma bsams par//bla med pas ni sdig byed pa//des na sdug bsngal snod 'gyur te//nyon mongs pa dag de ltar
492b6(mdo sde): 'gyur//mkhas pa rnams kyi mgo bo dag/yid kyis gcod par 'dod pa de//blo gros ngan pa mi shes pa'i//mgo ni 'khor los yang dgra tshong//dngul
492b7(mdo sde): ldan yid 'di kho nas ni//chos dkar bdud rtsi rten pa yi//sems can bsod nams byas dge rnams//lha yi 'jig rten rnams su khrid//'dir ni snying gis/
493a1(mdo sde): kun bsams nas//tshig tu brjod pas legs smras pa//de phyir de ni lus kyis su//bsod nams mdzad ni len par 'gyur//
493a2(mdo sde): mi yis blo ni sngon btang ste//las dge mi dge rnams phye nas//gal te bsod nams che byed na//rtag tu rab tu lte der 'gyur//sems kyis mi
493a3(mdo sde): dge ba yi las//rtag tu yongs su spangs nas ni//rab tu dga' bas bsod nams nyid//mi yis bya ste sdig pa min//tshe rabs bye ba grangs
493a4(mdo sde): med par//'khor los sgyur sogs go 'phang gi/lha mi'i nang du rgyal po'i dpal//thams cad thob nas khyod bzhin no//mi yi dbang phyug
493a5(mdo sde): dus kun tu//srid rnams snying po med shes nas//khyod kyis sangs rgyas chos rnams la//mngon par brtson pa mtha' yas bya//de nas bcom
493a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la rgyal po des yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa 'di thos nas mchog tu yid byung ste//'khor dang bcas pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
493a7(mdo sde): bu zab bo//gzhan stong phrag mang po zhig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang /chos mnyan pas lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams
493b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba dang /thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis der gang sems can rnams kyi
493b2(mdo sde): de na mdzad pa de thams cad rgyas par mdzad nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du byon to//gtsug lag khang gi skyobs shig tu/dge slong gi dge 'dun rgya
493b3(mdo sde): nang du sangs rgyas kyi gdan gshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs
493b4(mdo sde): 'di bzung zhig/tshangs shig lhogs shig/gzhan dag pa 'di rgyu cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/kun dga'o bo rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
493b5(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang bu dgra chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par byeng ba de thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
493b6(mdo sde): byams pa las ji ltar smon la ma btab pa'i theg po rnams la lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan po kun
493b7(mdo sde): doga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci legs/'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das
494a1(mdo sde): skyos pa'i blogros kyis dus pa sa byu med bzung ni ni/ 'dus kyi skye da ldan pa kun dga' ba dang/
494a2(mdo sde): phyogs pa seM sa smras pa skye na du tsug /kyi sa kyim na pa phre pa ma nga /
494a3(mdo sde): lo ts+tshab ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa'o//mahA/
